original: Namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa
analyzed: namaḥ tassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa

original: Visuddhimaggo
analyzed: visuddhi maggaḥ

original: (Dutiyo bhāgo)
analyzed: dutiyaḥ bhāgaḥ

original: 12. Iddhividhaniddeso
analyzed: iddhividha niddeso

original: Abhiññākathā
analyzed: abhiññā kathā

original: 365. Idāni yāsaṃ lokikābhiññānaṃ vasena ayaṃ samādhibhāvanā abhiññānisaṃsāti vuttā,
analyzed: idāni yāsam lokika abhiññānam vasena ayam samādhi bhāvanā abhiññā nisaṃsā iti vuttā

original: tā abhiññā sampādetuṃ yasmā pathavīkasiṇādīsu adhigatacatutthajjhānena yoginā yogo
analyzed: tāḥ abhiññā sampādetum yasmai pathavī kasiṇa ādīsu adhigata catuttha jjhānena yoginā yogaḥ

original: kātabbo. Evañhissa sā samādhibhāvanā adhigatānisaṃsā ceva bhavissati thiratarā ca,
analyzed: kātabbo evam hissa sā samādhi bhāvanā adhigata anisaṃsā ca iva bhavissati thiratarā ca

original: so adhigatānisaṃsāya thiratarāya samādhibhāvanāya samannāgato sukheneva paññābhāvanaṃ
analyzed: so adhigata anisaṃsāya thiratarāya samādhi bhāvanāya samannāgataḥ sukhena iva paññā bhāvanam

original: sampādessati. Tasmā abhiññākathaṃ tāva ārabhissāma.
analyzed: sampādessati tasmai abhiññā katham tāva ārabhissāma

original: Bhagavatā hi adhigatacatutthajjhānasamādhīnaṃ kulaputtānaṃ samādhibhāvanānisaṃsadassanatthañceva

analyzed: uttaruttari paṇīta paṇīta dhamma desana attham ca saḥ evam samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte

original: anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte iddhividhāya cittaṃ

original: abhinīharati abhininnāmeti. So anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhoti ekopi hutvā

original: bahudhā hotī”tiādinā nayena iddhividhaṃ, dibbasotadhātuñāṇaṃ, cetopariyañāṇaṃ, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ,
analyzed: bahudhā hoti itiādinā nayena iddhi vidham dibba sota dhātu ñāṇam cetas upariya ñāṇam pubbenivāsa anussati ñāṇam

original: sattānaṃ cutūpapāte ñāṇanti pañca lokikābhiññā vuttā.
analyzed: sattānam cutūpapāte ñāṇan ti pañca lokika abhiññā vuttā

original: Tattha ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotītiādikaṃ iddhivikubbanaṃ kātukāmena ādikammikena yoginā odātakasiṇapariyantesu aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu aṭṭha aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā –
analyzed: tattha ekaḥ api hutvā bahudhā hoti iti ādikam iddhi vikubbanam kātu kāmena ādikammikena yoginā odāta kasiṇa pariyantesu aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu aṭṭha aṭṭha samāpattiyaḥ nibbattetvā

original: Kasiṇānulomato, kasiṇapaṭilomato, kasiṇānulomapaṭilomato, jhānānulomato, jhānapaṭilomato,

original: jhānānulomapaṭilomato, jhānukkantikato, kasiṇukkantikato, jhānakasiṇukkantikato,
analyzed: jhāna anuloma paṭilomataḥ jhānukkantikataḥ kasiṇukkantikataḥ jhāna kasiṇukkantikataḥ

original: aṅgasaṅkantito, ārammaṇasaṅkantito, aṅgārammaṇasaṅkantito, aṅgavavatthāpanato, ārammaṇavavatthāpanatoti.
analyzed: aṅga saṅkantitaḥ ārammaṇa saṅkantitaḥ aṅga ārammaṇa saṅkantitaḥ aṅga vavatthāpanataḥ ārammaṇa vavatthāpanato ti

original: Imehi cuddasahi ākārehi cittaṃ paridametabbaṃ.
analyzed: imehi cuddasahi ākārehi cittam paridametabbam

original: 366. Katamaṃ panettha kasiṇānulomaṃ…pe… katamaṃ ārammaṇavavatthāpananti. Idha bhikkhu
analyzed: katamam pana ittha katamam ārammaṇa vavatthāpanam ti idha bhikkhu

original: pathavīkasiṇe jhānaṃ samāpajjati, tato āpokasiṇeti evaṃ paṭipāṭiyā aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu
analyzed: pathavī kasiṇe jhānam samāpajjati tatas āpaḥ kasiṇā iti evam paṭipāṭiyā aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu

original: satakkhattumpi sahassakkhattumpi samāpajjati, idaṃ kasiṇānulomaṃ nāma.
analyzed: sata khattum pi sahassa khattum pi samāpajjati idam kasiṇānulomam nāma

original: Odātakasiṇato pana paṭṭhāya tatheva paṭilomakkamena samāpajjanaṃ kasiṇapaṭilomaṃ nāma.
analyzed: odāta kasiṇataḥ pana paṭṭhāya tathā iva paṭiloma kkamena samāpajjanam kasiṇapaṭilomam nāma

original: Pathavīkasiṇato paṭṭhāya yāva odātakasiṇaṃ, odātakasiṇatopi paṭṭhāya yāva pathavīkasiṇanti evaṃ anulomapaṭilomavasena punappunaṃ samāpajjanaṃ kasiṇānulomapaṭilomaṃ nāma.
analyzed: pathavī kasiṇataḥ paṭṭhāya yāva odāta kasiṇaṃ odāta kasiṇataḥ pi paṭṭhāya yāva pathavī kasiṇanti evam anuloma paṭiloma vasena punappunam samāpajjanam kasiṇānulomapaṭilomam nāma

original: Paṭhamajjhānato pana paṭṭhāya paṭipāṭiyā yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ, tāva punappunaṃ samāpajjanaṃ jhānānulomaṃ nāma.

original: Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanato paṭṭhāya yāva paṭhamajjhānaṃ, tāva punappunaṃ samāpajjanaṃ jhānapaṭilomaṃ nāma.
analyzed: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanataḥ paṭṭhāya yāva paṭhamajjhānam tāva punappunam samāpajjanam jhānapaṭilomam nāma

original: Paṭhamajjhānato paṭṭhāya yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanato paṭṭhāya
analyzed: paṭhamajjhānataḥ paṭṭhāya yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanam nevasaññānāsaññāyatanataḥ paṭṭhāya

original: yāva paṭhamajjhānanti evaṃ anulomapaṭilomavasena punappunaṃ samāpajjanaṃ jhānānulomapaṭilomaṃ nāma.
analyzed: yāva paṭhama jhānan ti evam anuloma paṭiloma vasena punappunam samāpajjanam jhāna anulomapaṭilomam nāma

original: Pathavīkasiṇe pana paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tattheva tatiyaṃ samāpajjati, tato
analyzed: pathavī kasiṇe pana paṭhamam jhānam samāpajjitvā tattha iva tatiyam samāpajjati tatas

original: tadeva ugghāṭetvā ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ, tato ākiñcaññāyatananti evaṃ kasiṇaṃ anukkamitvā
analyzed: tat eva ugghāṭetvā ākāsa ānañca āyatanam tatas ākiñcaññāyatanam ti evam kasiṇam an ukkamitvā

original: jhānasseva ekantarikabhāvena ukkamanaṃ jhānukkantikaṃ nāma. Evaṃ āpokasiṇādimūlikāpi yojanā kātabbā.

analyzed: pathavī kasiṇe paṭhamam jhānam samāpajjitvā puna tat eva tejaḥ kasiṇe tatas nīla kasiṇe

original: tato lohitakasiṇeti iminā nayena jhānaṃ anukkamitvā kasiṇasseva ekantarikabhāvena
analyzed: tatas lohitakasiṇa iti iminā nayena jhānam an ukkamitvā kasiṇassa iva ekantarika bhāvena

original: ukkamanaṃ kasiṇukkantikaṃ nāma.
analyzed: ukkamanam kasiṇukkantikam nāma

original: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato tejokasiṇe tatiyaṃ, nīlakasiṇaṃ ugghāṭetvā
analyzed: pathavī kasiṇe paṭhamam jhānam samāpajjitvā tatas tejaḥ kasiṇe tatiyam nīla kasiṇam ugghāṭetvā

analyzed: ākāsānañcāyatanam lohitakasiṇato ākiñcaññāyatanan ti iminā nayena jhānassa ca iva kasiṇassa

analyzed: ca ukkamanam jhānakasiṇukkantikam nāma

original: Pathavīkasiṇe pana paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tattheva itaresampi samāpajjanaṃ aṅgasaṅkantikaṃ nāma.
analyzed: pathavī kasiṇe pana paṭhamam jhānam samāpajjitvā tattha eva itaresam pi samāpajjanam aṅgasaṅkantikam nāma

original: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tadeva āpokasiṇe…pe… tadeva odātakasiṇeti evaṃ sabbakasiṇesu ekasseva jhānassa samāpajjanaṃ ārammaṇasaṅkantikaṃ nāma.

original: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā āpokasiṇe dutiyaṃ, tejokasiṇe tatiyaṃ,

analyzed: eke icchanti aṭṭhakathāsu pana anāgata ttā addhā tam bhāvanā mukham na hoti

analyzed: kasiṇa parikammam pi bhāraḥ satesu sahassesu vā ekaḥ iva sakkoti kata kasiṇa parikammassa

original: nimittuppādanaṃ bhāro, satesu sahassesu vā ekova sakkoti. Uppanne nimitte taṃ vaḍḍhetvā

original: appanādhigamo bhāro, satesu sahassesu vā ekova sakkoti. Adhigatappanassa cuddasahākārehi

original: khippanisantibhāvo nāma bhāro, satesu sahassesu vā ekova khippanisantī hoti. Therambatthale

original: mahārohaṇaguttattherassa gilānupaṭṭhānaṃ āgatesu tiṃsamattesu iddhimantasahassesu

original: upasampadāya aṭṭhavassiko rakkhitatthero viya. Tassānubhāvo pathavīkasiṇaniddese

original: vuttoyeva. Taṃ panassānubhāvaṃ disvā thero āha “āvuso, sace rakkhito nābhavissa sabbe
analyzed: vuttaḥ yā iva tam panassa anubhāvam disvā theraḥ āha āvuso sace rakkhito na abhavissa sabbe

original: garahappattā assāma ‘nāgarājānaṃ rakkhituṃ nāsakkhiṃsū’ti. Tasmā attanā gahetvā vicaritabbaṃ
analyzed: garaha ppattāḥ assāma nāga rājānam rakkhitum na asakkhiṃsu iti tasmai attanā gahetvā vicaritabbam

original: āvudhaṃ nāma malaṃ sodhetvāva gahetvā vicarituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Te therassa ovāde ṭhatvā
analyzed: āvudham nāma malam sodhetvā ava gahetvā vicaritum vaṭṭati iti te therassa ovāde ṭhatvā

original: tiṃsasahassāpi bhikkhū khippanisantino ahesuṃ.
analyzed: tiṃsa sahassā api bhikkhū khippa nisantinaḥ ahesuṃ

original: Khippanisantiyāpi ca sati parassa patiṭṭhābhāvo bhāro, satesu sahassesu vā ekova
analyzed: khippa nisantiyā api ca sati parassa patiṭṭhā bhāvaḥ bhāro satesu sahassesu vā ekaḥ uva

original: hoti, giribhaṇḍavāhanapūjāya mārena aṅgāravasse pavattite ākāse pathaviṃ māpetvā
analyzed: hoti giribhaṇḍa vāhana pūjāya mārena aṅgāra vasse pavattite ākāse pathavim māpetvā

original: aṅgāravassaparittārako thero viya.
analyzed: aṅgāra vassa parittārakaḥ theraḥ viya

original: Balavapubbayogānaṃ pana buddhapaccekabuddhaaggasāvakādīnaṃ vināpi iminā vuttappakārena
analyzed: balava pubba yogānam pana buddha paccekabuddha aggasāvaka ādīnam vinā api iminā vutta ppakārena

original: bhāvanānukkamena arahattapaṭilābheneva idañca iddhivikubbanaṃ aññe ca paṭisambhidādibhedā
analyzed: bhāvanā anukkamena arahatta paṭilābhena iva idam ca iddhi vikubbanam aññe ca paṭisambhidā ādi bhedā

original: guṇā ijjhanti. Tasmā yathā piḷandhanavikatiṃ kattukāmo suvaṇṇakāro aggidhamanādīhi
analyzed: guṇāḥ ijjhanti tasmai yathā piḷandhana vikatim kattu kāmaḥ suvaṇṇakāraḥ aggi dhamana ādīhi

original: suvaṇṇaṃ muduṃ kammaññaṃ katvāva karoti, yathā ca bhājanavikatiṃ kattukāmo kumbhakāro
analyzed: suvaṇṇam mudum kammaññam katvā ava karoti yathā ca bhājana vikatim kattu kāmaḥ kumbhakāraḥ

original: mattikaṃ suparimadditaṃ muduṃ katvā karoti, evameva ādikammikena imehi cuddasahākārehi
analyzed: mattikam su parimadditam mudum katvā karoti evam eva ādikammikena imehi cuddasahā ākārehi

original: cittaṃ paridametvā chandasīsacittasīsavīriyasīsavīmaṃsāsīsasamāpajjanavasena ceva
analyzed: cittam ca iva

original: āvajjanādivasībhāvavasena ca muduṃ kammaññaṃ katvā iddhividhāya yogo karaṇīyo. Pubbahetusampannena
analyzed: āvajjana ādivasībhāva vasena ca mudum kammaññam katvā iddhi vidhāya yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ pubba hetu sampannena

original: pana kasiṇesu catutthajjhānamatte ciṇṇavasināpi kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Yathā panettha yogo
analyzed: pana kasiṇesu catuttha jhāna matte kātum vaṭṭati yathā pana ittha yogo

original: kātabbo, taṃ vidhiṃ dassento bhagavā “so evaṃ samāhite citte”tiādimāha.
analyzed: kātabbaḥ tam vidhim dassentaḥ bhagavā saḥ evam samāhite citta iti ādim āha

original: 368. Tatrāyaṃ pāḷinayānusāreneva vinicchayakathā. Tattha soti so adhigatacatutthajjhāno
analyzed: tatra ayam pāḷi naya anusārena iva vinicchaya kathā tattha saḥ ti saḥ adhigata catuttha jhāno

original: yogī. Evanti catutthajjhānakkamanidassanametaṃ. Iminā paṭhamajjhānādhigamādinā kamena
analyzed: yogī evanti catuttha jhāna kkama nidassanam etam iminā paṭhama jhāna adhigama ādinā kamena

original: catutthajjhānaṃ paṭilabhitvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Samāhiteti iminā catutthajjhānasamādhinā
analyzed: catuttha jhānam paṭilabhitvā iti vuttam hoti samāhita iti iminā catuttha jhāna samādhinā

original: samāhite. Citteti rūpāvacaracitte. Parisuddhetiādīsu pana upekkhāsatipārisuddhibhāvena
analyzed: samāhite citta iti rūpāvacara citte parisuddha iti ādīsu pana upekkhā sati pārisuddhi bhāvena

original: parisuddhe. Parisuddhattāyeva pariyodāte, pabhassareti vuttaṃ hoti. Sukhādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ

analyzed: santikam pana gahetvā kaḥ dūram akāsi iti bhagavā bhagavā hi attanaḥ ca aṅguli mālassa ca antaram santikam pi dūram akāsi iti

original: Illisaseṭṭhivatthusmiṃ pana mahāmoggallānatthero thokaṃ bahukamakāsi, kākavaliyavatthusmiñca

original: evaṃ antarantarāsu jātīsu na sajjati, na virajjhati, asajjamānaṃ avirajjhamānaṃ icchiticchitaṭṭhānaṃyeva gaṇhāti.
analyzed: evam antar antarāsu jātīsu na sajjati na virajjhati a sajjamānam a virajjhamānam icchiticchita ṭṭhānaṃ yeva gaṇhāti

original: Imesu ca pana pubbenivāsaṃ anussaraṇasattesu titthiyānaṃ pubbenivāsadassanaṃ khajjupanakapabhāsadisaṃ
analyzed: imesu ca pana pubbenivāsam anussaraṇa sattesu titthiyānam pubbenivāsa dassanam khajju panaka pabhā sadisam

original: hutvā upaṭṭhāti. Pakatisāvakānaṃ dīpappabhāsadisaṃ. Mahāsāvakānaṃ ukkāpabhāsadisaṃ.
analyzed: hutvā upaṭṭhāti pakati sāvakānam dīpa ppabhā sadisam mahāsāvakānam ukkā pabhā sadisam

original: Aggasāvakānaṃ osadhitārakappabhāsadisaṃ. Paccekabuddhānaṃ candappabhāsadisaṃ. Buddhānaṃ
analyzed: agga sāvakānam osadhi tāraka ppabhā sadisam paccekabuddhānam canda ppabhā sadisam buddhānam

original: rasmisahassapaṭimaṇḍitasaradasūriyamaṇḍalasadisaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
analyzed: rasmi sahassa paṭimaṇḍita sarada sūriya maṇḍala sadisam hutvā upaṭṭhāti

original: Titthiyānañca pubbenivāsānussaraṇaṃ andhānaṃ yaṭṭhikoṭigamanaṃ viya hoti. Pakatisāvakānaṃ
analyzed: titthiyānam ca pubbenivāsa anussaraṇam andhānam yaṭṭhi koṭi gamanam viya hoti pakati sāvakānam

original: daṇḍakasetugamanaṃ viya. Mahāsāvakānaṃ jaṅghasetugamanaṃ viya. Aggasāvakānaṃ sakaṭasetugamanaṃ
analyzed: daṇḍaka setu gamanam viya mahā sāvakānam jaṅgha setu gamanam viya agga sāvakānam sakaṭa setu gamanam

original: viya. Paccekabuddhānaṃ mahājaṅghamaggagamanaṃ viya. Buddhānaṃ mahāsakaṭamaggagamanaṃ viya.
analyzed: viya paccekabuddhānam mahājaṅgha magga gamanam viya buddhānam mahā sakaṭa magga gamanam viya

original: Imasmiṃ pana adhikāre sāvakānaṃ pubbenivāsānussaraṇaṃ adhippetaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “anussaratīti khandhapaṭipāṭivasena cutipaṭisandhivasena vā anugantvā anugantvā saratī”ti.
analyzed: imasmin pana adhikāre sāvakānam pubbenivāsa anussaraṇam adhippetam tena vuttam anussarati iti khandha paṭipāṭi vasena cuti paṭisandhi vasena vā anugantvā anugantvā sarati iti

original: 403. Tasmā evamanussaritukāmena ādikammikena bhikkhunā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantena
analyzed: tasmai evam anussaritu kāmena ādikammikena bhikkhunā pacchābhattam piṇḍapāta paṭikkantena

original: vuṭṭhāya sabbapacchimā nisajjā āvajjitabbā. Tato āsanapaññāpanaṃ, senāsanappavesanaṃ,

analyzed: sakalam rattindivam kata kiccam āvajjitabbam ettakam pana pakati cittassa api pākaṭam

original: hoti. Parikammasamādhicittassa pana atipākaṭameva.
analyzed: hoti parikamma samādhi cittassa pana ati pākaṭam eva

original: Sace panettha kiñci na pākaṭaṃ hoti, puna pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya āvajjitabbaṃ.
analyzed: sace pana ittha kiñci na pākaṭam hoti puna pādakajjhānam samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya āvajjitabbam

original: Ettakena dīpe jalite viya pākaṭaṃ hoti. Evaṃ paṭilomakkameneva dutiyadivasepi tatiyacatutthapañcamadivasepi
analyzed: ettakena dīpe jalite viya pākaṭam hoti evam paṭiloma kkamena iva dutiya divase pi tatiya catuttha pañcama divase pi

original: purimabhave cutikkhaṇe pavattitanāmarūpaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ. Pahoti hi paṇḍito bhikkhu

original: ugghāṭetvā cutikkhaṇe pavattitanāmarūpamārammaṇaṃ kātu”nti dhuranikkhepo na kātabbo.

analyzed: ṭhānam āvajjitabbam

analyzed: pubbenivāsam anussarati iti

original: Buddhakhettaṃ nāma tividhaṃ hoti – jātikhettaṃ, āṇākhettaṃ, visayakhettañca. Tattha

original: sabbepi brahmaloke nibbattantīti.
analyzed: sabbe api brahma loke nibbattanti iti

original: Vassūpacchedato pana uddhaṃ dīghassa addhuno accayena dutiyo sūriyo pātubhavati.

original: Vuttampi cetaṃ bhagavatā “hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo”ti sattasūriyaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.

original: Pātubhūte ca pana tasmiṃ neva rattiparicchedo, na divāparicchedo paññāyati. Eko sūriyo

original: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena tatiyo sūriyo pātubhavati. Yassa pātubhāvā mahānadiyopi sussanti.

original: nāma aññaṃ natthi. Yathāha “nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ

original: evaṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ, yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, micchādiṭṭhi. Micchādiṭṭhiparamāni, bhikkhave, vajjānī”ti.
analyzed: evam mahā sāvajjam yathayidam bhikkhave micchādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhi paramāni bhikkhave vajjāni iti

original: Kāyassa bhedāti upādiṇṇakkhandhapariccāgā. Parammaraṇāti tadanantaraṃ abhinibbattikkhandhaggahaṇe.
analyzed: kāyassa bhedā ati upādiṇṇa kkhandha pariccāgā parammaraṇā ti tad anantaram abhinibbatti kkhandha ggahaṇe

original: Atha vā kāyassa bhedāti jīvitindriyassa upacchedā. Parammaraṇāti cuticittato uddhaṃ.
analyzed: atha vā kāyassa bhedā ati jīvitindriyassa upacchedā parammaraṇā ati cuti cittataḥ

original: Apāyanti evamādi sabbaṃ nirayavevacanameva.
analyzed: apāyanti evamādi sabbam niraya vevacanam eva

original: Nirayo hi saggamokkhahetubhūtā puññasammatā ayā apetattā, sukhānaṃ vā āyassa abhāvā
analyzed: nirayaḥ hi saggamokkha hetu bhūtā puñña sammatā ayā apeta ttā sukhānam vā āyassa abhāvā

original: apāyo. Dukkhassa gati paṭisaraṇanti duggati, dosabahulatāya vā duṭṭhena kammunā nibbattā
analyzed: apāyaḥ dukkhassa gati paṭisaraṇanti duggati dosa bahula tāya vā duṭṭhena kammunā nibbattā

original: gatīti duggati. Vivasā nipatanti ettha dukkaṭakārinoti vinipāto. Vinassantā vā ettha
analyzed: gati iti duggati vivasāḥ nipatanti ettha dukkaṭa kārinaḥ ti vinipātaḥ vinassantā vā ettha

original: patanti saṃbhijjamānaṅgapaccaṅgātipi vinipāto. Natthi ettha assādasaññito ayoti nirayo.
analyzed: patanti vinipātaḥ na atthi ettha assāda saññitaḥ ayaḥ ti nirayaḥ

original: Atha vā apāyaggahaṇena tiracchānayoniṃ dīpeti. Tiracchānayoni hi apāyo sugatito apetattā,
analyzed: atha vā apāya ggahaṇena tiracchānayonim dīpeti tiracchānayoni hi apāyaḥ sugatitaḥ apeta tā

original: na duggati mahesakkhānaṃ nāgarājādīnaṃ sambhavato. Duggatiggahaṇena pettivisayaṃ.
analyzed: na duggati mahesakkhānam nāga rāja ādīnam sambhavataḥ duggati ggahaṇena petti visayam

original: So hi apāyo ceva duggati ca, sugatito apetattā dukkhassa ca gatibhūtattā. Na tu vinipāto
analyzed: saḥ hi apāyaḥ ca iva duggati ca sugatitaḥ apeta ttā dukkhassa ca gati bhūta ttā na tu vinipātaḥ

original: asurasadisaṃ avinipatitattā. Vinipātaggahaṇena asurakāyaṃ. So hi yathāvuttena atthena
analyzed: asura sadisam a vinipatita ttā vinipāta ggahaṇena asura kāyam saḥ hi yathāvuttena atthena

original: apāyo ceva duggati ca sabbasamussayehi ca vinipatitattā vinipātoti vuccati. Nirayaggahaṇena
analyzed: apāyo ca iva duggati ca sabba samussayehi ca vinipatita ttā vinipāto ti vuccati niraya ggahaṇena

original: avīciādianekappakāraṃ nirayamevāti. Upapannāti upagatā, tattha abhinibbattāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: avīci ādi aneka ppakāram nirayam eva ati upapannā ati upagatā tattha abhinibbattā ati adhippāyaḥ

original: Vuttavipariyāyena sukkapakkho veditabbo.
analyzed: vutta vipariyāyena sukkapakkhaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: Ayaṃ pana viseso, tattha sugatiggahaṇena manussagatipi saṅgayhati. Saggaggahaṇena
analyzed: ayam pana visesaḥ tattha sugati ggahaṇena manussa gati pi saṅgayhati sagga ggahaṇena

original: devagatiyeva. Tattha sundarā gatīti sugati. Rūpādīhi visayehi suṭṭhu aggoti saggo.
analyzed: deva gatiyā iva tattha sundarā gatī iti sugati rūpa ādīhi visayehi suṭṭhu aggo ti saggo

original: So sabbopi lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti ayaṃ vacanattho.
analyzed: so sabbaḥ api lujjana palujjana ṭṭhena loko ti ayam vacana atthaḥ

original: “Iti dibbena cakkhunā”tiādi sabbaṃ nigamanavacanaṃ. Evaṃ dibbena cakkhunā…pe… passatīti ayamettha saṅkhepattho.
analyzed: iti dibbena cakkhunā atiādi sabbam nigamana vacanam evam dibbena cakkhunā āpe passati iti ayam ettha saṅkhepa attho

original: 412. Evaṃ passitukāmena pana ādikammikena kulaputtena kasiṇārammaṇaṃ abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ
analyzed: evam passitu kāmena pana ādikammikena kula puttena kasiṇa ārammaṇam abhiññā pādaka jjhānam

original: sabbākārena abhinīhārakkhamaṃ katvā “tejokasiṇaṃ, odātakasiṇaṃ, ālokakasiṇa”nti imesu
analyzed: sabba ākārena abhinīhāra khamam katvā tejaḥ kasiṇam odāta kasiṇam āloka kasiṇanti imesu

original: tīsu kasiṇesu aññataraṃ āsannaṃ kātabbaṃ. Upacārajjhānagocaraṃ katvā vaḍḍhetvā ṭhapetabbaṃ.
analyzed: tīsu kasiṇesu aññataram āsannam kātabbam upacāra jhāna gocaram katvā vaḍḍhetvā ṭhapetabbam

original: Na tattha appanā uppādetabbāti adhippāyo. Sace hi uppādeti, pādakajjhānanissayaṃ
analyzed: na tattha appanā uppādetabbā ti adhippāyaḥ sace hi uppādeti pādaka jhāna nissayam

original: hoti, na parikammanissayaṃ. Imesu ca pana tīsu ālokakasiṇaṃyeva seṭṭhataraṃ. Tasmā
analyzed: hoti na parikamma nissayam imesu ca pana tīsu āloka kasiṇaṃ yeva seṭṭhataram tasmā

original: taṃ vā itaresaṃ vā aññataraṃ kasiṇaniddese vuttanayena uppādetvā upacārabhūmiyaṃyeva
analyzed: tam vā itaresam vā aññataram kasiṇa niddese vutta nayena uppādetvā upacāra bhūmiyaṃyeva

original: ṭhatvā vaḍḍhetabbaṃ. Vaḍḍhanānayopi cassa tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
analyzed: ṭhatvā vaḍḍhetabbam vaḍḍhanā nayaḥ api ca ssa tattha vutta nayena iva veditabbaḥ

original: Vaḍḍhitaṭṭhānassa antoyeva rūpagataṃ passitabbaṃ. Rūpagataṃ passato panassa parikammassa
analyzed: vaḍḍhita ṭṭhānassa antoyeva rūpa gatam passitabbam rūpa gatam passato panassa parikammassa

original: vāro atikkamati. Tato āloko antaradhāyati. Tasmiṃ antarahite rūpagatampi na dissati.
analyzed: vāraḥ atikkamati tatas ālokaḥ antaradhāyati tasmin antarahite rūpa gatam pi na dissati

original: Athānena punappunaṃ pādakajjhānameva pavisitvā tato vuṭṭhāya āloko pharitabbo. Evaṃ
analyzed: atha anena punappunam pādakajjhānam eva pavisitvā tatas vuṭṭhāya āloko pharitabbo evam

original: anukkamena āloko thāmagato hotīti ettha āloko hotūti yattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ paricchindati,
analyzed: anukkamena āloko thāma gataḥ hoti iti ettha ālokaḥ hotu uti yattakam ṭhānam paricchindati

original: tattha āloko tiṭṭhatiyeva. Divasampi nisīditvā passato rūpadassanaṃ hoti. Rattiṃ
analyzed: tattha āloko tiṭṭhatiyā iva divasam pi nisīditvā passataḥ rūpa dassanam hoti rattim

original: tiṇukkāya maggapaṭipanno cettha puriso opammaṃ.
analyzed: tiṇukkāya magga paṭipanno ca ittha puriso opammaṃ

original: Eko kira rattiṃ tiṇukkāya maggaṃ paṭipajji. Tassa sā tiṇukkā vijjhāyi. Athassa samavisamāni
analyzed: ekaḥ kira rattim tiṇukkāya maggam paṭipajji tassa sā tiṇukkā vijjhāyi athassa sama visamāni

original: na paññāyiṃsu. So taṃ tiṇukkaṃ bhūmiyaṃ ghaṃsitvā tiṇukkā puna ujjālesi. Sā pajjalitvā
analyzed: na paññāyiṃsu saḥ tam tiṇukkam bhūmiyam ghaṃsitvā tiṇukkā punar ujjālesi sā pajjalitvā

original: purimālokato mahantataraṃ ālokaṃ akāsi. Evaṃ punappunaṃ vijjhātaṃ ujjālayato kamena
analyzed: purima ālokataḥ mahantataram ālokam akāsi evam punappunam vijjhātam ujjālayataḥ kamena

original: sūriyo uṭṭhāsi. Sūriye uṭṭhite ukkāya kammaṃ natthīti taṃ chaḍḍetvā divasampi agamāsi.
analyzed: sūriyaḥ uṭṭhāsi sūriye uṭṭhite ukkāya kammam natthi iti tam chaḍḍetvā divasam pi agamāsi

original: Tattha ukkāloko viya parikammakāle kasiṇāloko. Ukkāya vijjhātāya samavisamānaṃ adassanaṃ
analyzed: tattha ukka ālokaḥ viya parikamma kāle kasiṇa ālokaḥ ukkāya vijjhātāya sama visamānam adassanam

original: viya rūpagataṃ passato parikammassa vārātikkamena āloke antarahite rūpagatānaṃ adassanaṃ.
analyzed: viya rūpa gatam passataḥ parikammassa vāra atikkamena āloke antarahite rūpa gatānam adassanam

original: Ukkāya ghaṃsanaṃ viya punappunaṃ pavesanaṃ. Ukkāya purimālokato mahantatarālokakaraṇaṃ
analyzed: ukkāya ghaṃsanam viya punappunam pavesanam ukkāya purima ālokataḥ mahantatara āloka karaṇam

original: viya puna parikammaṃ karoto balavatarālokapharaṇaṃ. Sūriyuṭṭhānaṃ viya thāmagatālokassa
analyzed: viya puna parikammam karotaḥ balavatara āloka pharaṇam sūriyuṭṭhānam viya thāma gata ālokassa

original: yathāparicchedena ṭhānaṃ. Tiṇukkaṃ chaḍḍetvā divasampi gamanaṃ viya parittālokaṃ
analyzed: yathā paricchedena ṭhānam tiṇukkam chaḍḍetvā divasam pi gamanam viya paritta ālokam

original: chaḍḍetvā thāmagatenālokena divasampi rūpadassanaṃ.
analyzed: chaḍḍetvā thāma gatena ālokena divasam pi rūpa dassanam

original: Tattha yadā tassa bhikkhuno maṃsacakkhussa anāpāthagataṃ antokucchigataṃ hadayavatthunissitaṃ
analyzed: tattha yadā tassa bhikkhuno maṃsa cakkhussa anāpātha gatam antar kucchi gatam hadaya vatthu nissitam

original: heṭṭhāpathavītalanissitaṃ tirokuṭṭapabbatapākāragataṃ paracakkavāḷagatanti idaṃ rūpaṃ
analyzed: heṭṭhā pathavī tala nissitam tiro kuṭṭa pabbata pākāra gatam para cakkavāḷa gatam idam rūpam

original: ñāṇacakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgacchati, maṃsacakkhunā dissamānaṃ viya hoti, tadā dibbacakkhu
analyzed: ñāṇa cakkhussa āpātham āgacchati maṃsa cakkhunā dissamānam viya hoti tadā dibba cakkhu

original: uppannaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ. Tadeva cettha rūpadassanasamatthaṃ, na pubbabhāgacittāni.
analyzed: uppannam hoti iti veditabbam tat eva ca ittha rūpa dassana samattham na pubbabhāga cittāni

original: Taṃ panetaṃ puthujjanassa paribandho hoti. Kasmā? So hi yasmā yattha yattha āloko
analyzed: tam pana itam puthujjanassa paribandho hoti kasmā saḥ hi yasmā yattha yattha āloko

original: hotūti adhiṭṭhāti, taṃ taṃ pathavīsamuddapabbate vinivijjhitvāpi ekālokaṃ hoti, athassa
analyzed: hotu uti adhiṭṭhāti tam tam pathavī samudda pabbate vinivijjhitvā api ekālokam hoti athassa

original: tattha bhayānakāni yakkharakkhasādirūpāni passato bhayaṃ uppajjati. Yena cittavikkhepaṃ
analyzed: tattha bhayānakāni yakkha rakkhasa ādi rūpāni passataḥ bhayam uppajjati yena citta vikkhepam

original: patvā jhānavibbhantako hoti, tasmā rūpadassane appamattena bhavitabbaṃ.
analyzed: patvā jhāna vibbhantakaḥ hoti tasmā rūpa dassane appamattena bhavitabbam

original: Tatrāyaṃ dibbacakkhuno uppattikkamo. Vuttappakārametaṃ rūpamārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjane
analyzed: tatra ayam dibba cakkhuno uppatti kkamaḥ vutta ppakāram etam rūpam ārammaṇam katvā manaḥ dvāra āvajjane

original: uppajjitvā niruddhe tadeva rūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā cattāri pañca vā javanāni uppajjantīti
analyzed: uppajjitvā niruddhe tat eva rūpam ārammaṇam katvā cattāri pañca vā javanāni uppajjanti iti

original: sabbaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Idhāpi pubbabhāgacittāni savitakkasavicārāni kāmāvacarāni.
analyzed: sabbam purima nayena iva veditabbam idha api pubbabhāga cittāni sa vitakka sa vicārāni kāmāvacarāni

original: Pariyosāne atthasādhakacittaṃ catutthajjhānikaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ. Tena sahajātaṃ ñāṇaṃ
analyzed: pariyosāne attha sādhaka cittam catuttha jhānikam rūpa avacaram tena sahajātam ñāṇam

original: sattānaṃ cutūpapāte ñāṇantipi dibbacakkhuñāṇantipi vuccatīti.
analyzed: sattānam cutūpapāte ñāṇam tipi dibba cakkhu ñāṇam tipi vuccati iti

original: Cutūpapātañāṇakathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: cutūpapāta ñāṇa kathā niṭṭhitā

original: Pakiṇṇakakathā
analyzed: pakiṇṇaka kathā

original: Iti pañcakkhandhavidū, pañca abhiññā avoca yā nātho;
analyzed: iti pañcakkhandha vidū pañca abhiññāḥ avoca yāḥ nātho

original: Tā ñatvā tāsu ayaṃ, pakiṇṇakakathāpi viññeyyā.
analyzed: tāḥ ñatvā tāsu ayam pakiṇṇaka kathā api viññeyyā

original: Etāsu hi yadetaṃ cutūpapātañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ dibbacakkhu, tassa anāgataṃsañāṇañca yathākammupagañāṇañcāti
analyzed: etāsu hi yat etam cutu upapāta ñāṇa saṅkhātam dibba cakkhu tassa anāgataṃsa ñāṇañca yathā kammupaga ñāṇañca ati

original: dvepi paribhaṇḍañāṇāni honti. Iti imāni ca dve iddhividhādīni ca pañcāti satta abhiññāñāṇāni
analyzed: dve api paribhaṇḍañāṇāni honti iti imāni ca dve iddhividha ādīni ca pañca ati satta abhiññāñāṇāni

original: idhāgatāni. Idāni tesaṃ ārammaṇavibhāge asammohatthaṃ –
analyzed: idha āgatāni idāni tesam ārammaṇa vibhāge asammoha attham

original: Ārammaṇattikā vuttā, ye cattāro mahesinā;
analyzed: ārammaṇattikāḥ vuttāḥ ye cattāro mahesinā

original: Sattannamapi ñāṇānaṃ, pavattiṃ tesu dīpaye.
analyzed: sattannam api ñāṇānam pavattim tesu dīpaye

original: Tatrāyaṃ dīpanā. Cattāro hi ārammaṇattikā mahesinā vuttā. Katame cattāro? Parittārammaṇattiko, maggārammaṇattiko, atītārammaṇattiko, ajjhattārammaṇattikoti.
analyzed: tatra ayam dīpanā cattāraḥ hi ārammaṇa attikāḥ mahesinā vuttā katame cattāro paritta ārammaṇa attikaḥ magga ārammaṇa attikaḥ atīta ārammaṇa attikaḥ ajjhatta ārammaṇa attikaḥ ti

original: 414. Tattha iddhividhañāṇaṃ parittamahaggataatītānāgatapaccuppannaajjhattabahiddhārammaṇavasena
analyzed: tattha iddhividha ñāṇam paritta mahaggata atīta anāgata paccuppanna ajjhatta bahiddha ārammaṇa vasena

original: sattasu ārammaṇesu pavattati. Kathaṃ? Tañhi yadā kāyaṃ cittasannissitaṃ katvā adissamānena
analyzed: sattasu ārammaṇesu pavattati katham tat hi yadā kāyam citta sannissitam katvā a dissamānena

original: kāyena gantukāmo cittavasena kāyaṃ pariṇāmeti, mahaggatacitte samodahati samāropeti,
analyzed: kāyena gantu kāmaḥ citta vasena kāyam pariṇāmeti mahaggata citte samodahati samāropeti

original: tadā upayogaladdhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hotīti katvā rūpakāyārammaṇato parittārammaṇaṃ hoti.
analyzed: tadā upayoga laddham ārammaṇam hoti iti katvā rūpa kāya ārammaṇataḥ paritta ārammaṇam hoti

original: Yadā cittaṃ kāyasannissitaṃ katvā dissamānena kāyena gantukāmo kāyavasena cittaṃ
analyzed: yadā cittam kāya sannissitam katvā dissamānena kāyena gantu kāmaḥ kāya vasena cittam

original: pariṇāmeti, pādakajjhānacittaṃ rūpakāye samodahati samāropeti, tadā upayogaladdhaṃ
analyzed: pariṇāma iti pādaka jjhāna cittam rūpa kāye samodahati samāropeti tadā upayoga laddham

original: ārammaṇaṃ hotīti katvā mahaggatacittārammaṇato mahaggatārammaṇaṃ hoti.
analyzed: ārammaṇam hoti iti katvā mahaggata citta ārammaṇataḥ mahaggata ārammaṇam hoti

original: Yasmā pana tadeva cittaṃ atītaṃ niruddhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti, tasmā atītārammaṇaṃ hoti.
analyzed: yasmai pana tat eva cittam atītam niruddham ārammaṇam karoti tasmai atīta ārammaṇam hoti

original: Mahādhātunidhāne mahākassapattherādīnaṃ viya anāgataṃ adhiṭṭhahantānaṃ anāgatārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: mahādhātu nidhāne mahākassapatthera ādīnam viya anāgatam adhiṭṭhahantānam anāgata ārammaṇam

original: hoti. Mahākassapatthero kira mahādhātunidhānaṃ karonto “anāgate aṭṭhārasavassādhikāni
analyzed: hoti mahākassapa thero kira mahā dhātu nidhānam karontaḥ anāgate aṭṭhārasa vassa adhikāni

original: dvevassasatāni ime gandhā mā sussiṃsu, pupphāni mā milāyiṃsu, dīpā mā nibbāyiṃsū”ti
analyzed: dve vassa satāni ime gandhāḥ mā sussiṃsu pupphāni mā milāyiṃsu dīpāḥ mā nibbāyiṃsu iti

original: adhiṭṭhahi. Sabbaṃ tatheva ahosi. Assaguttatthero vattaniyasenāsane bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
analyzed: adhiṭṭhahi sabbam tathā iva ahosi assagutta thero vattaniya senāsane bhikkhu saṅgham

original: sukkhabhattaṃ bhuñjamānaṃ disvā udakasoṇḍiṃ divase divase purebhatte dadhirasaṃ hotūti
analyzed: sukkhabhattam bhuñjamānam disvā udaka soṇḍim divase divase purebhatte dadhi rasam hotu uti

original: adhiṭṭhāsi. Purebhatte gahitaṃ dadhirasaṃ hoti. Pacchābhatte pākatikaudakameva. Kāyaṃ
analyzed: purebhatte gahitam dadhi rasam hoti pacchābhatte pākatika audakam eva kāyam

original: pana cittasannissitaṃ katvā adissamānena kāyena gamanakāle paccuppannārammaṇaṃ hoti.
analyzed: pana citta sannissitam katvā a dissamānena kāyena gamana kāle paccuppanna ārammaṇam hoti

original: Kāyavasena cittaṃ, cittavasena vā kāyaṃ pariṇāmanakāle attano kumārakavaṇṇādinimmānakāle
analyzed: kāya vasena cittam citta vasena vā kāyam pariṇāmana kāle kumāraka vaṇṇa ādi nimmāna kāle

original: ca sakāyacittānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇato ajjhattārammaṇaṃ hoti. Bahiddhā hatthiassādidassanakāle
analyzed: ca sa kāya cittānam ārammaṇa karaṇataḥ ajjhatta ārammaṇam hoti bahiddhā hatthi assa ādi dassana kāle

original: pana bahiddhārammaṇanti evaṃ tāva iddhividhañāṇassa sattasu ārammaṇesu pavatti veditabbā.
analyzed: pana bahiddhā ārammaṇan ti evam tāva iddhividha ñāṇassa sattasu ārammaṇesu pavatti veditabbā

original: 415. Dibbasotadhātuñāṇaṃ parittapaccuppannaajjhattabahiddhārammaṇavasena catūsu ārammaṇesu
analyzed: dibba sota dhātu ñāṇam paritta paccuppanna ajjhatta bahiddha ārammaṇa vasena catūsu ārammaṇesu

original: pavattati. Kathaṃ? Tañhi yasmā saddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti, saddo ca paritto, tasmā parittārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: pavattati katham tat hi yasmā saddam ārammaṇam karoti saddo ca parittaḥ tasmā paritta ārammaṇam

original: hoti. Vijjamānaṃyeva pana saddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattanato paccuppannārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: hoti vijjamānam yeva pana saddam ārammaṇam katvā pavattanato paccuppanna ārammaṇam

original: hoti. Taṃ attano kucchisaddasavanakāle ajjhattārammaṇaṃ. Paresaṃ saddasavanakāle
analyzed: hoti tam attanaḥ kucchi sadda savana kāle ajjhatta ārammaṇam paresam sadda savana kāle

original: bahiddhārammaṇanti evaṃ dibbasotadhātuñāṇassa catūsu ārammaṇesu pavatti veditabbā.
analyzed: bahiddhā ārammaṇan ti evam dibba sota dhātu ñāṇassa catūsu ārammaṇesu pavatti veditabbā

original: 416. Cetopariyañāṇaṃ parittamahaggataappamāṇamaggaatītānāgatapaccuppannabahiddhārammaṇavasena

original: aṭṭhasu ārammaṇesu pavattati. Kathaṃ? Tañhi paresaṃ kāmāvacaracittajānanakāle parittārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: aṭṭhasu ārammaṇesu pavattati katham tat hi paresam kāmāvacara citta jānana kāle paritta ārammaṇam

original: hoti. Rūpāvacaraarūpāvacaracittajānanakāle mahaggatārammaṇaṃ hoti. Maggaphalajānanakāle
analyzed: hoti rūpāvacara arūpāvacara citta jānana kāle mahaggata ārammaṇam hoti magga phala jānana kāle

original: appamāṇārammaṇaṃ hoti.
analyzed: appamāṇa ārammaṇam hoti

analyzed: ettha ca puthujjanaḥ sotāpannassa cittam na jānāti sotāpannaḥ vā sakadāgāmissa ati evam

original: yāva arahato netabbaṃ. Arahā pana sabbesaṃ cittaṃ jānāti. Aññopi ca uparimo heṭṭhimassāti

original: sattadivasabbhantare ca anāgate sattadivasabbhantare ca paresaṃ cittaṃ jānāti, tadā

original: atītārammaṇaṃ anāgatārammaṇañca hoti.
analyzed: atīta ārammaṇam anāgata ārammaṇam ca hoti

original: Kathaṃ paccuppannārammaṇaṃ hoti. Paccuppannaṃ nāma tividhaṃ – khaṇapaccuppannaṃ,

original: Ekadvesantativārapariyāpannaṃ santatipaccuppannaṃ. Tattha andhakāre nisīditvā ālokaṭṭhānaṃ

analyzed: suṇāti yāva pana tam suṇāti etasmim pi antare eka dvesantati vārāḥ veditabbāḥ evam

original: tāva majjhimabhāṇakā.
analyzed: tāva majjhima bhāṇakā

original: Saṃyuttabhāṇakā pana rūpasantati arūpasantatīti dve santatiyo vatvā udakaṃ akkamitvā

original: arūpasantati nāmāti vatvā tadubhayampi santatipaccuppannaṃ nāmāti vadanti.
analyzed: arūpa santati nāma ati vatvā tat ubhayam pi santati paccuppannam nāma ati vadanti

original: Ekabhavaparicchinnaṃ pana addhāpaccuppannaṃ nāma. Yaṃ sandhāya bhaddekarattasutte

analyzed: yaḥ ca āvuso manaḥ ye ca dhammāḥ ubhayam etam paccuppannam tasmin ce paccuppanne chanda rāga ppaṭibaddham

analyzed: hoti viññāṇam chanda rāga ppaṭibaddha ttā viññāṇassa tat abhinandati tat abhinandanto

analyzed: āgatam addhā paccuppannam sutte

original: 432. Tattha yaṃ kiñci sītādīhi ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ dhammajātaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ ekato katvā rūpakkhandhoti veditabbaṃ.

original: Tadetaṃ ruppanalakkhaṇena ekavidhampi bhūtopādāyabhedato duvidhaṃ.

original: Tattha bhūtarūpaṃ catubbidhaṃ – pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātūti. Tāsaṃ

analyzed: tattha rūpa abhighāta arahata ppasāda lakkhaṇam daṭṭhu kāma tā nidāna kamma samuṭṭhāna bhūta ppasāda lakkhaṇam

analyzed: vā sotam saddesu āviñchana rasam sota viññāṇassa ādhāra bhāva paccupaṭṭhānam sotu kāma tā nidāna kamma ja bhūta padaṭṭhānam

original: 434. Keci pana “tejādhikānaṃ bhūtānaṃ pasādo cakkhu, vāyupathavīāpādhikānaṃ bhūtānaṃ

original: Ghānapaṭihananalakkhaṇo gandho, ghānaviññāṇassa visayabhāvaraso, tasseva gocarapaccupaṭṭhāno. Mūlagandho sāragandhotiādinā nayena anekavidho.

original: Jivhāpaṭihananalakkhaṇo raso, jivhāviññāṇassa visayabhāvaraso, tasseva gocarapaccupaṭṭhāno. Mūlaraso khandharasotiādinā nayena anekavidho.
