original: niyāmako viya. Na bhaṅgato uddhaṃ pavattati, attano ca pavattayitabbānañca abhāvā.
analyzed: niyāmakaḥ viya na bhaṅgataḥ uddham pavattati ca pavattayitabbānam ca abhāvā

original: Na bhaṅgakkhaṇe ṭhapeti, sayaṃ bhijjamānattā. Khīyamāno viya vaṭṭisneho dīpasikhaṃ.
analyzed: na bhaṅga kkhaṇe ṭhapeti sayam bhijjamāna ttā khīyamānaḥ viya vaṭṭi snehaḥ dīpa sikham

original: Na ca anupālanapavattanaṭṭhapanānubhāvavirahitaṃ, yathāvuttakkhaṇe tassa tassa sādhanatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: na ca anupālana pavattana ṭṭhapana anubhāva virahitam yathā vutta kkhaṇe tassa tassa sādhanato ti daṭṭhabbam

original: 440. Manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ nissayalakkhaṇaṃ hadayavatthu, tāsaññeva dhātūnaṃ
analyzed: manaḥ dhātu manaḥ viññāṇa dhātūnam nissaya lakkhaṇam hadaya vatthu tāsaṃ eva dhātūnam

original: ādhāraṇarasaṃ, ubbahanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Hadayassa anto kāyagatāsatikathāyaṃ vuttappakāraṃ
analyzed: ādhāraṇa rasam ubbahana paccupaṭṭhānam hadayassa antar vutta ppakāram

original: lohitaṃ nissāya sandhāraṇādikiccehi bhūtehi katūpakāraṃ utucittāhārehi upatthambhiyamānaṃ
analyzed: lohitam nissāya sandhāraṇa ādi kiccehi bhūtehi katu upakāram utu citta āhārehi upatthambhiyamānam

original: āyunā anupāliyamānaṃ manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnañceva taṃsampayuttadhammānañca vatthubhāvaṃ
analyzed: āyunā anupāliyamānam manaḥ dhātu manaḥ viññāṇa dhātūnam ca iva tad sampayutta dhammānam ca vatthu bhāvam

original: sādhayamānaṃ tiṭṭhati.
analyzed: sādhayamānam tiṭṭhati

original: 441. Abhikkamādipavattakacittasamuṭṭhānavāyodhātuyā sahajarūpakāyathambhanasandhāraṇacalanassa
analyzed: abhikkama ādi pavattaka citta samuṭṭhāna vāyodhātuyā sahaja rūpa kāya thambhana sandhāraṇa calanassa

original: paccayo ākāravikāro kāyaviññatti, adhippāyapakāsanarasā, kāyavipphandanahetubhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā,
analyzed: paccayo ākāra vikāraḥ kāya viññatti adhippāya pakāsana rasā kāya vipphandana hetu bhāva paccupaṭṭhānā

original: cittasamuṭṭhānavāyodhātupadaṭṭhānā. Sā panesā kāyavipphandanena adhippāyaviññāpanahetuttā,
analyzed: citta samuṭṭhāna vāyodhātu padaṭṭhānā sā pana esā kāya vipphandanena adhippāya viññāpana hetuttā

original: sayañca tena kāyavipphandanasaṅkhātena kāyena viññeyyattā “kāyaviññattī”ti vuccati.
analyzed: sayam ca tena kāya vipphandana saṅkhātena kāyena viññeyya ttā kāya viññatti iti vuccati

original: Tāya ca pana calitehi cittajarūpehi abhisambandhānaṃ utujādīnampi calanato abhikkamādayo
analyzed: tāya ca pana calitehi citta ja rūpehi abhisambandhānam utu ja ādīnam pi calanataḥ abhikkama ādayaḥ

original: pavattantīti veditabbā.
analyzed: pavattanti iti veditabbā

original: Vacībhedapavattakacittasamuṭṭhānapathavīdhātuyā upādiṇṇaghaṭṭanassa paccayo ākāravikāro
analyzed: vacī bheda pavattaka citta samuṭṭhāna pathavī dhātuyā upādiṇṇa ghaṭṭanassa paccayaḥ ākāra vikāro

original: vacīviññatti, adhippāyappakāsanarasā, vacīghosahetubhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā, cittasamuṭṭhānapathavīdhātupadaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: vacī viññatti adhippāya pakāsana rasā vacī ghosa hetu bhāva paccupaṭṭhānā citta samuṭṭhāna pathavī dhātu padaṭṭhānā

original: Sā panesā vacīghosena adhippāyaviññāpanahetuttā, sayañca tāya vacīghosasaṅkhātāya
analyzed: sā pana isā vacī ghosena adhippāya viññāpana hetuttā sayam ca tāya vacī ghosa saṅkhātāya

original: vācāya viññeyyattā “vacīviññattī”ti vuccati. Yathā hi araññe ussāpetvā bandhagosīsādiudakanimittaṃ
analyzed: vācāya viññeyya ttā vacī viññattī iti vuccati yathā hi araññe ussāpetvā bandha gosīsa ādi udaka nimittam

original: disvā udakamettha atthīti viññāyati, evaṃ kāyavipphandanañceva vacīghosañca gahetvā
analyzed: disvā udakam ettha atthi iti viññāyati evam kāya vipphandanam ca iva vacī ghosam ca gahetvā

original: kāyavacīviññattiyopi viññāyanti.
analyzed: kāya vacī viññattiyaḥ pi viññāyanti

original: 442. Rūpaparicchedalakkhaṇā ākāsadhātu, rūpapariyantappakāsanarasā, rūpamariyādāpaccupaṭṭhānā,
analyzed: rūpa pariccheda lakkhaṇā ākāsa dhātu rūpa pariyanta pakāsana rasā rūpa mariyādā paccupaṭṭhānā

original: asamphuṭṭhabhāvacchiddavivarabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā vā, paricchinnarūpapadaṭṭhānā. Yāya
analyzed: a samphuṭṭha bhāva chidda vivara bhāva pacca upaṭṭhānā vā paricchinna rūpa padaṭṭhānā

original: paricchinnesu rūpesu idamito uddhamadho tiriyanti ca hoti.
analyzed: paricchinnesu rūpesu idam itas uddham adhas ca hoti

original: 443. Adandhatālakkhaṇā rūpassa lahutā, rūpānaṃ garubhāvavinodanarasā, lahuparivattitāpaccupaṭṭhānā,
analyzed: adandha tā lakkhaṇā rūpassa lahu tā rūpānam garu bhāva vinodana rasā lahu parivatti tā paccupaṭṭhānā

original: lahurūpapadaṭṭhānā. Athaddhatālakkhaṇā rūpassa mudutā, rūpānaṃ thaddhabhāvavinodanarasā,
analyzed: lahu rūpa padaṭṭhānā athaddha tā lakkhaṇā rūpassa mudu tā rūpānam thaddha bhāva vinodana rasā

original: sabbakiriyāsu avirodhitāpaccupaṭṭhānā, mudurūpapadaṭṭhānā. Sarīrakiriyānukūlakammaññabhāvalakkhaṇā
analyzed: sabba kiriyāsu avirodhi tā paccupaṭṭhānā mudu rūpa padaṭṭhānā sarīra kiriyā anukūla kammañña bhāva lakkhaṇā

original: rūpassa kammaññatā, akammaññatāvinodanarasā, adubbalabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā, kammaññarūpapadaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: rūpassa kammañña tā akammañña tā vinodana rasā adubbala bhāva paccupaṭṭhānā kammañña rūpa padaṭṭhānā

original: Etā pana tisso na aññamaññaṃ vijahanti, evaṃ santepi yo arogino viya rūpānaṃ lahubhāvo
analyzed: etāḥ pana tissaḥ na aññam aññam vijahanti evam sante pi yaḥ aroginaḥ viya rūpānam lahu bhāvaḥ

original: adandhatā lahuparivattippakāro rūpadandhattakaradhātukkhobhapaṭipakkhapaccayasamuṭṭhāno,
analyzed: a dandha tā lahu parivatti pakāraḥ rūpa dandha tta kara dhātu kkhobha paṭipakkha paccaya samuṭṭhānaḥ

original: so rūpavikāro rūpassa lahutā. Yo pana suparimadditacammasseva rūpānaṃ mudubhāvo sabbakiriyāvisesesu
analyzed: so rūpa vikāraḥ rūpassa lahu tā yaḥ pana su parimaddita cammassa iva rūpānam mudu bhāvaḥ sabba kiriyā visesesu

original: vasavattanabhāvamaddavappakāro rūpatthaddhattakaradhātukkhobhapaṭipakkhapaccayasamuṭṭhāno,
analyzed: vasa vattana bhāva maddava ppakāraḥ rūpattha ddhatta kara dhātu kkhobha paṭipakkha paccaya samuṭṭhāno

original: so rūpavikāro rūpassa mudutā. Yo pana sudantasuvaṇṇasseva rūpānaṃ kammaññabhāvo sarīrakiriyānukūlabhāvappakāro
analyzed: so rūpa vikāraḥ rūpassa mudu tā yaḥ pana sudanta suvaṇṇassa iva rūpānam kammañña bhāvo sarīra kiriyā anukūla bhāva ppakāro

original: sarīrakiriyānaṃ ananukūlakaradhātukkhobhapaṭipakkhapaccayasamuṭṭhāno, so rūpavikāro
analyzed: sarīra kiriyānam an anukūla kara dhātu khobha paṭipakkha paccaya samuṭṭhānaḥ saḥ rūpa vikāro

original: rūpassa kammaññatāti evametāsaṃ viseso veditabbo.
analyzed: rūpassa kammañña tā ti evam etāsam visesaḥ veditabbo

original: 444. Ācayalakkhaṇo rūpassa upacayo, pubbantato rūpānaṃ ummujjāpanaraso, niyyātanapaccupaṭṭhāno,
analyzed: ācaya lakkhaṇaḥ rūpassa upacayaḥ pubbantataḥ rūpānam ummujja āpana rasaḥ niyyātana paccupaṭṭhāno

original: paripuṇṇabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno vā, upacitarūpapadaṭṭhāno. Pavattilakkhaṇā rūpassa santati,
analyzed: paripuṇṇa bhāva paccupaṭṭhānaḥ vā upacita rūpa padaṭṭhānaḥ pavatti lakkhaṇā rūpassa santati

original: anuppabandhanarasā, anupacchedapaccupaṭṭhānā, anuppabandhakarūpapadaṭṭhānā. Ubhayampetaṃ
analyzed: an uppabandhana rasāḥ an upaccheda paccupaṭṭhānāḥ an uppabandhaka rūpa padaṭṭhānāḥ

original: jātirūpassevādhivacanaṃ, ākāranānattato pana veneyyavasena ca “upacayo santatī”ti
analyzed: jāti rūpaḥ iva adhivacanam ākāra nānattataḥ pana veneyya vasena ca upacayaḥ santatī iti

original: uddesadesanā katā. Yasmā panettha atthato nānattaṃ natthi, tasmā imesaṃ padānaṃ niddese
analyzed: uddesa desanā katā yasmā pana ittha atthataḥ nānattam natthi tasmā imesam padānam niddese

original: “yo āyatanānaṃ ācayo, so rūpassa upacayo. Yo rūpassa upacayo, sā rūpassa santatī”ti
analyzed: yaḥ āyatanānaṃ ācayo saḥ rūpassa upacayaḥ yaḥ rūpassa upacayo sā rūpassa santati iti

original: vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyampi “ācayo nāma nibbatti, upacayo nāma vaḍḍhi, santati nāma pavattī”ti
analyzed: vuttam aṭṭhakathāyam pi ācayaḥ nāma nibbatti upacayaḥ nāma vaḍḍhi santati nāma pavatti iti

original: vatvā “nadītīre khatakūpakamhi udakuggamanakālo viya ācayo nibbatti, paripuṇṇakālo
analyzed: vatvā nadī tīre khata kūpakamhi udakuggamana kālaḥ viya ācayaḥ nibbatti paripuṇṇa kālaḥ

original: viya upacayo vaḍḍhi, ajjhottharitvā gamanakālo viya santati pavattī”ti upamā katā.
analyzed: viya upacayaḥ ajjhottharitvā gamana kālaḥ upamā katā

original: Upamāvasāne ca “evaṃ kiṃ kathitaṃ hoti? Āyatanena ācayo kathito, ācayena āyatanaṃ
analyzed: upamā avasāne ca evam kim kathitam āyatanena ācayaḥ kathitaḥ ācayena āyatanam

original: kathita”nti vuttaṃ. Tasmā yā rūpānaṃ paṭhamābhinibbatti, sā ācayo. Yā tesaṃ upari
analyzed: kathitam ti vuttam tasmā yā rūpānam paṭhamā abhinibbatti sā ācayaḥ yā tesam upari

original: aññesampi nibbattamānānaṃ nibbatti, sā vaḍḍhiākārena upaṭṭhānato upacayo. Yā tesampi
analyzed: aññesam pi nibbattamānānam nibbatti sā vaḍḍhi ākārena upaṭṭhānataḥ upacayaḥ yā tesam pi

original: upari punappunaṃ aññesaṃ nibbattamānānaṃ nibbatti, sā anupabandhākārena upaṭṭhānato
analyzed: upari punappunam aññesam nibbattamānānam nibbatti sā an upabandha ākārena upaṭṭhānato

original: santatīti ca pavuccatīti veditabbā.
analyzed: santatī iti ca pavuccati iti veditabbā

original: Rūpaparipākalakkhaṇā jaratā, upanayanarasā, sabhāvānapagamepi navabhāvāpagamapaccupaṭṭhānā
analyzed: rūpa paripāka lakkhaṇā jaratā upanayana rasā sa bhāva anapagame pi nava bhāva apagama paccupaṭṭhānā

original: vīhipurāṇabhāvo viya, paripaccamānarūpapadaṭṭhānā. Khaṇḍiccādibhāvena dantādīsu vikāradassanato
analyzed: vīhi purāṇa bhāvaḥ viya paripaccamāna rūpa padaṭṭhānā khaṇḍicca ādi bhāvena danta ādīsu vikāra dassanato

original: idaṃ pākaṭajaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Arūpadhammānaṃ pana paṭicchannajarā nāma hoti,
analyzed: idam pākaṭa jaram sandhāya vuttam arūpa dhammānam pana paṭicchannajarā nāma hoti

original: tassā esa vikāro natthi, yā ca pathavī udakapabbatacandimasūriyādīsu avīcijarā nāma.
analyzed: tassāḥ esa vikāro natthi yā ca pathavī udaka pabbata candima sūriya ādīsu avīcijarā nāma

original: Paribhedalakkhaṇā rūpassa aniccatā, saṃsīdanarasā, khayavayapaccupaṭṭhānā, paribhijjamānarūpapadaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: paribheda lakkhaṇā rūpassa anicca tā saṃsīdana rasā khaya vaya paccupaṭṭhānā paribhijjamāna rūpa padaṭṭhānā

original: 445. Ojālakkhaṇo kabaḷīkāro āhāro, rūpāharaṇaraso, upatthambhanapaccupaṭṭhāno, kabaḷaṃ katvā āharitabbavatthupadaṭṭhāno. Yāya ojāya sattā yāpenti, tassā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
analyzed: ojā lakkhaṇo kabaḷīkāraḥ āhāraḥ rūpa āharaṇa raso upatthambhana paccupaṭṭhāno kabaḷam katvā āharitabba vatthu padaṭṭhāno yāya ojāya sattāḥ yāpenti tassāḥ etam adhivacanam

original: 446. Imāni tāva pāḷiyaṃ āgatarūpāneva. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana balarūpaṃ sambhavarūpaṃ
analyzed: imāni tāva bala rūpam sambhava rūpam

original: jātirūpaṃ rogarūpaṃ ekaccānaṃ matena middharūpanti evaṃ aññānipi rūpāni āharitvā
analyzed: jāti rūpam roga rūpam evam aññāni api rūpāni āharitvā

original: “addhā munīsi sambuddho, natthi nīvaraṇā tavā”tiādīni vatvā middharūpaṃ tāva natthiyevāti
analyzed: addhā muni isi sambuddhaḥ na atthi nīvaraṇā tava ati ādīni vatvā middha rūpam tāva

original: paṭikkhittaṃ. Itaresu rogarūpaṃ jaratāaniccatāggahaṇena gahitameva, jātirūpaṃ upacayasantatiggahaṇena,
analyzed: paṭikkhittam itaresu roga rūpam jara tā anicca tā ggahaṇena gahitam eva jāti rūpam upacaya santati ggahaṇena

original: sambhavarūpaṃ āpodhātuggahaṇena, balarūpaṃ vāyodhātuggahaṇena gahitameva. Tasmā tesu
analyzed: sambhava rūpam āpaḥ dhātu ggahaṇena bala rūpam vāyaḥ dhātu ggahaṇena gahitam eva tasmā tesu

original: ekampi visuṃ natthīti sanniṭṭhānaṃ kataṃ.
analyzed: ekam pi visum natthi iti sanniṭṭhānam katam

original: Iti idaṃ catuvīsatividhaṃ upādārūpaṃ pubbe vuttaṃ catubbidhaṃ bhūtarūpañcāti aṭṭhavīsatividhaṃ rūpaṃ hoti anūnamanadhikaṃ.
analyzed: iti idam catuvīsatividham upādā rūpam pubbe vuttam catubbidham bhūta rūpam ca ati aṭṭhavīsatividham rūpam hoti anūnam anadhikam

original: 447. Taṃ sabbampi na hetu ahetukaṃ hetuvippayuttaṃ sappaccayaṃ lokiyaṃ sāsavamevātiādinā nayena ekavidhaṃ.
analyzed: tat sabbam pi na hetu ahetukam hetu vippayuttam sappaccayam lokiyam sa āsavam eva ati ādinā nayena ekavidham

original: Ajjhattikaṃ bāhiraṃ, oḷārikaṃ sukhumaṃ, dūre santike, nipphannaṃ anipphannaṃ, pasādarūpaṃ napasādarūpaṃ, indriyaṃ anindriyaṃ, upādiṇṇaṃ anupādiṇṇantiādivasena duvidhaṃ.
analyzed: ajjhattikam bāhiram oḷārikam sukhumam dūre santike nipphannam a nipphannam pasāda rūpam na pasāda rūpam indriyam an indriyam upādiṇṇam an upādiṇṇa nti ādi vasena duvidham

original: Tattha cakkhādipañcavidhaṃ attabhāvaṃ adhikicca pavattattā ajjhattikaṃ, sesaṃ tato
analyzed: tattha cakkha ādi pañcavidham atta bhāvam adhikicca pavatta ttā ajjhattikam sesam tatas

original: bāhirattā bāhiraṃ. Cakkhādīni nava āpodhātuvajjitā tisso dhātuyo cāti dvādasavidhaṃ
analyzed: bāhira ttā bāhiram cakkha ādīni nava āpaḥ dhātu vajjitā tisso dhātuyaḥ ca ati dvādasavidham

original: ghaṭṭanavasena gahetabbato oḷārikaṃ, sesaṃ tato viparītattā sukhumaṃ. Yaṃ sukhumaṃ
analyzed: ghaṭṭana vasena gahetabbataḥ oḷārikam sesam tatas viparīta ttā sukhumam yam sukhumam

original: tadeva duppaṭivijjhasabhāvattā dūre, itaraṃ suppaṭivijjhasabhāvattā santike. Catasso
analyzed: tat eva duppaṭivijjha sabhāva ttā dūre itaram suppaṭivijjha sabhāva ttā santike catasso

original: dhātuyo, cakkhādīni terasa, kabaḷīkārāhāro cāti aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ paricchedavikāralakkhaṇabhāvaṃ
analyzed: dhātuyaḥ cakkha ādīni terasa kabaḷīkāra āhāro ca ati aṭṭhārasavidham rūpam pariccheda vikāra lakkhaṇa bhāvam

original: atikkamitvā sabhāveneva pariggahetabbato nipphannaṃ, sesaṃ tabbiparītatāya anipphannaṃ.
analyzed: atikkamitvā sa bhāvena iva pariggahetabbataḥ nipphannam sesam tad biparīta tāya a nipphannam

original: Cakkhādipañcavidhaṃ rūpādīnaṃ gahaṇapaccayabhāvena ādāsatalaṃ viya vippasannattā
analyzed: cakkha ādi pañcavidham rūpa ādīnam gahaṇa paccaya bhāvena ādāsa talam viya vippasanna ttā

original: pasādarūpaṃ, itaraṃ tato viparītattā napasādarūpaṃ. Pasādarūpameva itthindriyādittayena
analyzed: pasāda rūpam itaram tatas viparīta ttā na pasāda rūpam pasāda rūpam eva

original: saddhiṃ adhipatiyaṭṭhena indriyaṃ, sesaṃ tato viparītattā anindriyaṃ. Yaṃ kammajanti
analyzed: saddhim adhipatiya ṭṭhena indriyam sesam tatas viparīta ttā anindriyam yam kamma janti

original: parato vakkhāma, taṃ kammena upādiṇṇattā upādiṇṇaṃ, sesaṃ tato viparītattā anupādiṇṇaṃ.
analyzed: paratas vakkhāma tam kammena upādiṇṇa ttā upādiṇṇam sesam tatas viparīta ttā anupādiṇṇam

original: 448. Puna sabbameva rūpaṃ sanidassanakammajādīnaṃ tikānaṃ vasena tividhaṃ hoti. Tattha
analyzed: puna sabbam eva rūpam sa nidassana kamma ja ādīnam tikānam vasena tividham hoti tattha

original: oḷārike rūpaṃ sanidassanasappaṭighaṃ, sesaṃ anidassanasappaṭighaṃ. Sabbampi sukhumaṃ
analyzed: oḷārike rūpam sa nidassana sa paṭigham sesam anidassana sa paṭigham sabbam pi sukhumam

original: anidassanaappaṭighaṃ. Evaṃ tāva sanidassanattikavasena tividhaṃ. Kammajādittikavasena
analyzed: evam tāva sa nidassana ttika vasena tividham kamma ja ādi ttika vasena

original: pana kammato jātaṃ kammajaṃ, tadaññapaccayajātaṃ akammajaṃ, nakutocijātaṃ neva kammajaṃ
analyzed: pana kammataḥ jātam kamma jam tad añña paccaya jātam akamma jam na kutoci jātam na iva kamma jam

original: nākammajaṃ. Cittato jātaṃ cittajaṃ, tadaññapaccayajātaṃ acittajaṃ, nakutocijātaṃ
analyzed: na a kamma jam cittataḥ jātam citta jam tad añña paccaya jātam a citta jam na kutoci jātam

original: neva cittajaṃ nācittajaṃ, āhārato jātaṃ āhārajaṃ, tadaññapaccayajātaṃ anāhārajaṃ,
analyzed: na iva citta jam na acitta jam āhārataḥ jātam āhāra jam tad añña paccaya jātam anāhāra jam

original: nakutocijātaṃ neva āhārajaṃ naanāhārajaṃ. Ututo jātaṃ utujaṃ, tadaññapaccayajātaṃ
analyzed: na kutocid jātam na iva āhāra jam na anāhāra jam ututaḥ jātam utu jam tad añña paccaya jātam

original: anutujaṃ, nakutocijātaṃ neva utujaṃ naanutujanti evaṃ kammajādittikavasena tividhaṃ.
analyzed: anutujam na kutocid jātam na iva utujam na anutujanti evam kamma ja ādittika vasena tividham

original: 449. Puna diṭṭhādirūparūpādivatthādicatukkavasena catubbidhaṃ. Tattha rūpāyatanaṃ
analyzed: puna diṭṭha ādi rūpa rūpa ādi vattha ādi catukka vasena catubbidham tattha rūpa āyatanam

original: diṭṭhaṃ nāma dassanavisayattā, saddāyatanaṃ sutaṃ nāma savanavisayattā, gandharasaphoṭṭhabbattayaṃ
analyzed: diṭṭham nāma dassana visaya ttā sadda āyatanam sutam nāma savana visaya ttā gandha rasa phoṭṭhabba ttayam

original: mutaṃ nāma sampattagāhakaindriyavisayattā, sesaṃ viññātaṃ nāma viññāṇasseva visayattāti
analyzed: mutam nāma sampatta gāhaka aindriya visaya ttā sesam viññātam nāma viññāṇassa iva visaya ttā ati

original: evaṃ tāva diṭṭhādicatukkavasena catubbidhaṃ.
analyzed: evam tāva diṭṭha ādi catukka vasena catubbidham

original: Nipphannarūpaṃ panettha rūparūpaṃ nāma, ākāsadhātu paricchedarūpaṃ nāma, kāyaviññattiādi
analyzed: nipphanna rūpam pana ittha rūpa rūpam nāma ākāsa dhātu pariccheda rūpam nāma kāya viññatti ādi

original: kammaññatāpariyantaṃ vikārarūpaṃ nāma, jātijarābhaṅgaṃ lakkhaṇarūpaṃ nāmāti evaṃ
analyzed: kammañña tā pariyantam vikāra rūpam nāma jāti jarā bhaṅgam lakkhaṇa rūpam nāma ati evam

original: rūparūpādicatukkavasena catubbidhaṃ.
analyzed: rūpa rūpa ādi catukka vasena catubbidham

original: Yaṃ panettha hadayarūpaṃ nāma, taṃ vatthu na dvāraṃ. Viññattidvayaṃ dvāraṃ na vatthu.
analyzed: yam pana ittha hadaya rūpam nāma tam vatthu na dvāram viññatti dvayam dvāram na vatthu

original: Pasādarūpaṃ vatthu ceva dvārañca. Sesaṃ neva vatthu na dvāranti evaṃ vatthādicatukkavasena catubbidhaṃ.
analyzed: pasāda rūpam vatthu ca iva dvāram ca sesam na iva vatthu na dvāran ti evam vattha ādi catukka vasena catubbidham

original: 450. Puna ekajaṃ, dvijaṃ, tijaṃ, catujaṃ, nakutocijātanti imesaṃ vasena pañcavidhaṃ.
analyzed: punar ekajam dvijam tijam catujam vasena pañcavidham

original: Tattha kammajameva cittajameva ca ekajaṃ nāma. Tesu saddhiṃ hadayavatthunā indriyarūpaṃ
analyzed: tattha kamma jam eva citta jam eva ca ekajam nāma tesu saddhim hadaya vatthunā indriya rūpam

original: kammajameva. Viññattidvayaṃ cittajameva. Yaṃ pana cittato ca ututo ca jātaṃ, taṃ
analyzed: kamma jam eva viññatti dvayam citta jam eva yam pana cittataḥ ca ututaḥ ca jātam tam

original: dvijaṃ nāma, taṃ saddāyatanameva. Yaṃ utucittāhārehi jātaṃ, taṃ tijaṃ nāma, taṃ pana
analyzed: dvijam nāma tam yam utu citta āhārehi jātam tam tijam nāma tam pana

original: lahutādittayameva. Yaṃ catūhipi kammādīhi jātaṃ, taṃ catujaṃ nāma, taṃ lakkhaṇarūpavajjaṃ
analyzed: yam catūhi pi kamma ādīhi jātam tam catujam nāma tam lakkhaṇa rūpavajjam

original: avasesaṃ hoti. Lakkhaṇarūpaṃ pana nakutocijātaṃ. Kasmā? Na hi uppādassa uppādo atthi,
analyzed: avasesam hoti lakkhaṇa rūpam pana na kutocid jātam kasmā na hi uppādassa uppādo atthi

original: uppannassa ca paripākabhedamattaṃ itaradvayaṃ. Yampi “rūpāyatanaṃ saddāyatanaṃ gandhāyatanaṃ
analyzed: uppannassa ca paripāka bheda mattam itara dvayam yat pi rūpa āyatanam sadda āyatanam gandha āyatanam

original: rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ ākāsadhātu āpodhātu rūpassa lahutā, rūpassa mudutā,
analyzed: rasa āyatanam phoṭṭhabba āyatanam ākāsa dhātu āpas dhātu rūpassa lahu tā rūpassa mudu tā

original: rūpassa kammaññatā, rūpassa upacayo, rūpassa santati, kabaḷīkāro āhāro, ime dhammā
analyzed: rūpassa kammañña tā rūpassa upacayaḥ rūpassa santati kabaḷīkāraḥ āhāraḥ ime dhammā

original: cittasamuṭṭhānā”tiādīsu jātiyā kutocijātattaṃ anuññātaṃ, taṃ pana rūpajanakapaccayānaṃ
analyzed: citta samuṭṭhāna ati ādīsu jātiyā kutocijātattam anuññātam tam pana rūpa janaka paccayānam

original: kiccānubhāvakkhaṇe diṭṭhattāti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: kicca anubhāva kkhaṇe diṭṭha ttā iti veditabbam

original: Idaṃ tāva rūpakkhandhe vitthārakathāmukhaṃ.
analyzed: idam tāva rūpa kkhandhe vitthāra kathā mukham

original: Viññāṇakkhandhakathā
analyzed: viññāṇa kkhandha kathā

original: 451. Itaresu pana yaṃkiñci vedayitalakkhaṇaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ ekato katvā vedanākkhandho;
analyzed: itaresu pana yaṃ kiñci vedayita lakkhaṇam sabbam tam ekatas katvā vedanā kkhandho

original: yaṃkiñci sañjānanalakkhaṇaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ ekato katvā saññākkhandho; yaṃkiñci abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇaṃ,
analyzed: yaṃ kiñci sañjānana lakkhaṇam sabbam tam ekatas katvā saññā kkhandho yaṃ kiñci abhisaṅkharaṇa lakkhaṇam

original: sabbaṃ taṃ ekato katvā saṅkhārakkhandho; yaṃkiñci vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ ekato
analyzed: sabbam tam ekatas katvā saṅkhāra kkhandho yaṃ kiñci vijānana lakkhaṇam sabbam tam ekatas

original: katvā viññāṇakkhandho veditabbo. Tattha yasmā viññāṇakkhandhe viññāte itare suviññeyyā
analyzed: katvā viññāṇa kkhandho veditabbo tattha yasmā viññāṇa kkhandhe viññāte itare su viññeyyā

original: honti, tasmā viññāṇakkhandhaṃ ādiṃ katvā vaṇṇanaṃ karissāma.
analyzed: honti tasmai viññāṇa kkhandham ādim katvā vaṇṇanam karissāma

original: Yaṃkiñci vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ ekato katvā viññāṇakkhandho veditabboti hi
analyzed: yaṃ kiñci vijānana lakkhaṇam sabbam tam ekatas katvā viññāṇa kkhandho veditabbaḥ iti hi

original: vuttaṃ. Kiñca vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ viññāṇaṃ? Yathāha “vijānāti vijānātīti kho, āvuso,
analyzed: vuttam kiñca vijānana lakkhaṇam viññāṇam yathā āha vijānāti vijānāti iti kho āvuso

original: tasmā viññāṇanti vuccatī”ti. Viññāṇaṃ cittaṃ manoti atthato ekaṃ. Tadetaṃ vijānanalakkhaṇena
analyzed: tasmā viññāṇanti vuccati iti viññāṇam cittam manaḥ ti atthataḥ ekam tat etam vijānana lakkhaṇena

original: sabhāvato ekavidhampi jātivasena tividhaṃ kusalaṃ, akusalaṃ, abyākatañca.
analyzed: sabhāvataḥ ekavidham pi jāti vasena tividham kusalam akusalam abyākatam ca

original: 452. Tattha kusalaṃ bhūmibhedato catubbidhaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ
analyzed: tattha kusalam bhūmi bhedato catubbidham kāmāvacaram rūpāvacaram arūpāvacaram

original: lokuttarañca. Tattha kāmāvacaraṃ somanassupekkhāñāṇasaṅkhārabhedato aṭṭhavidhaṃ.
analyzed: lokuttaram ca tattha kāmāvacaram somanassa upekkhā ñāṇa saṅkhāra bhedato aṭṭhavidham

original: Seyyathidaṃ – somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhāraṃ sasaṅkhārañca, tathā
analyzed: seyyathīdam somanassa sahagatam ñāṇa sampayuttam asaṅkhāram sa saṅkhāram ca tathā

original: ñāṇavippayuttaṃ. Upekkhāsahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhāraṃ sasaṅkhārañca, tathā ñāṇavippayuttaṃ.
analyzed: ñāṇa vippayuttam upekkhā sahagatam ñāṇa sampayuttam asaṅkhāram sa saṅkhāram ca tathā ñāṇa vippayuttam

original: Yadā hi deyyadhammapaṭiggāhakādisampattiṃ aññaṃ vā somanassahetuṃ āgamma haṭṭhapahaṭṭho
analyzed: yadā hi deyya dhamma paṭiggāhaka ādi sampattim aññam vā somanassa hetum āgamma haṭṭha pahaṭṭhaḥ

original: “atthi dinna”ntiādinayappavattaṃ sammādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvā asaṃsīdanto anussāhito
analyzed: atthi dinna nti ādi naya ppavattam sammādiṭṭhim purakkhatvā a saṃsīdantaḥ anussāhito

original: parehi dānādīni puññāni karoti, tadāssa somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ
analyzed: parehi dāna ādīni puññāni karoti tadā assa somanassa sahagatam ñāṇa sampayuttam cittam

original: asaṅkhāraṃ hoti. Yadā pana vuttanayena haṭṭhatuṭṭho sammādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvā amuttacāgatādivasena
analyzed: asaṅkhāram hoti yadā pana vutta nayena haṭṭha tuṭṭhaḥ sammādiṭṭhim purakkhatvā amuttaca āgata ādi vasena

original: saṃsīdamāno vā parehi vā ussāhito karoti, tadāssa tadeva cittaṃ sasaṅkhāraṃ hoti.
analyzed: saṃsīdamānaḥ vā parehi vā ussāhitaḥ karoti tadā assa tat eva cittam sa saṅkhāram hoti

original: Imasmiñhi atthe saṅkhāroti etaṃ attano vā paresaṃ vā vasena pavattassa pubbapayogassādhivacanaṃ.
analyzed: imasmin hi atthe saṅkhāro ti etam attanaḥ vā paresam vā vasena pavattassa pubba payogassa adhivacanam

original: Yadā pana ñātijanassa paṭipattidassanena jātaparicayā bāladārakā bhikkhū disvā somanassajātā
analyzed: yadā pana ñāti janassa paṭipatti dassanena jāta paricayā bāla dārakā bhikkhū disvā somanassa jātā

original: sahasā kiñcideva hatthagataṃ dadanti vā vandanti vā, tadā tatiyaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati.
analyzed: sahasā kiñcid eva hattha gatam dadanti vā vandanti vā tadā tatiyam cittam uppajjati

original: Yadā pana “detha vandathāti” ñātīhi ussāhitā evaṃ paṭipajjanti, tadā catutthaṃ cittaṃ
analyzed: yadā pana detha vandatha ati ñātīhi ussāhitāḥ evam paṭipajjanti tadā catuttham cittam

original: uppajjati. Yadā pana deyyadhammapaṭiggāhakādīnaṃ asampattiṃ aññesaṃ vā somanassahetūnaṃ
analyzed: uppajjati yadā pana deyya dhamma paṭiggāhaka ādīnam asampattim aññesam vā somanassa hetūnam

original: abhāvaṃ āgamma catūsupi vikappesu somanassarahitā honti, tadā sesāni cattāri upekkhāsahagatāni
analyzed: abhāvam āgamma catūsu pi vikappesu somanassa rahitāḥ honti tadā sesāni cattāri upekkhā sahagatāni

original: uppajjantīti. Evaṃ somanassupekkhāñāṇasaṅkhārabhedato aṭṭhavidhaṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: uppajjanti iti evam somanassa upekkhā ñāṇa saṅkhāra bhedataḥ aṭṭhavidham kāmāvacara kusalam veditabbam

original: Rūpāvacaraṃ pana jhānaṅgayogabhedato pañcavidhaṃ hoti. Seyyathidaṃ, vitakkavicārapītisukhasamādhiyuttaṃ
analyzed: rūpāvacaram pana pañcavidham hoti seyyathā idam vitakka vicāra pīti sukha samādhi yuttam

original: paṭhamaṃ, atikkantavitakkaṃ dutiyaṃ, tato atikkantavicāraṃ tatiyaṃ, tato virattapītikaṃ
analyzed: paṭhamam atikkanta vitakkam dutiyam tatas atikkanta vicāram tatiyam tatas viratta pītikam

original: catutthaṃ, atthaṅgatasukhaṃ upekkhāsamādhiyuttaṃ pañcamanti.
analyzed: catuttham atthaṅgata sukham upekkhā samādhi yuttam

original: Arūpāvacaraṃ catunnaṃ āruppānaṃ yogavasena catubbidhaṃ. Vuttappakārena hi ākāsānañcāyatanajjhānena
analyzed: arūpāvacaram catunnam āruppānam yoga vasena catubbidham vutta ppakārena hi ākāsa ānañca āyatana jhānena

original: sampayuttaṃ paṭhamaṃ, viññāṇañcāyatanādīhi dutiyatatiyacatutthāni. Lokuttaraṃ catumaggasampayogato
analyzed: sampayuttam paṭhamam viññāṇam ca āyatana ādīhi dutiya tatiya catutthāni lokuttaram catu magga sampayogato

original: catubbidhanti evaṃ tāva kusalaviññāṇameva ekavīsatividhaṃ hoti.
analyzed: catubbidham ti evam tāva kusala viññāṇam eva ekavīsatividham hoti

original: 453. Akusalaṃ pana bhūmito ekavidhaṃ kāmāvacarameva, mūlato tividhaṃ lobhamūlaṃ dosamūlaṃ mohamūlañca.
analyzed: akusalam pana bhūmitaḥ ekavidham kāmāvacaram eva mūlataḥ tividham lobha mūlam dosa mūlam moha mūlam ca

original: Tattha lobhamūlaṃ somanassupekkhādiṭṭhigatasaṅkhārabhedato aṭṭhavidhaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ,
analyzed: tattha lobha mūlam so manas supekkhā diṭṭhi gata saṅkhāra bhedato aṭṭhavidham seyyathidam

original: somanassasahagataṃ diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhāraṃ sasaṅkhārañca, tathā diṭṭhigatavippayuttaṃ.
analyzed: somanassa sahagatam diṭṭhi gata sampayuttam asaṅkhāram sa saṅkhāram ca tathā diṭṭhi gata vippayuttam

original: Upekkhāsahagataṃ diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhāraṃ sasaṅkhārañca, tathā diṭṭhigatavippayuttaṃ.
analyzed: upekkhā sahagatam diṭṭhi gata sampayuttam asaṅkhāram sa saṅkhāram ca tathā diṭṭhi gata vippayuttam

original: Yadā hi “natthi kāmesu ādīnavo”ti ādinā nayena micchādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho
analyzed: yadā hi na atthi kāmesu ādīnavaḥ ti ādinā nayena micchādiṭṭhim purakkhatvā haṭṭha tuṭṭhaḥ

original: kāme vā paribhuñjati, diṭṭhamaṅgalādīni vā sārato pacceti sabhāvatikkheneva anussāhitena
analyzed: kāme vā paribhuñjati diṭṭha maṅgala ādīni vā sārataḥ pacceti sabhāvatikkhena iva anussāhitena

original: cittena, tadā paṭhamaṃ akusalacittaṃ uppajjati. Yadā mandena samussāhitena cittena,
analyzed: cittena tadā paṭhamam akusala cittam uppajjati yadā mandena samussāhitena cittena

original: tadā dutiyaṃ. Yadā micchādiṭṭhiṃ apurakkhatvā kevalaṃ haṭṭhatuṭṭho methunaṃ vā sevati,
analyzed: tadā dutiyam yadā micchādiṭṭhim a purakkhatvā kevalam haṭṭha tuṭṭhaḥ methunam vā sevati

original: parasampattiṃ vā abhijjhāyati, parabhaṇḍaṃ vā harati sabhāvatikkheneva anussāhitena
analyzed: para sampattim vā abhijjhāyati para bhaṇḍam vā harati sabhāvatikkhena iva anussāhitena

original: cittena, tadā tatiyaṃ. Yadā mandena samussāhitena cittena, tadā catutthaṃ. Yadā pana
analyzed: cittena tadā tatiyam yadā mandena samussāhitena cittena tadā catuttham yadā pana

original: kāmānaṃ vā asampattiṃ āgamma aññesaṃ vā somanassahetūnaṃ abhāvena catūsupi vikappesu
analyzed: kāmānam vā asampattim āgamma aññesam vā somanassa hetūnam abhāvena catūsu pi vikappesu

original: somanassarahitā honti, tadā sesāni cattāri upekkhāsahagatāni uppajjantīti evaṃ somanassupekkhādiṭṭhigatasaṅkhārabhedato
analyzed: somanassa rahitāḥ honti tadā sesāni cattāri upekkhā sahagatāni uppajjanti iti evam somanassa upekkhā diṭṭhi gata saṅkhāra bhedato

original: aṭṭhavidhaṃ lobhamūlaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: aṭṭhavidham lobha mūlam veditabbam

original: Dosamūlaṃ pana domanassasahagataṃ paṭighasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhāraṃ sasaṅkhāranti duvidhameva hoti, tassa pāṇātipātādīsu tikkhamandappavattikāle pavatti veditabbā.
analyzed: dosa mūlam pana domanassa sahagatam paṭigha sampayuttam asaṅkhāram sa saṅkhāram ti duvidham eva hoti tassa pāṇa atipāta ādīsu tikkha manda ppavatti kāle pavatti veditabbā

original: Mohamūlaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ vicikicchāsampayuttaṃ uddhaccasampayuttañcāti duvidhaṃ. Tassa sanniṭṭhānavikkhepakāle pavatti veditabbāti evaṃ akusalaviññāṇaṃ dvādasavidhaṃ hoti.
analyzed: moha mūlam upekkhā sahagatam vicikicchā sampayuttam uddhacca sampayuttam ca ati duvidham tassa sanniṭṭhāna vikkhepa kāle pavatti veditabbā ati evam akusala viññāṇam dvādasavidham hoti

original: 454. Abyākataṃ jātibhedato duvidhaṃ vipākaṃ kiriyañca. Tattha vipākaṃ bhūmito catubbidhaṃ
analyzed: abyākatam jāti bhedataḥ duvidham vipākam kiriyam ca tattha vipākam bhūmito catubbidham

original: kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ lokuttarañca. Tattha kāmāvacaraṃ duvidhaṃ kusalavipākaṃ
analyzed: kāmāvacaram rūpāvacaram arūpāvacaram lokuttaram ca tattha kāmāvacaram duvidham kusala vipākam

original: akusalavipākañca. Kusalavipākampi duvidhaṃ ahetukaṃ sahetukañca.
analyzed: akusala vipākam ca kusala vipākam pi duvidham ahetukam sa hetukam ca

original: Tattha alobhādivipākahetuvirahitaṃ ahetukaṃ, taṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇaṃ, sampaṭicchanakiccā manodhātu, santīraṇādikiccā dve manoviññāṇadhātuyo cāti aṭṭhavidhaṃ.
analyzed: tattha alobha ādi vipāka hetu virahitam ahetukam tat cakkhu viññāṇam sota ghāna jivhā kāya viññāṇam sampaṭicchana kiccā manaḥ dhātu santīraṇa ādi kiccā dve manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyo ca ati aṭṭhavidham

original: Tattha cakkhusannissitarūpavijānanalakkhaṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, rūpamattārammaṇarasaṃ,
analyzed: tattha cakkhu sannissita rūpa vijānana lakkhaṇam cakkhu viññāṇam rūpa matta ārammaṇa rasam

original: rūpābhimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, rūpārammaṇāya kiriyamanodhātuyā apagamapadaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: rūpa abhimukha bhāva paccupaṭṭhānam rūpa ārammaṇāya kiriya manaḥ dhātuyāḥ apagama padaṭṭhānam

original: Sotādisannissitasaddādivijānanalakkhaṇāni sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇāni, saddādimattārammaṇarasāni,
analyzed: sota ādi sannissita sadda ādi vijānana lakkhaṇāni sota ghāna jivhā kāya viññāṇāni sadda ādimatta ārammaṇa rasāni

original: saddādiabhimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānāni, saddārammaṇādīnaṃ kiriyamanodhātūnaṃ apagamapadaṭṭhānāni.
analyzed: sadda ādi abhimukha bhāva paccupaṭṭhānāni sadda ārammaṇa ādīnam kiriya manaḥ dhātūnam apagama padaṭṭhānāni

original: Cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ anantaraṃ rūpādivijānanalakkhaṇā manodhātu, rūpādisampaṭicchanarasā, tathābhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā, cakkhuviññāṇādiapagamapadaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇa ādīnam anantaram rūpa ādi vijānana lakkhaṇā manaḥ dhātu rūpa ādi sampaṭicchana rasā tathābhāva paccupaṭṭhānā cakkhu viññāṇa ādi apagama padaṭṭhānā

original: Ahetukavipākā saḷārammaṇavijānanalakkhaṇā duvidhāpi santīraṇādikiccā manoviññāṇadhātu,
analyzed: ahetuka vipākā duvidhā api santi īraṇa ādi kiccā manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu

original: santīraṇādirasā, tathābhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā, hadayavatthupadaṭṭhānā. Somanassupekkhāyogato
analyzed: santi īraṇa ādi rasā tathābhāva paccupaṭṭhānā hadaya vatthu padaṭṭhānā somanassa upekkhā yogato

original: pana dvipañcaṭṭhānabhedato ca tassā bhedo. Etāsu hi ekā ekantamiṭṭhārammaṇe pavattisabbhāvato
analyzed: pana dvi pañca ṭṭhāna bhedato ca tassā bhedaḥ etāsu hi ekā ekantam iṭṭha ārammaṇe pavatti sabbhāvato

original: somanassasampayuttā hutvā santīraṇatadārammaṇavasena pañcadvāre ceva javanāvasāne
analyzed: somanassa sampayuttāḥ hutvā santi īraṇa tad ārammaṇa vasena pañca dvāre ca iva javana avasāne

original: ca pavattanato dviṭṭhānā hoti. Ekā iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe pavattisabbhāvato upekkhāsampayuttā
analyzed: ca pavattanataḥ dvi ṭṭhānā hoti ekā iṭṭha majjhatta ārammaṇe pavatti sabbhāvataḥ upekkhā sampayuttā

original: hutvā santīraṇatadārammaṇapaṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasena pavattanato pañcaṭṭhānā hoti.
analyzed: hutvā santīraṇa tad ārammaṇa paṭisandhi bhavaṅga cuti vasena pavattanataḥ pañca ṭṭhānā hoti

original: Aṭṭhavidhampi cetaṃ ahetukavipākaviññāṇaṃ niyatāniyatārammaṇattā duvidhaṃ. Upekkhāsukhasomanassabhedato
analyzed: aṭṭhavidham pi ca itam ahetuka vipāka viññāṇam niyata aniyata ārammaṇa ttā duvidham upekkhā sukha so manassa bhedato

original: tividhaṃ. Viññāṇapañcakaṃ hettha niyatārammaṇaṃ yathākkamaṃ rūpādīsuyeva pavattito,
analyzed: tividham viññāṇa pañcakam ha ittha niyata ārammaṇam yathākkamam rūpa ādīsu yeva pavattitaḥ

original: sesaṃ aniyatārammaṇaṃ. Tatra hi manodhātu pañcasupi rūpādīsu pavattati, manoviññāṇadhātudvayaṃ
analyzed: sesam aniyata ārammaṇam tatra hi manaḥ dhātu pañcasu pi rūpa ādīsu pavattati manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu dvayam

original: chasūti. Kāyaviññāṇaṃ panettha sukhayuttaṃ, dviṭṭhānā manoviññāṇadhātu somanassayuttā,
analyzed: chasu uti kāya viññāṇam pana ittha sukha yuttam dvi ṭṭhānā manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu somanassa yuttā

original: sesaṃ upekkhāyuttanti. Evaṃ tāva kusalavipākāhetukaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: sesam upekkhā yuttam ti evam tāva kusala vipāka ahetukam aṭṭhavidham veditabbam

original: Alobhādivipākahetusampayuttaṃ pana sahetukaṃ, taṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ viya somanassādi
analyzed: alobha ādi vipāka hetu sampayuttam pana sa hetukam tam kāmāvacara kusalam viya somanassa ādi

original: bhedato aṭṭhavidhaṃ. Yathā pana kusalaṃ dānādivasena chasu ārammaṇesu pavattati,
analyzed: bhedataḥ aṭṭhavidham yathā pana kusalam dāna ādi vasena chasu ārammaṇesu pavattati

original: na idaṃ tathā. Idañhi paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutitadārammaṇavasena parittadhammapariyāpannesuyeva
analyzed: na idam tathā idam hi paṭisandhi bhavaṅga cuti tad ārammaṇa vasena paritta dhamma pariyāpannesu yeva

original: chasu ārammaṇesu pavattati. Saṅkhārāsaṅkhārabhāvo panettha āgamanādivasena veditabbo.
analyzed: chasu ārammaṇesu pavattati saṅkhāra asaṅkhāra bhāvaḥ pana ittha āgamana ādi vasena veditabbo

original: Sampayuttadhammānañca visese asatipi ādāsatalādīsu mukhanimittaṃ viya nirussāhaṃ
analyzed: sampayutta dhammānam ca visese asati pi ādāsa tala ādīsu mukha nimittam viya nirussāham

original: vipākaṃ, mukhaṃ viya saussāhaṃ kusalanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: vipākam mukham viya saussāham kusalanti veditabbam

original: Kevalaṃ hi akusalavipākaṃ ahetukameva, taṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇaṃ,
analyzed: kevalam hi akusala vipākam ahetukam eva tam cakkhu viññāṇam sota ghāna jivhā kāya viññāṇam

original: sampaṭicchanakiccā manodhātu, santīraṇādikiccā pañcaṭṭhānā manoviññāṇadhātūti sattavidhaṃ.
analyzed: sampaṭicchana kiccā manaḥ dhātu santīraṇa ādi kiccā pañca ṭṭhānā manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu uti sattavidham

original: Taṃ lakkhaṇādito kusalāhetukavipāke vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: tam lakkhaṇa āditaḥ kusala ahetuka vipāke vutta nayena iva veditabbam

original: Kevalañhi kusalavipākāni iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇāni, imāni aniṭṭhaaniṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇāni.
analyzed: kevalañhi kusala vipākāni iṭṭha aiṭṭha majjhatta ārammaṇāni imāni aniṭṭha aniṭṭha majjhatta ārammaṇāni

original: Tāni ca upekkhāsukhasomanassabhedato tividhāni, imāni dukkhaupekkhāvasena duvidhāni.
analyzed: tāni ca upekkhā sukha somanassa bhedato tividhāni imāni dukkha aupekkhā vasena duvidhāni

original: Ettha hi kāyaviññāṇaṃ dukkhasahagatameva, sesāni upekkhāsahagatāni. Sā ca tesu upekkhā
analyzed: ettha hi kāya viññāṇam dukkha sahagatam eva sesāni upekkhā sahagatāni sā ca tesu upekkhā

original: hīnā dukkhaṃ viya nātitikhiṇā, itaresu upekkhā paṇītā sukhaṃ viya nātitikhiṇā. Iti
analyzed: hīnā dukkham viya na atitikhiṇā itaresu upekkhā paṇītā sukham viya na atitikhiṇā iti

original: imesaṃ sattannaṃ akusalavipākānaṃ purimānañca soḷasannaṃ kusalavipākānaṃ vasena kāmāvacaraṃ
analyzed: imesam sattannam akusala vipākānam purimānam ca soḷasannam kusala vipākānam vasena kāmāvacaram

original: vipākaviññāṇaṃ tevīsatividhaṃ.
analyzed: vipāka viññāṇam tevīsatividham

original: Rūpāvacaraṃ pana kusalaṃ viya pañcavidhaṃ. Kusalaṃ pana samāpattivasena javanavīthiyaṃ
analyzed: rūpāvacaram pana kusalam pañcavidham kusalam pana samāpatti vasena javana vīthiyam

original: pavattati. Idaṃ upapattiyaṃ paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasena. Yathā ca rūpāvacaraṃ, evaṃ
analyzed: pavattati idam paṭisandhi bhavaṅga cuti vasena yathā ca rūpāvacaram evam

original: arūpāvacarampi kusalaṃ viya catubbidhaṃ. Pavattibhedopissa rūpāvacare vuttanayo eva.
analyzed: arūpāvacaram pi kusalam viya catubbidham pavatti bhedaḥ pissa rūpāvacare vutta nayaḥ eva

original: Lokuttaravipākaṃ catumaggayuttacittaphalattā catubbidhaṃ, taṃ maggavīthivasena ceva
analyzed: lokuttara vipākam catu magga yutta citta phalattā catubbidham tam magga vīthi vasena ca iva

original: samāpattivasena ca dvidhā pavattati. Evaṃ sabbampi catūsu bhūmīsu chattiṃsavidhaṃ
analyzed: samāpatti vasena ca dvidhā pavattati evam sabbam pi catūsu bhūmīsu chattiṃsavidham

original: vipākaviññāṇaṃ hoti.
analyzed: vipāka viññāṇam hoti

original: Kiriyaṃ pana bhūmibhedato tividhaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacarañca. Tattha
analyzed: kiriyam pana bhūmi bhedataḥ tividham kāmāvacaram rūpāvacaram arūpāvacaram ca tattha

original: kāmāvacaraṃ duvidhaṃ ahetukaṃ sahetukañca. Tattha alobhādikiriyahetuvirahitaṃ ahetukaṃ,
analyzed: kāmāvacaram duvidham ahetukam sa hetukam ca tattha alobha ādi kiriya hetu virahitam ahetukam

original: taṃ manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātubhedato duvidhaṃ.
analyzed: tam manaḥ dhātu manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu bhedataḥ duvidham

original: Tattha cakkhuviññāṇādipurecararūpādivijānanalakkhaṇā manodhātu, āvajjanarasā, rūpādiabhimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā, bhavaṅgavicchedapadaṭṭhānā, sā upekkhāyuttāva hoti.
analyzed: tattha cakkhu viññāṇa ādi purecara rūpa ādi vijānana lakkhaṇā manaḥ dhātu āvajjana rasā rūpa ādi abhimukha bhāva paccupaṭṭhānā bhavaṅga viccheda padaṭṭhānā sā upekkhā yuttā ava hoti

original: Manoviññāṇadhātu pana duvidhā sādhāraṇā asādhāraṇā ca. Tattha sādhāraṇā upekkhāsahagatāhetukakiriyā
analyzed: manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu pana duvidhā sādhāraṇā asādhāraṇā ca tattha sādhāraṇā upekkhā sahagatā ahetuka kiriyā

original: saḷārammaṇavijānanalakkhaṇā, kiccavasena pañcadvāramanodvāresu voṭṭhabbanāvajjanarasā,
tathābhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā, ahetukavipākamanoviññāṇadhātu bhavaṅgānaṃ aññatarāpagamapadaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: tathābhāva paccupaṭṭhānā ahetuka vipāka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu bhavaṅgānam aññatara apagama padaṭṭhānā

original: Asādhāraṇā somanassasahagatāhetukakiriyā saḷārammaṇavijānanalakkhaṇā, kiccavasena
analyzed: asādhāraṇā somanassa sahagatā ahetuka kiriyā saṅ ārammaṇa vijānana lakkhaṇā kicca vasena

original: arahataṃ anuḷāresu vatthūsu hasituppādanarasā, tathābhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā, ekantato
analyzed: arahatam anuḷāresu vatthūsu hasita uppādana rasā tathābhāva paccupaṭṭhānāḥ ekantato

original: hadayavatthupadaṭṭhānāti. Iti kāmāvacarakiriyaṃ ahetukaṃ tividhaṃ.
analyzed: iti kāmāvacara kiriyam ahetukam tividham

original: Sahetukaṃ pana somanassādibhedato kusalaṃ viya aṭṭhavidhaṃ. Kevalañhi kusalaṃ sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ
analyzed: sa hetukam pana somanassa ādi bhedato kusalam viya aṭṭhavidham kevalam hi kusalam sekkha puthujjanānam

original: uppajjati, idaṃ arahataṃyevāti ayamettha viseso. Evaṃ tāva kāmāvacaraṃ ekādasavidhaṃ.
analyzed: uppajjati idam arahataṃyeva ati ayam ettha visesaḥ evam tāva kāmāvacaram ekādasavidham

original: Rūpāvacaraṃ pana arūpāvacarañca kusalaṃ viya pañcavidhaṃ catubbidhañca hoti. Arahataṃ
analyzed: rūpāvacaram pana arūpāvacaram ca kusalam viya pañcavidham catubbidham ca hoti arahatam

original: uppattivaseneva cassa kusalato viseso veditabboti. Evaṃ sabbampi tīsu bhūmīsu vīsatividhaṃ
analyzed: uppatti vasena iva ca ssa kusalataḥ viseso veditabbaḥ ti evam sabbam pi tīsu bhūmīsu vīsatividham

original: kiriyaviññāṇaṃ hoti.
analyzed: kiriya viññāṇam hoti

original: 455. Iti ekavīsati kusalāni dvādasākusalāni chattiṃsa vipākāni vīsati kiriyānīti
analyzed: iti ekavīsati kusalāni dvādasa akusalāni chattiṃsa vipākāni vīsati kiriyāni iti

original: sabbānipi ekūnanavuti viññāṇāni honti. Yāni paṭisandhibhavaṅgāvajjanadassanasavanaghāyanasāyanaphusanasampaṭicchanasantīraṇavoṭṭhabbanajavanatadārammaṇacutivasena
analyzed: sabbāni api ekūnanavuti viññāṇāni honti yāni

original: cuddasahi ākārehi pavattanti.
analyzed: cuddasahi ākārehi pavattanti

original: Kathaṃ? Yadā hi aṭṭhannaṃ kāmāvacarakusalānaṃ ānubhāvena devamanussesu sattā nibbattanti,
analyzed: katham yadā hi aṭṭhannam kāmāvacara kusalānam ānubhāvena deva manussesu sattāḥ nibbattanti

original: tadā nesaṃ maraṇakāle paccupaṭṭhitaṃ kammakammanimittagatinimittānaṃ aññataraṃ ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: tadā na isam maraṇa kāle paccupaṭṭhitam kamma kamma nimitta gati nimittānam aññataram ārammaṇam

original: katvā aṭṭha sahetukakāmāvacaravipākāni, manussesu paṇḍakādibhāvaṃ āpajjamānānaṃ dubbaladvihetukakusalavipākaupekkhāsahagatāhetukavipākamanoviññāṇadhātu
analyzed: katvā aṭṭha sa hetuka kāmāvacara vipākāni manussesu paṇḍaka ādi bhāvam āpajjamānānam dubbala dvi hetuka kusala vipāka opekkhā sahagata a hetuka vipāka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu

original: cāti paṭisandhivasena nava vipākacittāni pavattanti. Yadā rūpāvacarārūpāvacarakusalānubhāvena
analyzed: ca ati paṭisandhi vasena nava vipāka cittāni pavattanti yadā rūpāvacara arūpāvacara kusala anubhāvena

original: rūpārūpabhavesu nibbattanti, tadā nesaṃ maraṇakāle paccupaṭṭhitaṃ kammanimittameva
analyzed: rūpa arūpa bhavesu nibbattanti tadā na īsam maraṇa kāle paccupaṭṭhitam kamma nimittam eva

original: ārammaṇaṃ katvā nava rūpārūpāvacaravipākāni paṭisandhivasena pavattanti.
analyzed: ārammaṇam katvā nava rūpa arūpa avacara vipākāni paṭisandhi vasena pavattanti

original: Yadā pana akusalānubhāvena apāye nibbattanti, tadā nesaṃ maraṇakāle paccupaṭṭhitaṃ
analyzed: yadā pana akusala anubhāvena apāye nibbattanti tadā na īsam maraṇa kāle paccupaṭṭhitam

original: kammakammanimittagatinimittānaṃ aññataraṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekā akusalavipākāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu
analyzed: kamma kamma nimitta gati nimittānam aññataram ārammaṇam katvā ekā akusala vipāka a hetuka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu

original: paṭisandhivasena pavattatīti evaṃ tāvettha ekūnavīsatiyā vipākaviññāṇānaṃ paṭisandhivasena pavatti veditabbā.
analyzed: paṭisandhi vasena pavattati iti evam tāva ettha ekūnavīsatiyāḥ vipāka viññāṇānam paṭisandhi vasena pavatti veditabbā

original: Paṭisandhiviññāṇe pana niruddhe taṃ taṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇamanubandhamānaṃ tassa tasseva
analyzed: paṭisandhi viññāṇe pana niruddhe tam tam paṭisandhi viññāṇam anubandhamānam tassa tassa iva

original: kammassa vipākabhūtaṃ tasmiññeva ārammaṇe tādisameva bhavaṅgaviññāṇaṃ nāma pavattati,
analyzed: kammassa vipāka bhūtam tasmin ñeva ārammaṇe tādisam eva bhavaṅgaviññāṇam nāma pavattati

original: punapi tādisanti evaṃ asati santānavinivattake aññasmiṃ cittuppāde nadīsotaṃ viya
analyzed: puna api evam asati santāna vinivattake aññasmin cittuppāde nadī sotam viya

original: supinaṃ apassato niddokkamanakālādīsu aparimāṇasaṅkhyampi pavattatiyevāti evaṃ tesaññeva
analyzed: supinam a passataḥ nidda ukkamana kāla ādīsu aparimāṇa saṅkhyam pi pavattatiyā iva ati evam tesañ eva

original: viññāṇānaṃ bhavaṅgavasenāpi pavatti veditabbā.
analyzed: viññāṇānam bhavaṅga vasena api pavatti veditabbā

original: Evaṃ pavatte pana bhavaṅgasantāne yadā sattānaṃ indriyāni ārammaṇagahaṇakkhamāni
analyzed: evam pavatte pana bhavaṅga santāne yadā sattānam indriyāni ārammaṇa gahaṇa kkhamāni

original: honti, tadā cakkhussāpāthagate rūpe rūpaṃ paṭicca cakkhupasādassa ghaṭṭanā hoti,
analyzed: honti tadā cakkhussa āpātha gate rūpe rūpam paṭicca cakkhu pasādassa ghaṭṭanā hoti

original: tato ghaṭṭanānubhāvena bhavaṅgacalanaṃ hoti, atha niruddhe bhavaṅge tadeva rūpaṃ
analyzed: tatas ghaṭṭana anubhāvena bhavaṅga calanam atha niruddhe bhavaṅge tat eva rūpam

original: ārammaṇaṃ katvā bhavaṅgaṃ vicchindamānā viya āvajjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā kiriyamanodhātu
analyzed: ārammaṇam katvā bhavaṅgam vicchindamānā viyas āvajjana kiccam sādhayamānā kiriya manaḥ dhātu

original: uppajjati. Sotadvārādīsupi eseva nayo. Manodvāre pana chabbidhepi ārammaṇe āpāthagate
analyzed: uppajjati sota dvāra ādīsu pi esa iva nayaḥ manaḥ dvāre pana chabbidhe api ārammaṇe āpātha gate

original: bhavaṅgacalanānantaraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ vicchindamānā viya āvajjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā ahetukakiriyamanoviññāṇadhātu
analyzed: bhavaṅga calana anantaram bhavaṅgam vicchindamānā viya āvajjana kiccam sādhayamānā ahetuka kiriya manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu

original: uppajjati upekkhāsahagatāti evaṃ dvinnaṃ kiriyaviññāṇānaṃ āvajjanavasena pavatti veditabbā.
analyzed: uppajjati upekkhā sahagatā ti evam dvinnam kiriya viññāṇānam āvajjana vasena pavatti veditabbā

original: Āvajjanānantaraṃ pana cakkhudvāre tāva dassanakiccaṃ sādhayamānaṃ cakkhupasādavatthukaṃ
analyzed: āvajjana anantaram pana cakkhu dvāre tāva dassana kiccam sādhayamānam cakkhu pasāda vatthukam

original: cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, sotadvārādīsu savanādikiccaṃ sādhayamānāni sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇāni
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇam sota dvāra ādīsu savana ādi kiccam sādhayamānāni sota ghāna jivhā kāya viññāṇāni

original: pavattanti. Tāni iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattesu visayesu kusalavipākāni, aniṭṭhaaniṭṭhamajjhattesu
analyzed: pavattanti tāni iṭṭha aiṭṭha majjhattesu visayesu kusala vipākāni aniṭṭha aniṭṭha majjhattesu

original: visayesu akusalavipākānīti evaṃ dasannaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ dassanasavanaghāyanasāyanaphusanavasena pavatti veditabbā.
analyzed: visayesu akusala vipākāni iti evam dasannam vipāka viññāṇānam dassana savana ghāyana sāyana phusana vasena pavatti veditabbā

original: “Cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā uppajjitvā niruddhasamanantarā uppajjati cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇa dhātuyā uppajjitvā niruddha samanantarā uppajjati cittam manaḥ mānasam

original: tajjā manodhātū”tiādivacanato pana cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ anantarā tesaññeva visayaṃ
analyzed: tad jāḥ manaḥ dhātu uti ādi vacanato pana cakkhu viññāṇa ādīnam anantarā tesam eva visayam

original: sampaṭicchamānā kusalavipākānantaraṃ kusalavipākā, akusalavipākānantaraṃ akusalavipākā
analyzed: sampaṭicchamānā kusala vipāka anantaram kusala vipākā akusala vipāka anantaram akusala vipākā

original: “Manodhātuyāpi uppajjitvā niruddhasamanantarā uppajjati cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātū”ti
analyzed: manaḥ dhātuyā api uppajjitvā niruddha samanantarā uppajjati cittam manaḥ mānasam tajjā manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu uti

original: vacanato pana manodhātuyā sampaṭicchitameva visayaṃ santīrayamānā akusalavipākamanodhātuyā
analyzed: vacanataḥ pana manaḥ dhātuyā sampaṭicchitam eva visayam akusala vipāka manaḥ dhātuyā

analyzed: upekkhā sahagatā uppajjati vipāka ahetuka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu uti evam tiṇṇam vipāka viññāṇānam

original: santīraṇavasena pavatti veditabbā.
analyzed: santi īraṇa vasena pavatti veditabbā

original: Santīraṇānantaraṃ pana tameva visayaṃ vavatthāpayamānā uppajjati kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu upekkhāsahagatāti evaṃ ekasseva kiriyaviññāṇassa voṭṭhabbanavasena pavatti veditabbā.
analyzed: santi īraṇa anantaram pana tam eva visayam vavatthāpayamānā uppajjati kiriyā hetuka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu upekkhā sahagatā ti evam ekassa iva kiriya viññāṇassa voṭṭhabbana vasena pavatti veditabbā

original: Voṭṭhabbanānantaraṃ pana sace mahantaṃ hoti rūpādiārammaṇaṃ, atha yathāvavatthāpite
analyzed: voṭṭhabbana anantaram pana sace mahantam hoti rūpa ādi ārammaṇam atha yathāvavatthāpite

original: Manodvāre pana manodvārāvajjanānantaraṃ tāniyeva. Gotrabhuto uddhaṃ rūpāvacarato

analyzed: pañca kusalāni pañca kiriyāni arūpāvacarato cattāri kusalāni cattāri kiriyāni lokuttarato

original: cattāri maggacittāni cattāri phalacittānīti imesu yaṃ yaṃ laddhapaccayaṃ hoti, taṃ
analyzed: cattāri magga cittāni cattāri phala cittāni iti imesu yam yam laddha paccayam hoti tam

original: taṃ javatīti evaṃ pañcapaññāsāya kusalākusalakiriyavipākaviññāṇānaṃ javanavasena pavatti veditabbā.

analyzed: javana avasāne pana sace pañca dvāre ati mahantam manaḥ dvāre ca vibhūtam ārammaṇam hoti

analyzed: kiñci antaram udakam iva aññasmin ārammaṇe javitam javanam anubandham

original: dvikkhattuṃ sakiṃ vā vipākaviññāṇaṃ uppajjati. Tadetaṃ javanāvasāne bhavaṅgassa ārammaṇe
analyzed: dvi kkhattum sakim vā vipāka viññāṇam uppajjati tad etam javana avasāne bhavaṅgassa ārammaṇe

analyzed: pavattana araham samānam tassa javanassa ārammaṇam ārammaṇam katvā pavatta tā tad ārammaṇa nti

original: vuccati. Evaṃ ekādasannaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ tadārammaṇavasena pavatti veditabbā.
analyzed: vuccati evam ekādasannam vipāka viññāṇānam tad ārammaṇa vasena pavatti veditabbā

original: Tadārammaṇāvasāne pana puna bhavaṅgameva pavattati, bhavaṅge vicchinne puna āvajjanādīnīti

analyzed: citta niyama vasena iva punappunam tāva pavattati yāva ekasmin bhave bhavaṅgassa parikkhayaḥ

original: Ekasmiṃ hi bhave yaṃ sabbapacchimaṃ bhavaṅgacittaṃ, taṃ tato cavanattā cutīti vuccati.
analyzed: ekasmin hi bhave yam sabba pacchimam bhavaṅga cittam tam tatas cavana ttā cutī iti vuccati

original: Tasmā tampi ekūnavīsatividhameva hoti. Evaṃ ekūnavīsatiyā vipākaviññāṇānaṃ cutivasena pavatti veditabbā.
analyzed: tasmā tat pi ekūnavīsatividham eva hoti evam ekūnavīsatiyāḥ vipāka viññāṇānam cuti vasena pavatti veditabbā

analyzed: cutito pana puna paṭisandhi paṭisandhito puna evam bhava gati ṭhiti nivāsesu

analyzed: pāpuṇāti tassa cuti citte niruddhe niruddham eva hoti iti

original: Idaṃ viññāṇakkhandhe vitthārakathāmukhaṃ.

original: Vedanākkhandhakathā
analyzed: vedanā khandha kathā

analyzed: idāni yam vuttam yaṃ kiñci vedayita lakkhaṇam sabbam tam ekatas katvā vedanā kkhandho

original: veditabbo”ti, etthāpi vedayitalakkhaṇaṃ nāma vedanāva. Yathāha – “vedayati vedayatīti

analyzed: jāti vasena tividhā kusalā akusalā abyākatā ca ati

analyzed: kāma avacarato catūhi kusalehi catūhi sa hetuka vipākehi ekena ahetuka vipākena catūhi

analyzed: sa hetuka kiriyehi ekena ahetuka kiriyena catūhi akusalehi rūpāvacarataḥ ṭhapetvā

original: Aniṭṭhaphoṭṭhabbānubhavanalakkhaṇaṃ dukkhaṃ, sampayuttānaṃ milāpanarasaṃ, kāyikābādhapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, kāyindriyapadaṭṭhānaṃ.

original: Iṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanalakkhaṇaṃ somanassaṃ, yathā tathā vā iṭṭhākārasambhogarasaṃ, cetasikaassādapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, passaddhipadaṭṭhānaṃ.

original: Aniṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanalakkhaṇaṃ domanassaṃ, yathā tathā vā aniṭṭhākārasambhogarasaṃ, cetasikābādhapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, ekanteneva hadayavatthupadaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: aniṭṭha ārammaṇa anubhavana lakkhaṇam domanassam yathā tathā vā aniṭṭha ākāra sambhoga rasam cetasika ābādha paccupaṭṭhānam ekantena iva hadaya vatthu padaṭṭhānam

original: Majjhattavedayitalakkhaṇā upekkhā, sampayuttānaṃ nātiupabrūhanamilāpanarasā, santabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā, nippītikacittapadaṭṭhānāti.

original: Idaṃ vedanākkhandhe vitthārakathāmukhaṃ.

analyzed: saññā khandha kathā

analyzed: jāti vasena tividhā kusalā akusalā abyākatā ca

analyzed: tattha kusala viññāṇa sampayuttā kusalā akusala sampayuttā akusalā abyākata sampayuttā

analyzed: abyākatā na hi tat viññāṇam atthi yam saññāya vippayuttam tasmā yattakaḥ viññāṇassa

original: bhedo, tattako saññāyāti.
analyzed: bhedo tattako saññāya

analyzed: sā pana isā evam viññāṇena sama ppabhedā api lakkhaṇa āditas sabbā ava sañjānana lakkhaṇā tat eva itanti

original: Idaṃ saññākkhandhe vitthārakathāmukhaṃ.
analyzed: idam saññā kkhandhe vitthāra kathā mukham

analyzed: saṅkhāra kkhandha kathā

analyzed: yam pana vuttam yaṃ kiñci abhisaṅkharaṇa lakkhaṇam sabbam tam ekatas katvā saṅkhāra kkhandho

original: veditabbo”ti, ettha abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇaṃ nāma rāsikaraṇalakkhaṇaṃ. Kiṃ pana tanti,
analyzed: veditabbā ti ettha abhisaṅkharaṇa lakkhaṇam nāma rāsi karaṇa lakkhaṇam kim pana tanti

analyzed: vuccanti iti te abhisaṅkharaṇa lakkhaṇāḥ āyūhana rasāḥ vipphāra paccupaṭṭhānā sesa khandha ttaya padaṭṭhānā

original: Evaṃ lakkhaṇādito ekavidhāpi ca jātivasena tividhā kusalā, akusalā, abyākatāti. Tesu kusalaviññāṇasampayuttā kusalā. Akusalasampayuttā akusalā. Abyākatasampayuttā abyākatā.

original: ime sarūpena āgatā sattavīsati. Chando, adhimokkho, manasikāro, tatramajjhattatāti
analyzed: ime sarūpena āgatā sattavīsati chandaḥ adhimokkhaḥ manasikāraḥ
