analyzed: ime cattāro karuṇā muditā kāya duccarita virati vacī duccarita virati

original: micchājīvaviratīti ime aniyatā pañca. Ete hi kadāci uppajjanti, uppajjamānāpi ca
analyzed: micchājīva virati iti ime aniyatā pañca ete hi kadāci uppajjanti uppajjamānā api ca

original: na ekato uppajjanti.
analyzed: na ekatas uppajjanti

original: 459. Tattha phusatīti phasso. Svāyaṃ phusanalakkhaṇo. Saṅghaṭṭanaraso, sannipātapaccupaṭṭhāno,
analyzed: tattha phusati iti phassaḥ svāyam phusana lakkhaṇo saṅghaṭṭana raso sannipāta paccupaṭṭhāno

original: āpāthagatavisayapadaṭṭhāno. Ayañhi arūpadhammopi samāno ārammaṇe phusanākāreneva
analyzed: āpātha gata visaya padaṭṭhānaḥ ayam hi arūpa dhammaḥ api samānaḥ ārammaṇe phusana ākārena iva

original: pavattati. Ekadesena ca analliyamānopi rūpaṃ viya cakkhu, saddo viya ca sotaṃ cittaṃ
analyzed: pavattati eka desena ca rūpam viya cakkhu saddaḥ viya ca sotam cittam

original: ārammaṇañca saṅghaṭṭeti, tikasannipātasaṅkhātassa attano kāraṇassa vasena paveditattā
analyzed: ārammaṇam ca saṅghaṭṭeti tika sannipāta saṅkhātassa attano kāraṇassa vasena pavedita ttā

original: sannipātapaccupaṭṭhāno. Tajjāsamannāhārena ceva indriyena ca parikkhate visaye anantarāyeneva
analyzed: sannipāta paccupaṭṭhāno ca iva indriyena ca parikkhate visaye anantarāyena iva

original: uppajjanato āpāthagatavisayapadaṭṭhānoti vuccati. Vedanādhiṭṭhānabhāvato pana niccammagāvī viya daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: uppajjanato āpātha gata visaya padaṭṭhāno ti vuccati vedanā adhiṭṭhāna bhāvato pana niccammagāvī viya daṭṭhabbo

original: 460. Cetayatīti cetanā. Abhisandahatīti attho. Sā cetanābhāvalakkhaṇā, āyūhanarasā,
analyzed: cetayati iti cetanāḥ abhisandahati iti attho sā cetanā bhāva lakkhaṇā āyūhana rasā

original: saṃvidahanapaccupaṭṭhānā sakiccaparakiccasādhikā jeṭṭhasissamahāvaḍḍhakīādayo viya.
analyzed: saṃvidahana paccupaṭṭhānā sa kicca para kicca sādhikā jeṭṭha sissa mahāvaḍḍhakī ādayaḥ

original: Accāyikakammānussaraṇādīsu ca panāyaṃ sampayuttānaṃ ussahanabhāvena pavattamānā pākaṭā hoti.
analyzed: accāyika kamma anussaraṇa ādīsu ca pana ayam sampayuttānam ussahana bhāvena pavattamānā pākaṭā hoti

original: Vitakkavicārapītīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ pathavīkasiṇaniddese paṭhamajjhānavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttameva.
analyzed: vitakka vicāra pītīsu yam vattabbam siyā tat sabbam pathavīkasiṇa niddese paṭhama jhāna vaṇṇanāyam vuttam eva

original: 461. Vīrabhāvo vīriyaṃ. Taṃ ussahanalakkhaṇaṃ, sahajātānaṃ upatthambhanarasaṃ, asaṃsīdanabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: vīra bhāvaḥ vīriyam tam ussahana lakkhaṇam sahajātānam upatthambhana rasam a saṃsīdana bhāva paccupaṭṭhānam

original: “Saṃviggo yoniso padahatī”ti vacanato saṃvegapadaṭṭhānaṃ, vīriyārambhavatthupadaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: saṃviggaḥ yonisaḥ padahati iti vacanato saṃvega padaṭṭhānam vīriya ārambha vatthu padaṭṭhānam

original: vā, sammā āraddhaṃ sabbasampattīnaṃ mūlaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: vā sammā āraddham sabba sampattīnam mūlam hoti iti daṭṭhabbam

original: 462. Jīvanti tena, sayaṃ vā jīvati, jīvanamattameva vā tanti jīvitaṃ. Lakkhaṇādīni
analyzed: jīvanti tena sayam vā jīvati jīvana mattam eva vā tanti jīvitam lakkhaṇa ādīni

original: panassa rūpajīvite vuttanayeneva veditabbāni. Tañhi rūpadhammānaṃ jīvitaṃ, idaṃ arūpadhammānanti
analyzed: panassa rūpa jīvite vutta nayena iva veditabbāni tat hi rūpa dhammānam jīvitam idam arūpa dhammānam ti

original: idamevettha nānākaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: idam eva itthā nānākaraṇam

original: 463. Ārammaṇe cittaṃ samaṃ ādhiyati, sammā vā ādhiyati, samādhānamattameva vā etaṃ
analyzed: ārammaṇe cittam samam ādhiyati sammā vā ādhiyati samādhāna mattam eva vai etam

original: cittassāti samādhi. So avisāralakkhaṇo, avikkhepalakkhaṇo vā, sahajātānaṃ sampiṇḍanaraso
analyzed: cittassa ati samādhi saḥ a visāra lakkhaṇaḥ avikkhepa lakkhaṇaḥ vā sahajātānam sampiṇḍana rasaḥ

original: nhāniyacuṇṇānaṃ udakaṃ viya, upasamapaccupaṭṭhāno, visesato sukhapadaṭṭhāno, nivāte
analyzed: udakam viya upasama paccupaṭṭhāno visesato sukha padaṭṭhāno nivāte

original: dīpaccīnaṃ ṭhiti viya cetaso ṭhitīti daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: dīpaccīnam ṭhiti viya cetasaḥ ṭhiti iti daṭṭhabbo

original: 464. Saddahanti etāya, sayaṃ vā saddahati, saddahanamattameva vā esāti saddhā. Sā
analyzed: sat dahanti etāya sayam vā sat dahati sat dahana mattam eva vai esā ati saddhā sā

original: saddahanalakkhaṇā, okappanalakkhaṇā vā, pasādanarasā udakappasādakamaṇi viya, pakkhandanarasā
analyzed: saddahana lakkhaṇāḥ okappana lakkhaṇāḥ vā pasādana rasāḥ udaka ppasāda kamaṇi viya pakkhandana rasāḥ

original: vā oghuttaraṇo viya. Akālussiyapaccupaṭṭhānā, adhimuttipaccupaṭṭhānā vā, saddheyyavatthupadaṭṭhānā,
analyzed: vā oghuttaraṇaḥ viya akālussiya paccupaṭṭhānā adhimutti paccupaṭṭhānā vā saddheyya vatthu padaṭṭhānā

original: saddhammassavanādisotāpattiyaṅga padaṭṭhānā vā, hatthavittabījāni viya daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: padaṭṭhānā vā hattha vitta bījāni viya daṭṭhabbā

original: 465. Saranti tāya, sayaṃ vā sarati saraṇamattameva vā esāti sati. Sā apilāpanalakkhaṇā,
analyzed: saranti tāya sayam vā sarati saraṇa mattam eva vā sati sā apilāpana lakkhaṇā

original: asammosarasā, ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā, visayābhimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā vā, thirasaññāpadaṭṭhānā,
analyzed: asammosa rasāḥ ārakkha paccupaṭṭhānāḥ visaya abhimukha bhāva paccupaṭṭhānāḥ vā thira saññā padaṭṭhānā

original: kāyādisatipaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānā vā. Ārammaṇe daḷhapatiṭṭhitattā pana esikā viya, cakkhudvārādirakkhaṇato
analyzed: kāya ādi sati paṭṭhāna padaṭṭhānā vā ārammaṇe daḷha patiṭṭhita ttā pana esikā viya cakkhu dvāra ādi rakkhaṇato

original: dovāriko viya ca daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: dovārikaḥ viya ca daṭṭhabbā

original: 466. Kāyaduccaritādīhi hiriyatīti hirī. Lajjāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tehiyeva ottappatīti
analyzed: kāya duccarita ādīhi adhivacanam

original: ottappaṃ. Pāpato ubbegassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tattha pāpato jigucchanalakkhaṇā hirī.
analyzed: ottappam pāpataḥ ubbegassa itam adhivacanam tattha pāpataḥ jigucchana lakkhaṇā hirī

original: Uttāsanalakkhaṇaṃ ottappaṃ. Lajjākārena pāpānaṃ akaraṇarasā hirī. Uttāsākārena ottappaṃ.
analyzed: uttāsana lakkhaṇam ottappam lajjā ākārena pāpānam a karaṇa rasā hirī uttāsa ākārena ottappam

original: Vuttappakāreneva ca pāpato saṅkocanapaccupaṭṭhānā etā, attagāravaparagāravapadaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: vutta ppakārena iva ca pāpataḥ saṅkocana paccupaṭṭhānā etāḥ atta gārava para gārava padaṭṭhānā

original: Attānaṃ garuṃ katvā hiriyā pāpaṃ jahāti kulavadhū viya. Paraṃ garuṃ katvā ottappena
analyzed: attānam garum katvā hiriyā pāpam jahāti kula vadhū viya param garum katvā ottappena

original: pāpaṃ jahāti vesiyā viya. Ime ca pana dve dhammā lokapālakāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: pāpam jahāti vesiyā viya ime ca pana dve dhammā lokapālakā ti daṭṭhabbā

original: 467. Na lubbhanti tena, sayaṃ vā na lubbhati, alubbhanamattameva vā tanti alobho.
analyzed: na lubbhanti tena sayam vā na lubbhati alubbhana mattam eva vā alobho

original: Adosāmohesupi eseva nayo. Tesu alobho ārammaṇe cittassa agedhalakkhaṇo, alaggabhāvalakkhaṇo
analyzed: a dosa a mohesu pi esa iva nayo tesu alobho ārammaṇe cittassa a gedha lakkhaṇo a lagga bhāva lakkhaṇo

original: vā kamaladale jalabindu viya. Apariggaharaso muttabhikkhu viya, anallīnabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno
analyzed: vā kamala dale jala bindu viya a pariggaha rasaḥ mutta bhikkhu viya an allīna bhāva paccupaṭṭhāno

original: asucimhi patitapuriso viya.
analyzed: asucimhi patita purisaḥ

original: 468. Adoso acaṇḍikkalakkhaṇo, avirodhalakkhaṇo vā anukūlamitto viya, āghātavinayaraso, pariḷāhavinayaraso vā candanaṃ viya, sommabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno puṇṇacando viya.
analyzed: adosaḥ a caṇḍikka lakkhaṇaḥ avirodha lakkhaṇaḥ vā anukūla mittaḥ viya āghāta vinaya raso pariḷāha vinaya raso vā candanam viya somma bhāva paccupaṭṭhāno puṇṇa candaḥ viya

original: 469. Amoho yathāsabhāvapaṭivedhalakkhaṇo, akkhalitapaṭivedhalakkhaṇo vā kusalissāsakhittausupaṭivedho
analyzed: amohaḥ yathā sabhāva paṭivedha lakkhaṇaḥ akkhalita paṭivedha lakkhaṇaḥ vā

original: viya, visayobhāsanaraso padīpo viya. Asammohapaccupaṭṭhāno araññagatasudesako viya.
analyzed: viya visaya ubhāsana raso padīpaḥ viya asammoha paccupaṭṭhāno arañña gata sudesako viya

original: Tayopi cete sabbakusalānaṃ mūlabhūtāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: tayo pi ca ite sabba kusalānam mūla bhūtā ati daṭṭhabbā

original: 470. Kāyassa passambhanaṃ kāyapassaddhi. Cittassa passambhanaṃ cittapassaddhi. Kāyoti
analyzed: kāyassa passambhanam kāya passaddhi cittassa passambhanam citta passaddhi kāyoti

original: cettha vedanādayo tayo khandhā. Ubhopi panetā ekato katvā kāyacittadarathavūpasamalakkhaṇā
analyzed: ca ittha vedanā ādayo tayo khandhā ubho api pana ekato katvā

original: kāyacittapassaddhiyo, kāyacittadarathanimaddanarasā, kāyacittānaṃ aparipphandanasītibhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā,
analyzed: kāya citta passaddhiyaḥ kāya citta daratha nimaddana rasā kāya cittānam a paripphandana sīti bhāva paccupaṭṭhānā

original: kāyacittapadaṭṭhānā. Kāyacittānaṃ avūpasamakarauddhaccādikilesapaṭipakkhabhūtāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: kāya citta padaṭṭhānā kāya cittānam a vūpasamaka rauddhacca ādi kilesa paṭipakkha bhūtā ati daṭṭhabbā

original: Kāyassa lahubhāvo kāyalahutā. Cittassa lahubhāvo cittalahutā. Tā kāyacittagarubhāvavūpasamalakkhaṇā,
analyzed: kāyassa lahu bhāvo kāya lahu tā cittassa lahu bhāvo citta lahu tā tā kāya citta garu bhāva vūpasama lakkhaṇā

original: kāyacittagarubhāvanimaddanarasā, kāyacittānaṃ adandhatāpaccupaṭṭhānā, kāyacittapadaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: kāya citta garu bhāva nimaddana rasā kāya cittānam adandha tā paccupaṭṭhānā kāya citta padaṭṭhānā

original: Kāyacittānaṃ garubhāvakarathinamiddhādikilesapaṭipakkhabhūtāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: kāya cittānam daṭṭhabbā

original: Kāyassa mudubhāvo kāyamudutā. Cittassa mudubhāvo cittamudutā. Tā kāyacittatthambhavūpasamalakkhaṇā,
analyzed: kāyassa mudu bhāvaḥ kāya mudu tā cittassa mudu bhāvaḥ citta mudu tā tā kāya citta tthambha vūpasama lakkhaṇā

original: kāyacittathaddhabhāvanimaddanarasā, appaṭighātapaccupaṭṭhānā, kāyacittapadaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: kāya citta thaddha bhāva nimaddana rasā appaṭighāta paccupaṭṭhānā kāya citta padaṭṭhānā

original: Kāyacittānaṃ thaddhabhāvakaradiṭṭhimānādikilesapaṭipakkhabhūtāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: kāya cittānam thaddha bhāva kara diṭṭhi māna ādi kilesa paṭipakkha bhūtā ati daṭṭhabbā

original: Kāyassa kammaññabhāvo kāyakammaññatā. Cittassa kammaññabhāvo cittakammaññatā. Tā
analyzed: kāyassa kammañña bhāvaḥ kāya kammañña tā cittassa kammañña bhāvaḥ citta kammañña tā tā

original: kāyacittākammaññabhāvavūpasamalakkhaṇā, kāyacittākammaññabhāvanimaddanarasā, kāyacittānaṃ
analyzed: kāya citta a kammañña bhāva vūpasama lakkhaṇā kāya citta a kammañña bhāva nimaddana rasā kāya cittānaṃ

original: ārammaṇakaraṇasampattipaccupaṭṭhānā, kāyacittapadaṭṭhānā. Kāyacittānaṃ akammaññabhāvakarāvasesanīvaraṇādipaṭipakkhabhūtā,
analyzed: ārammaṇa karaṇa sampatti paccupaṭṭhānā kāya citta padaṭṭhānā kāya cittānam akammañña bhāva kara avasesa nīvaraṇa ādi paṭipakkha bhūtā

original: pasādanīyavatthūsu pasādāvahā, hitakiriyāsu viniyogakkhamabhāvāvahā suvaṇṇavisuddhi viyāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: pasādanīya vatthūsu pasāda āvahā hita kiriyāsu viniyoga kkhama bhāva āvahā suvaṇṇa visuddhi viyā ti daṭṭhabbā

original: Kāyassa pāguññabhāvo kāyapāguññatā. Cittassa pāguññabhāvo cittapāguññatā. Tā kāyacittānaṃ
analyzed: kāyassa pāguñña bhāvo kāya pāguñña tā cittassa pāguñña bhāvaḥ citta pāguñña tā tā kāya cittānam

original: agelaññabhāvalakkhaṇā, kāyacittagelaññanimaddanarasā, nirādīnavapaccupaṭṭhānā, kāyacittapadaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: a gelañña bhāva lakkhaṇā kāya citta gelañña nimaddana rasā nirādīnava paccupaṭṭhānā kāya citta padaṭṭhānā

original: Kāyacittānaṃ gelaññakaraasaddhiyādipaṭipakkhabhūtāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: kāya cittānam gelañña kara asaddhiya ādi paṭipakkha bhūtā ati daṭṭhabbā

original: Kāyassa ujukabhāvo kāyujukatā. Cittassa ujukabhāvo cittujukatā. Tā kāyacittaajjavalakkhaṇā,
analyzed: kāyassa ujuka bhāvo kāya ujuka tā cittassa ujuka bhāvo citta ujuka tā tā kāya citta ajjava lakkhaṇā

original: kāyacittakuṭilabhāvanimaddanarasā, ajimhatāpaccupaṭṭhānā, kāyacittapadaṭṭhānā. Kāyacittānaṃ
analyzed: kāya citta kuṭila bhāva nimaddana rasā a jimha tā paccupaṭṭhānā kāya citta padaṭṭhānā kāya cittānaṃ

original: kuṭilabhāvakaramāyāsāṭheyyādipaṭipakkhabhūtāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: kuṭila bhāva kara māyā sāṭheyya ādi paṭipakkha bhūtā ati daṭṭhabbā

original: 471. Chandoti kattukāmatāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tasmā so kattukāmatālakkhaṇo chando,
analyzed: chandaḥ iti adhivacanam tasmā saḥ kattu kāma tā lakkhaṇaḥ chandaḥ

original: ārammaṇapariyesanaraso, ārammaṇena atthikatāpaccupaṭṭhāno, tadevassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: ārammaṇa pariyesana rasaḥ ārammaṇena atthika tā paccupaṭṭhāno tat eva assa padaṭṭhānam

original: Ārammaṇaggahaṇe ayaṃ cetaso hatthappasāraṇaṃ viya daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: ārammaṇa ggahaṇe ayam cetasaḥ hattha ppasāraṇam viya daṭṭhabbo

original: 472. Adhimuccanaṃ adhimokkho. So sanniṭṭhānalakkhaṇo, asaṃsappanaraso, nicchayapaccupaṭṭhāno, sanniṭṭheyyadhammapadaṭṭhāno, ārammaṇe niccalabhāvena indakhīlo viya daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: adhimuccanam adhimokkhaḥ saḥ sanniṭṭhāna lakkhaṇaḥ a saṃsappana rasaḥ nicchaya paccupaṭṭhānaḥ sanniṭṭheyya dhamma padaṭṭhānaḥ ārammaṇe niccala bhāvena inda khīlaḥ viya daṭṭhabbo

original: 473. Kiriyā kāro. Manamhi kāro manasikāro. Purimamanato visadisamanaṃ karotītipi manasikāro. Svāyaṃ ārammaṇapaṭipādako, vīthipaṭipādako, javanapaṭipādakoti tippakāro.
analyzed: kiriyā kāraḥ manamhi kāraḥ manasikāro purima manataḥ visadisa anam karoti iti pi manasikāro ārammaṇa paṭipādakaḥ vīthi paṭipādakaḥ javana paṭipādakaḥ iti tippakāro

original: Tattha ārammaṇapaṭipādako manamhi kāroti manasikāro. So sāraṇalakkhaṇo, sampayuttānaṃ
analyzed: tattha ārammaṇa paṭipādakaḥ manamhi kāroti manasikāro so sāraṇa lakkhaṇo sampayuttānam

original: ārammaṇe saṃyojanaraso, ārammaṇābhimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno, ārammaṇapadaṭṭhāno. Saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpanno,
analyzed: ārammaṇe saṃyojana rasaḥ ārammaṇa abhimukha bhāva paccupaṭṭhāno ārammaṇa padaṭṭhāno saṅkhāra kkhandha pariyāpanno

original: ārammaṇapaṭipādakattena sampayuttānaṃ sārathi viya daṭṭhabbo. Vīthipaṭipādakoti pana
analyzed: ārammaṇa paṭipādaka ttena sampayuttānam sārathi viya daṭṭhabbaḥ vīthi paṭipādakaḥ ti pana

original: pañcadvārāvajjanassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Javanapaṭipādakoti manodvārāvajjanassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
analyzed: pañca dvārāvajjanassa itam adhivacanam javana paṭipādakaḥ iti manaḥ dvārāvajjanassa itam adhivacanam

original: Na te idha adhippetā.
analyzed: na te idha adhippetā

original: 474. Tesu dhammesu majjhattatā tatramajjhattatā. Sā cittacetasikānaṃ samavāhitalakkhaṇā,
analyzed: tesu dhammesu majjhatta tā tatra majjhatta tā sā citta cetasikānam samavāhita lakkhaṇā

original: ūnādhikatānivāraṇarasā, pakkhapātupacchedanarasā vā, majjhattabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā,
analyzed: ūna adhika tā nivāraṇa rasā pakkhapāta upacchedana rasā vā majjhatta bhāva paccupaṭṭhānā

original: cittacetasikānaṃ ajjhupekkhanabhāvena samappavattānaṃ ājānīyānaṃ ajjhupekkhakasārathi viya daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: citta cetasikānam ajjhupekkhana bhāvena sama ppavattānam ājānīyānam ajjhupekkhaka sārathi viya daṭṭhabbā

original: Karuṇāmuditā ca brahmavihāraniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbā. Kevalañhi tā appanāppattā rūpāvacarā, imā kāmāvacarāti ayameva viseso.
analyzed: karuṇā muditā ca brahmavihāra niddese vutta nayena iva veditabbā kevalam hi tāḥ appanā appattāḥ rūpāvacarāḥ imāḥ kāmāvacarā ti ayam eva visesaḥ

original: Keci pana mettupekkhāyopi aniyatesu icchanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Atthato hi adosoyeva mettā, tatramajjhattupekkhāyeva upekkhāti.
analyzed: keci pana mettu pekkhāyaḥ api aniyatesu icchanti tam na gahetabbam atthataḥ hi adosaḥ yā iva mettā upekkhāti

original: 475. Kāyaduccaritato virati kāyaduccaritavirati. Esa nayo sesāsupi. Lakkhaṇādito
analyzed: kāya duccaritataḥ virati kāya duccarita virati esa nayo sesāsu pi lakkhaṇa ādito

original: panetā tissopi kāyaduccaritādivatthūnaṃ avītikkamalakkhaṇā, amaddanalakkhaṇāti vuttaṃ
analyzed: pana itā tissaḥ api kāya duccarita ādi vatthūnam a vītikkama lakkhaṇā a maddana lakkhaṇā ti vuttam

original: hoti. Kāyaduccaritādivatthuto saṅkocanarasā, akiriyapaccupaṭṭhānā, saddhāhirottappaappicchatādiguṇapadaṭṭhānā,
analyzed: hoti kāya duccarita ādi vatthutaḥ saṅkocana rasā akiriya paccupaṭṭhānā saddhā hira uttappa appiccha tā ādi guṇa padaṭṭhānā

original: pāpakiriyato cittassa vimukhabhāvabhūtāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: pāpa kiriyataḥ cittassa vimukha bhāva bhūtā ati daṭṭhabbā

original: 476. Iti imeva chattiṃsa saṅkhārā paṭhamena kāmāvacarakusalaviññāṇena sampayogaṃ gacchantīti veditabbā. Yathā ca paṭhamena, evaṃ dutiyenāpi. Sasaṅkhārabhāvamattameva hettha viseso.
analyzed: iti ime eva chattiṃsa saṅkhārā paṭhamena kāmāvacara kusala viññāṇena sampayogam gacchanti iti veditabbā yathā ca paṭhamena evam dutiyena api sa saṅkhāra bhāva mattam eva ha ittha visesaḥ

original: Tatiyena pana ṭhapetvā amohaṃ avasesā veditabbā. Tathā catutthena. Sasaṅkhārabhāvamattameva hettha viseso.
analyzed: tatiyena pana ṭhapetvā amoham avasesā veditabbā tathā catutthena sa saṅkhāra bhāva mattam eva ha ittha viseso

original: Paṭhame vuttesu pana ṭhapetvā pītiṃ avasesā pañcamena sampayogaṃ gacchanti. Yathā
analyzed: paṭhame vuttesu pana ṭhapetvā pītim avasesā pañcamena sampayogam gacchanti yathā

original: ca pañcamena, evaṃ chaṭṭhenāpi. Sasaṅkhārabhāvamattameva hettha viseso. Sattamena
analyzed: ca pañcamena evam chaṭṭhena api sa saṅkhāra bhāva mattam eva ha ittha visesaḥ sattamena

original: ca pana ṭhapetvā amohaṃ avasesā veditabbā. Tathā aṭṭhamena. Sasaṅkhārabhāvamattameva hettha viseso.
analyzed: ca pana ṭhapetvā amoham avasesā veditabbā tathā aṭṭhamena sa saṅkhāra bhāva mattam eva ha ittha viseso

original: Paṭhame vuttesu ṭhapetvā viratittayaṃ sesā rūpāvacarakusalesu paṭhamena sampayogaṃ
analyzed: paṭhame vuttesu ṭhapetvā virati ttayam sesāḥ rūpāvacara kusalesu paṭhamena sampayogam

original: gacchanti. Dutiyena tato vitakkavajjā. Tatiyena tato vicāravajjā. Catutthena tato
analyzed: gacchanti dutiyena tatas vitakka vajjāḥ tatiyena tatas vicāra vajjāḥ catutthena tatas

original: pītivajjā. Pañcamena tato aniyatesu karuṇāmuditāvajjā. Teyeva catūsu āruppakusalesu.
analyzed: pīti vajjā pañcamena tatas aniyatesu karuṇā muditā vajjā catūsu āruppa kusalesu

original: Arūpāvacarabhāvoyeva hi ettha viseso.
analyzed: hi ettha visesaḥ

original: Lokuttaresu paṭhamajjhānike tāva maggaviññāṇe paṭhamarūpāvacaraviññāṇe vuttanayena,
analyzed: lokuttaresu paṭhama jhānike tāva magga viññāṇe paṭhama rūpāvacara viññāṇe vutta nayena

original: dutiyajjhānikādibhede dutiyarūpāvacaraviññāṇādīsu vuttanayeneva veditabbā. Karuṇāmuditānaṃ
analyzed: dutiya jhānika ādi bhede dutiya rūpāvacara viññāṇa ādīsu vutta nayena iva veditabbā karuṇā muditānam

original: pana abhāvo, niyataviratitā, lokuttaratā cāti ayamettha viseso. Evaṃ tāva kusalāyeva saṅkhārā veditabbā.
analyzed: pana abhāvaḥ niyata virati tā lokuttara tā ca ati ayam ettha visesaḥ evam tāva kusalāya iva saṅkhārāḥ veditabbā

original: 477. Akusalesu lobhamūle paṭhamākusalasampayuttā tāva niyatā sarūpena āgatā terasa,
analyzed: akusalesu lobha mūle paṭhama akusala sampayuttā tāva niyatā sarūpena āgatā terasa

original: yevāpanakā cattāroti sattarasa. Tattha phasso, cetanā, vitakko, vicāro, pīti, vīriyaṃ,
analyzed: yevāpanakā cattāro ti sattarasa tattha phasso cetanā vitakko vicāro vīriyam

original: jīvitaṃ, samādhi, ahirikaṃ, anottappaṃ, lobho, moho, micchādiṭṭhīti ime sarūpena
analyzed: jīvitam samādhi ahirikam anottappam lobhaḥ mohaḥ micchādiṭṭhī iti ime sarūpena

original: āgatā terasa. Chando, adhimokkho, uddhaccaṃ, manasikāroti ime yevāpanakā cattāro.
analyzed: āgatā terasa chandaḥ adhimokkhaḥ uddhaccam manasikāraḥ ti ime yevāpanakā cattāro

original: 478. Tattha na hiriyatīti ahiriko. Ahirikassa bhāvo ahirikaṃ. Na otappatīti anottappaṃ.
analyzed: tattha na hiriyati iti ahirikaḥ ahirikassa bhāvaḥ ahirikam na otappati iti anottappam

original: Tesu ahirikaṃ kāyaduccaritādīhi ajigucchanalakkhaṇaṃ, alajjālakkhaṇaṃ vā. Anottappaṃ
analyzed: tesu ahirikam kāya duccarita ādīhi a jigucchana lakkhaṇam alajjā lakkhaṇam vā anottappam

original: teheva asārajjalakkhaṇaṃ, anuttāsalakkhaṇaṃ vā. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana
analyzed: tehi iva a sārajja lakkhaṇam an uttāsa lakkhaṇam vā ayam ettha saṅkhepaḥ vitthāraḥ pana

original: hirottappānaṃ vuttapaṭipakkhavasena veditabbo.
analyzed: hira uttappānam vutta paṭipakkha vasena veditabbaḥ

original: 479. Lubbhanti tena, sayaṃ vā lubbhati, lubbhanamattameva vā tanti lobho. Muyhanti
analyzed: lubbhanti tena sayam vā lubbhati lubbhana mattam eva vā lobhaḥ muyhanti

original: tena, sayaṃ vā muyhati, muyhanamattameva vā tanti moho. Tesu lobho ārammaṇaggahaṇalakkhaṇo
analyzed: tena sayam vā muyhati muyhana mattam eva vā tanti moho tesu lobho ārammaṇa ggahaṇa lakkhaṇo

original: makkaṭālepo viya, abhisaṅgaraso tattakapāle khittamaṃsapesi viya. Apariccāgapaccupaṭṭhāno
analyzed: makkaṭa ālepaḥ viya abhisaṅga rasaḥ tatta kapāle khitta maṃsa pesi viya a pariccāga paccupaṭṭhāno

original: telañjanarāgo viya. Saṃyojaniyadhammesu assādadassanapadaṭṭhāno. Taṇhānadībhāvena
analyzed: telañjana rāgaḥ viya saṃyoja niya dhammesu assāda dassana padaṭṭhāno taṇhā nadī bhāvena

original: vaḍḍhamāno sīghasotā nadī iva mahāsamuddaṃ apāyameva gahetvā gacchatīti daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: vaḍḍhamānaḥ sīghasotā nadī iva mahā samuddam apāyam eva gahetvā gacchati iti daṭṭhabbo

original: 480. Moho cittassa andhabhāvalakkhaṇo, aññāṇalakkhaṇo vā, asampaṭivedharaso, ārammaṇasabhāvacchādanaraso
analyzed: moho cittassa andha bhāva lakkhaṇaḥ aññāṇa lakkhaṇaḥ vā asampaṭivedha rasaḥ ārammaṇa sabhā avacchādana rasaḥ

original: vā, asammāpaṭipattipaccupaṭṭhāno, andhakārapaccupaṭṭhāno vā, ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhāno,
analyzed: vā asammāpaṭipatti paccupaṭṭhānaḥ andhakāra paccupaṭṭhānaḥ vā ayoniso manasikāra padaṭṭhāno

original: sabbākusalānaṃ mūlanti daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: sabba akusalānam mūlan ti daṭṭhabbaḥ

original: 481. Micchā passanti tāya, sayaṃ vā micchā passati, micchādassanamattaṃ vā esāti
analyzed: micchā passanti tāya sayam vā micchā passati micchādassana mattam vā esā ati

original: micchādiṭṭhi. Sā ayoniso abhinivesalakkhaṇā, parāmāsarasā, micchābhinivesapaccupaṭṭhānā,
analyzed: micchādiṭṭhi sā ayonisas abhinivesa lakkhaṇā parāmāsa rasā micchā abhinivesa paccupaṭṭhānā

original: ariyānaṃ adassanakāmatādipadaṭṭhānā, paramaṃ vajjanti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: ariyānam a dassana kāma tā ādi padaṭṭhānā paramam vajjanti daṭṭhabbā

original: 482. Uddhatabhāvo uddhaccaṃ. Taṃ avūpasamalakkhaṇaṃ vātābhighātacalajalaṃ viya, anavaṭṭhānarasaṃ
analyzed: uddhata bhāvaḥ uddhaccam tam a vūpasama lakkhaṇam vāta abhighāta cala jalam viya an avaṭṭhāna rasam

original: vātābhighātacaladhajapaṭākā viya, bhantattapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ pāsāṇābhighātasamuddhatabhasmaṃ
analyzed: vāta abhighāta cala dhaja paṭākāḥ viya bhantatta paccupaṭṭhānam pāsāṇa abhighāta samuddhata bhasmaṃ

original: viya, cetaso avūpasame ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhānaṃ, cittavikkhepoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: viya cetasaḥ a vūpasame a yoniso manasikāra padaṭṭhānam citta vikkhepaḥ ti daṭṭhabbam

original: Sesā kusale vuttanayeneva veditabbā. Akusalabhāvoyeva hi akusalabhāvena ca lāmakattaṃ etesaṃ tehi viseso.
analyzed: sesā kusale vutta nayena iva veditabbā akusala bhāvo yā iva hi akusala bhāvena ca lāmaka ttam etesam tehi visesaḥ

original: 483. Iti ime sattarasa saṅkhārā paṭhamena akusalaviññāṇena sampayogaṃ gacchantīti
analyzed: iti ime sattarasa saṅkhārā paṭhamena akusala viññāṇena sampayogam gacchanti iti

original: veditabbā. Yathā ca paṭhamena, evaṃ dutiyenāpi. Sasaṅkhāratā panettha thinamiddhassa
analyzed: veditabbā yathā ca paṭhamena evam dutiyena api sa saṅkhāra tā pana ittha thinamiddhassa

original: ca aniyatatā viseso.
analyzed: ca aniyata tā visesaḥ

original: Tattha thinanatā thinaṃ. Middhanatā middhaṃ. Anussāhasaṃhananatā asattivighāto cāti
analyzed: tattha thina natā thinam middha natā middham anussāha saṃhanana tā asatti vighāto ca ati

original: attho. Thinañca middhañca thinamiddhaṃ. Tattha thinaṃ anussāhalakkhaṇaṃ, vīriyavinodanarasaṃ,
analyzed: attho thinam ca middham ca thinamiddham tattha thinam anussāha lakkhaṇam vīriya vinodana rasam

original: saṃsīdanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Middhaṃ akammaññatālakkhaṇaṃ, onahanarasaṃ, līnatāpaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: saṃsīdana paccupaṭṭhānam middham akammañña tā lakkhaṇam onahana rasam līna tā paccupaṭṭhānam

original: pacalāyikāniddāpaccupaṭṭhānaṃ vā. Ubhayampi arativijambhikādīsu ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: vā ubhayam pi arati vijambhikā ādīsu a yoniso manasikāra padaṭṭhānam

original: Tatiyena paṭhame vuttesu ṭhapetvā micchādiṭṭhiṃ avasesā veditabbā. Māno panettha
analyzed: tatiyena paṭhame vuttesu ṭhapetvā micchādiṭṭhim avasesā veditabbā māno pana ittha

original: aniyato hoti. Ayaṃ viseso, so uṇṇatilakkhaṇo, sampaggaharaso, ketukamyatāpaccupaṭṭhāno,
analyzed: aniyataḥ hoti ayam visesaḥ saḥ uṇṇati lakkhaṇo sampaggaha raso ketu kamya tā paccupaṭṭhāno

original: diṭṭhivippayuttalobhapadaṭṭhāno, ummādo viya daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: diṭṭhi vippayutta lobha padaṭṭhānaḥ ummādaḥ viya daṭṭhabbo

original: Catutthena dutiye vuttesu ṭhapetvā micchādiṭṭhiṃ avasesā veditabbā. Etthāpi ca māno
analyzed: catutthena dutiye vuttesu ṭhapetvā micchādiṭṭhim avasesā veditabbā ettha api ca māno

original: aniyatesu hotiyeva. Paṭhame vuttesu pana ṭhapetvā pītiṃ avasesā pañcamena sampayogaṃ
analyzed: aniyatesu hotiyā iva paṭhame vuttesu pana ṭhapetvā pītim avasesā pañcamena sampayogam

original: gacchanti. Yathā ca pañcamena, evaṃ chaṭṭhenāpi. Sasaṅkhāratā panettha thinamiddhassa
analyzed: gacchanti yathā ca pañcamena evam chaṭṭhena api sa saṅkhāra tā pana ittha thinamiddhassa

original: ca aniyatabhāvo viseso. Sattamena pañcame vuttesu ṭhapetvā diṭṭhiṃ avasesā veditabbā.
analyzed: ca aniyata bhāvaḥ visesaḥ sattamena pañcame vuttesu ṭhapetvā diṭṭhim avasesā veditabbā

original: Māno panettha aniyato hoti. Aṭṭhamena chaṭṭhe vuttesu ṭhapetvā diṭṭhiṃ avasesā veditabbā.
analyzed: mānaḥ pana ittha aniyataḥ hoti aṭṭhamena chaṭṭhe vuttesu ṭhapetvā diṭṭhim avasesā veditabbā

original: Etthāpi ca māno aniyatesu hotiyevāti.
analyzed: ettha api ca mānaḥ aniyatesu

original: 484. Dosamūlesu pana dvīsu paṭhamasampayuttā tāva niyatā sarūpena āgatā ekādasa,
analyzed: dosa mūlesu pana dvīsu paṭhama sampayuttā tāva niyatā sarūpena āgatā ekādasa

original: yevāpanakā cattāro, aniyatā tayoti aṭṭhārasa. Tattha phasso, cetanā, vitakko, vicāro,
analyzed: yevāpanakā cattāro aniyatā tayo ti aṭṭhārasa tattha phasso cetanā vitakko vicāro

original: vīriyaṃ, jīvitaṃ, samādhi, ahirikaṃ, anoppattaṃ, doso, mohoti ime sarūpena āgatā
analyzed: vīriyam jīvitam samādhi ahirikam anoppattam dosaḥ mohaḥ ti ime sarūpena āgatā

original: ekādasa. Chando, adhimokkho, uddhaccaṃ, manasikāroti ime yevāpanakā cattāro. Issā,
analyzed: ekādasa chandaḥ adhimokkhaḥ uddhaccam manasikāraḥ ti ime yevāpanakā cattāraḥ issā

original: macchariyaṃ, kukkuccanti ime aniyatā tayo.
analyzed: mat śariyam kukkuccanti ime aniyatā tayaḥ

original: 485. Tattha dussanti tena, sayaṃ vā dussati, dussanamattameva vā tanti doso. So caṇḍikkalakkhaṇo
analyzed: tattha dussanti tena sayam vā dussati dussana mattam eva vā doso saḥ caṇḍikka lakkhaṇo

original: pahaṭāsīviso viya, visappanaraso visanipāto viya, attano nissayadahanaraso vā dāvaggi
analyzed: pahaṭa asīvisaḥ viya visappana rasaḥ visa nipātaḥ viya attanaḥ nissaya dahana rasaḥ vā

original: viya. Dūsanapaccupaṭṭhāno laddhokāso viya sapatto, āghātavatthupadaṭṭhāno, visasaṃsaṭṭhapūtimuttaṃ viya daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: viya dūsana paccupaṭṭhānaḥ laddha ukāsaḥ viya sa pattaḥ āghāta vatthu padaṭṭhānaḥ visa saṃsaṭṭha pūtimuttam viya daṭṭhabbo

original: 486. Issāyanā issā. Sā parasampattīnaṃ usūyanalakkhaṇā. Tattheva anabhiratirasā, tato vimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā, parasampattipadaṭṭhānā, saṃyojananti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: issāyanā issā sā para sampattīnam usūyana lakkhaṇā tattha eva anabhirati rasā tatas vimukha bhāva paccupaṭṭhānā para sampatti padaṭṭhānā saṃyojanan ti daṭṭhabbā

original: 487. Maccharabhāvo macchariyaṃ. Taṃ laddhānaṃ vā labhitabbānaṃ vā attano sampattīnaṃ
analyzed: macchara bhāvaḥ macchariyam tam laddhānam vā labhitabbānam vā attanaḥ sampattīnam

original: nigūhanalakkhaṇaṃ, tāsaṃyeva parehi sādhāraṇabhāvaakkhamanarasaṃ, saṅkocanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: nigūhana lakkhaṇam tāsam yeva parehi sādhāraṇa bhāva akkhamana rasam saṅkocana paccupaṭṭhānam

original: kaṭukañcukatāpaccupaṭṭhānaṃ vā, attasampattipadaṭṭhānaṃ, cetaso virūpabhāvoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: kaṭu kañcuka tā paccupaṭṭhānam vā atta sampatti padaṭṭhānam cetasaḥ virūpa bhāvaḥ ti daṭṭhabbam

original: 488. Kucchitaṃ kataṃ kukataṃ. Tassa bhāvo kukkuccaṃ. Taṃ pacchānutāpalakkhaṇaṃ, katākatānusocanarasaṃ,
analyzed: kucchitam katam kukatam tassa bhāvaḥ kukkuccam tam pacchā anutāpa lakkhaṇam kata akata anusocana rasam

original: vippaṭisārapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, katākatapadaṭṭhānaṃ, dāsabyamiva daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sesā vuttappakārāyevāti.
analyzed: vippaṭisāra paccupaṭṭhānam kata akata padaṭṭhānam dāsabyam iva daṭṭhabbam sesāḥ vutta ppakārāya eva ati

original: Iti ime aṭṭhārasa saṅkhārā paṭhamena dosamūlena sampayogaṃ gacchantīti veditabbā. Yathā ca paṭhamena, evaṃ dutiyenāpi. Sasaṅkhāratā pana aniyatesu ca thinamiddhasambhavova viseso.
analyzed: iti ime aṭṭhārasa saṅkhārā paṭhamena dosa mūlena sampayogam gacchanti iti veditabbā yathā ca paṭhamena evam dutiyena api sa saṅkhāra tā pana aniyatesu ca viseso

original: 489. Mohamūlesu dvīsu vicikicchāsampayuttena tāva phasso, cetanā, vitakko, vicāro,
analyzed: moha mūlesu dvīsu vicikicchā sampayuttena tāva phasso cetanā vitakko vicāro

original: vīriyaṃ, jīvitaṃ, cittaṭṭhiti, ahirikaṃ, anottappaṃ, moho, vicikicchāti sarūpena
analyzed: vīriyam jīvitam citta ṭṭhiti ahirikam anottappam mohaḥ vicikicchā ati sarūpena

original: āgatā ekādasa, uddhaccaṃ, manasikāroti yevāpanakā dve cāti terasa.
analyzed: āgatāḥ ekādasaḥ uddhaccam yevāpanakāḥ dve ca ati terasa

original: 490. Tattha cittaṭṭhitīti pavattiṭṭhitimatto dubbalo samādhi. Vigatā cikicchāti vicikicchā.
analyzed: tattha citta ṭṭhiti iti pavatti ṭṭhitimattaḥ dubbalaḥ samādhi vigatā cikicchā ati vicikicchā

original: Sā saṃsayalakkhaṇā, kampanarasā, anicchayapaccupaṭṭhānā, anekaṃsagāhapaccupaṭṭhānā
analyzed: sā saṃsaya lakkhaṇā kampana rasā anicchaya paccupaṭṭhānā aneka sagāha paccupaṭṭhānā

original: vā, vicikicchāyaṃ ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhānā, paṭipattiantarāyakarāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: vā vicikicchāyam a yoniso manasikāra padaṭṭhānā paṭipatti antarāya karā ati daṭṭhabbā

original: Sesā vuttappakārāyeva.
analyzed: sesāḥ vutta ppakārāya iva

original: Uddhaccasampayuttena vicikicchāsampayutte vuttesu ṭhapetvā vicikicchaṃ sesā dvādasa.

original: yevāpanakavasenāti evaṃ akusalasaṅkhārā veditabbā.

original: 491. Abyākatesu vipākābyākatā tāva ahetukasahetukabhedato duvidhā. Tesu ahetukavipākaviññāṇasampayuttā

analyzed: ahetukā tattha kusala akusala vipāka cakkhu viññāṇa sampayuttā tāva phasso cetanā jīvitam

original: cittaṭṭhitīti sarūpena āgatā cattāro, yevāpanako manasikāroyevāti pañca. Sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇasampayuttāpi
analyzed: citta ṭṭhiti iti sarūpena āgatā cattāro yevāpanakaḥ manasikāraḥ yevā ati pañca sota ghāna jivhā kāya viññāṇa sampayuttā api

original: eteyeva. Ubhayavipākamanodhātuyā ete ceva vitakkavicārādhimokkhā cāti aṭṭha, tathā
analyzed: ubhaya vipāka manaḥ dhātuyā ete ca iva vitakka vicāra adhimokkhā ca ati aṭṭha tathā

original: pīti adhikā hotīti veditabbā.
analyzed: pi iti adhikā hoti iti veditabbā

original: Sahetukavipākaviññāṇasampayuttā pana sahetukā. Tesu aṭṭhakāmāvacaravipākasampayuttā

original: karuṇāmuditā, tā sattārammaṇattā vipākesu na santi. Ekantaparittārammaṇā hi kāmāvacaravipākā.

analyzed: na kevalam ca karuṇā muditāḥ viratiyaḥ api vipākesu na santi pañca sikkhāpadā kusalāya iva ati hi vuttam

original: Rūpāvacarārūpāvacaralokuttaravipākaviññāṇasampayuttā pana tesaṃ kusalaviññāṇasampayuttasaṅkhārehi sadisā eva.
analyzed: rūpāvacara arūpāvacara lokuttara vipāka viññāṇa sampayuttā pana tesam kusala viññāṇa sampayutta saṅkhārehi sadisā eva

original: 492. Kiriyābyākatāpi ahetukasahetukabhedato duvidhā. Tesu ahetukakiriyaviññāṇasampayuttā
analyzed: api

original: pana vīriyaṃ adhikaṃ. Vīriyasabbhāvato balappatto samādhi hoti. Ayamettha viseso.

original: Sahetukakiriyaviññāṇasampayuttā pana sahetukā. Tesu aṭṭhakāmāvacarakiriyaviññāṇasampayuttā

original: Atītādivibhāgakathā
493. Bhagavatā pana –
analyzed: bhagavatā pana

original: kiñci atītaṃ, kiñci anāgatādibhedanti. Esa nayo vedanādīsu.

original: 494. Tattha rūpaṃ tāva addhāsantatisamayakhaṇavasena catudhā atītaṃ nāma hoti. Tathā anāgatapaccuppannaṃ.

analyzed: paccuppannam tatas pubbe visabhāga otu āhāra samuṭṭhānam atītam pacchā anāgatam citta jam

original: Samayavasena ekamuhuttapubbaṇhasāyanharattindivādīsu samayesu santānavasena pavattamānaṃ taṃ taṃ samayaṃ paccuppannaṃ nāma, tato pubbe atītaṃ, pacchā anāgataṃ.
analyzed: samaya vasena eka muhutta pubbaṇha sāyanha rattindiva ādīsu samayesu santāna vasena pavattamānam tam tam samayam paccuppannam nāma tatas pubbe atītam pacchā anāgatam

analyzed: pubbe anāgatam pacchā atītam ettha ca nippariyāyā sesā sa pariyāyā

original: 495. Ajjhattabahiddhābhedo vuttanayo eva. Apica idha niyakajjhattampi ajjhattaṃ parapuggalikampi ca bahiddhāti veditabbaṃ. Oḷārikasukhumabhedo vuttanayova.
analyzed: ajjhatta bahiddhā bhedaḥ vutta nayaḥ eva api ca idha niyaka jjhattam pi ajjhattam parapuggalikam pi ca bahiddhā ti veditabbam oḷārika sukhuma bhedaḥ vutta nayaḥ uva

original: 496. Hīnapaṇītabhedo duvidho pariyāyato nippariyāyato ca. Tattha akaniṭṭhānaṃ rūpato

original: Dūre santiketi idampi vuttanayameva. Apica okāsatopettha upādāyupādāya dūrasantikatā veditabbā.

original: 498. Yathā ca rūpaṃ, evaṃ vedanādayopi vedayitalakkhaṇādīsu rāsibhāvūpagamanena. Na hi vedanādīhi aññe vedanākkhandhādayo nāma atthi.

original: Atītādivibhāge panettha santativasena khaṇādivasena ca vedanāya atītānāgatapaccuppannabhāvo

original: 499. Oḷārikasukhumabhedo “akusalā vedanā oḷārikā, kusalābyākatā vedanā sukhumā”tiādinā

original: Evaṃ tāva jātivasena oḷārikasukhumatā veditabbā.
analyzed: evam tāva jāti vasena oḷārika sukhuma tā veditabbā

original: 500. Sabhāvavasena pana dukkhā vedanā nirassādato, savipphārato, khobhakaraṇato,

analyzed: oḷārika sukhuma tā veditabbā

analyzed: abyākatā vedanā sukhumā dukkhā vedanā oḷārikā samāpannassa vedanā sukhumā a samāpannassa

original: vedanā oḷārikā. Sāsavā vedanā oḷārikā. Anāsavā vedanā sukhumā”ti. Yathā ca dukkhā

original: vinicchayanayo viññātabbo. Saṅkhepato hi pañcupādānakkhandhā āsīvisūpame vuttanayena
analyzed: vinicchaya nayaḥ viññātabbo saṅkhepataḥ hi pañca upādāna khandhāḥ āsīvisa upame vutta nayena

original: ukkhittāsikapaccatthikato, bhārasuttavasena bhārato, khajjanīyapariyāyavasena khādakato,
analyzed: ukkhitta āsika paccatthikataḥ bhāra sutta vasena bhārataḥ khajjanīya pariyāya vasena khādakato

original: yamakasuttavasena aniccadukkhānattasaṅkhatavadhakato daṭṭhabbā. Vitthārato panettha
analyzed: yamaka sutta vasena anicca dukkha anatta saṅkhata vadhakataḥ daṭṭhabbā vitthārato pana ittha

original: pheṇapiṇḍo viya rūpaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, parimaddanāsahanato. Udakapubbuḷaṃ viya vedanā,
analyzed: pheṇa piṇḍaḥ viya rūpam daṭṭhabbam parimaddana a sahanataḥ udaka pubbuḷam viya vedanā

original: muhuttaramaṇīyato. Marīcikā viya saññā, vippalambhanato. Kadalikkhandho viya saṅkhārā,
analyzed: muhutta ramaṇīyataḥ marīcikāḥ viya saññā vippalambhanato kadali kkhandhaḥ viya saṅkhārā

original: asārakato. Māyā viya viññāṇaṃ, vañcakato. Visesato ca suḷārampi ajjhattikaṃ rūpaṃ

original: asubhanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vedanā tīhi dukkhatāhi avinimuttato dukkhāti. Saññāsaṅkhārā
analyzed: asubhanti daṭṭhabbam vedanā tīhi dukkha tāhi a vinimuttataḥ dukkhā ati saññā saṅkhārā

original: avidheyyato anattāti. Viññāṇaṃ udayabbayadhammato aniccanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: a vidheyyataḥ anattā ati viññāṇam udaya bbaya dhammataḥ aniccanti daṭṭhabbam

original: 509. Evaṃ passantassatthasiddhitoti evañca saṅkhepavitthāravasena dvidhā passato
analyzed: evam passantassa attha siddhitaḥ ti evam ca saṅkhepa vitthāra vasena dvidhā passato

analyzed: yā vinicchaya nayaḥ viññātabbo seyyathidam saṅkhepato tāva

original: pañcupādānakkhandhe ukkhittāsikapaccatthikādibhāvena passanto khandhehi na vihaññati.
analyzed: pañca upādānakkhandhe ukkhitta asika paccatthika ādi bhāvena passantaḥ khandhehi na vihaññati

original: Vitthārato pana rūpādīni pheṇapiṇḍādisadisabhāvena passanto na asāresu sāradassī hoti.
analyzed: vitthārato pana rūpa ādīni pheṇa piṇḍa ādi sadisa bhāvena passantaḥ na asāresu sāra dassī hoti

analyzed: vedanam dukkhato passanto phassa āhāram parijānāti dukkhe sukhanti vipallāsam pajahati

original: bhindati, sīlabbatupādānaṃ na upādiyati.
analyzed: bhindati na upādiyati

analyzed: saññam saṅkhāre ca anattataḥ passantaḥ manaḥ sañcetanā āhāram parijānāti anattani attā ati

analyzed: anāsavaḥ hoti idaṃsacca abhinivesa kāya gantham bhindati attavāt upādānam na upādiyati

original: bhindati, diṭṭhupādānaṃ na upādiyati.
analyzed: bhindati diṭṭhupādānam na upādiyati

original: Evaṃ mahānisaṃsaṃ, vadhakādivasena dassanaṃ yasmā;
analyzed: evam mahā nisaṃsam vadhaka ādi vasena dassanam yasmā

analyzed: paññā bhāvanā adhikāre

Cuddasamo paricchedo.

analyzed: āyatana vitthāra kathā

original: Munātīti mano. Attano lakkhaṇaṃ dhārentīti dhammā.
analyzed: munāti iti manaḥ attanaḥ lakkhaṇam dhārenti iti dhammā

original: 511. Avisesato pana āyatanato, āyānaṃ tananato, āyatassa ca nayanato āyatananti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: avisesataḥ pana āyatanataḥ āyānam tananataḥ āyatassa ca nayanataḥ āyatananti veditabbam

original: Cakkhurūpādīsu hi taṃtaṃdvārārammaṇā cittacetasikā dhammā sena sena anubhavanādinā

original: kiccena āyatanti uṭṭhahanti ghaṭanti, vāyamantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Te ca āyabhūte dhamme
analyzed: kiccena āyatanti uṭṭhahanti ghaṭanti vā āyamanti iti vuttam hoti te ca āya bhūte dhamme

original: etāni tanonti, vitthārentīti vuttaṃ hoti, idañca anamatagge saṃsāre pavattaṃ atīva

original: āyataṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ yāva na nivattati, tāva nayanteva, pavattayantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: āyatam saṃsāra dukkham yāva na nivattati tāva nayantā iva pavattayanti iti vuttam hoti

original: Iti sabbepime dhammā āyatanato, āyānaṃ tananato, āyatassa ca nayanato āyatanaṃ āyatananti vuccanti.
analyzed: iti sabbe pi ime dhammā āyatanataḥ āyānam tananataḥ āyatassa ca nayanataḥ āyatanam āyatananti vuccanti

original: 512. Apica nivāsaṭṭhānaṭṭhena ākaraṭṭhena samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṭṭhena sañjātidesaṭṭhena
analyzed: apica nivāsa ṭṭhāna ṭṭhena ākara ṭṭhena samosaraṇa ṭṭhāna ṭṭhena sañjāti desa ṭṭhena

original: kāraṇaṭṭhena ca āyatanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tathā hi loke “issarāyatanaṃ vāsudevāyatana”ntiādīsu
analyzed: kāraṇa ṭṭhena ca āyatanam veditabbam tathā hi loke issara āyatanam vāsudeva āyatana nti ādīsu

original: nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ āyatananti vuccati. “Suvaṇṇāyatanaṃ rajatāyatana”ntiādīsu ākaro. Sāsane
analyzed: nivāsa ṭṭhānam āyatananti vuccati suvaṇṇāyatanam rajatāyatana nti ādīsu ākaraḥ sāsane

original: pana “manoramme āyatane sevanti naṃ vihaṅgamā”tiādīsu samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ. “Dakkhiṇāpatho
analyzed: pana manoramme āyatane sevanti nam vihaṅgamāti ādīsu samosaraṇa ṭhānam dakkhiṇāpatho

original: gunnaṃ āyatana”ntiādīsu sañjātideso. “Tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇāti sati
analyzed: gunnam āyatana nti ādīsu sañjā atidesaḥ tatra tatra iva sakkhibhabbatam pāpuṇāti sati

original: satiāyatane”tiādīsu kāraṇaṃ.
analyzed: kāraṇam

original: Cakkhuādīsu cāpi te te cittacetasikā dhammā nivasanti tadāyattavuttitāyāti cakkhādayo
analyzed: cakkhu ādīsu ca api te te citta cetasikāḥ dhammāḥ nivasanti tad āyatta vutti tāya ati cakkhu ādayaḥ

original: ca nesaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ. Cakkhādīsu ca te ākiṇṇā tannissitattā tadārammaṇattā cāti

original: cakkhādayo nesaṃ ākaro. Cakkhādayo ca nesaṃ samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ, tattha tattha vatthudvārārammaṇavasena
analyzed: cakkhu ādayo ākaro cakkhu ādayo ca nesam samosaraṇa ṭhānam tattha tattha vatthu dvāra ārammaṇa vasena

analyzed: samosaraṇato cakkha ādayo ca na isam sañjā atideso tad nissaya ārammaṇa bhāvena tattha eva

original: uppattito. Cakkhādayo ca nesaṃ kāraṇaṃ, tesaṃ abhāve abhāvatoti. Iti nivāsaṭṭhānaṭṭhena,

original: ākaraṭṭhena, samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṭṭhena, sañjātidesaṭṭhena, kāraṇaṭṭhenacāti imehipi
analyzed: ākara ṭṭhena samosaraṇa ṭhāna ṭṭhena sañjā atidesa ṭṭhena kāraṇa ṭṭhena ca ati imehi pi

original: kāraṇehi ete dhammā āyatanaṃ āyatananti vuccanti.
analyzed: kāraṇehi ete dhammā āyatanam āyatananti vuccanti

original: Tasmā yathāvuttena atthena cakkhu ca taṃ āyatanañcāti cakkhāyatanaṃ…pe… dhammā ca te āyatanañcāti dhammāyatananti evaṃ tāvettha atthato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
analyzed: tasmā yathā vuttena atthena cakkhu ca tam āyatanam ca ati cakkhāyatanam pe dhammā ca te āyatanam ca ati dhamma āyatanam ti evam tāva ettha atthataḥ viññātabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ

original: 513. Lakkhaṇāti cakkhādīnaṃ lakkhaṇatopettha viññātabbo vinicchayo. Tāni ca pana tesaṃ lakkhaṇāni khandhaniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
analyzed: lakkhaṇā ti cakkha ādīnam lakkhaṇa tā upa ittha viññātabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ tāni ca pana tesam lakkhaṇāni khandha niddese vutta nayena iva veditabbāni

original: Tāvatvatoti tāvabhāvato. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – cakkhādayopi hi dhammā eva, evaṃ sati

original: idha channaṃ viññāṇakāyānaṃ dvārabhāvena ārammaṇabhāvena ca vavatthānato ayametesaṃ

analyzed: bahu upakāra ttā ajjhattikesu cakkhāyatana sotāyatanāni paṭhamam desitāni tatas ghānāyatana ādīni

original: tīṇi, pañcannampi gocaravisayattā ante manāyatanaṃ, cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ pana gocarattā
analyzed: tīṇi gocara visaya ttā ante mana āyatanam cakkhu āyatana ādīnam pana gocara ttā

original: tassa tassa antarantarāni bāhiresu rūpāyatanādīni. Apica viññāṇuppattikāraṇavavatthānatopi
analyzed: tassa tassa antarantarāni bāhiresu rūpa āyatana ādīni api ca viññāṇa uppatti kāraṇa vavatthānataḥ pi

analyzed: honti vitthārato pana ajjhattikesu tāva cakkhāyatanam jāti vasena cakkhu pasāda mattam eva

original: Manāyatanaṃ kusalākusalavipākakiriyaviññāṇabhedena ekūnanavutippabhedaṃ ekavīsuttarasatappabhedañca.

original: Vatthupaṭipadādibhedato pana anantappabhedaṃ. Rūpasaddagandharasāyatanāni visabhāgapaccayādibhedato

original: Veneyyasattahadayesu tamo payātīti.
analyzed: veneyya satta hadayesu tamaḥ payāti iti

original: Evamettha tāvatvato veditabbo vinicchayo.
analyzed: evam ettha tāva tvataḥ veditabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ

original: 522. Saṅkhatoti cakkhudhātu tāva jātito eko dhammotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati cakkhupasādavasena,
analyzed: saṅkhato ti cakkhu dhātu tāva jātitaḥ ekaḥ dhammo tvā iva saṅkham gacchati cakkhu pasāda vasena

original: tathā sotaghānajivhākāyarūpasaddagandharasadhātuyo sotappasādādivasena, phoṭṭhabbadhātu
analyzed: tathā sota ghāna jivhā kāya rūpa sadda gandha rasa dhātuyo sota ppasāda ādi vasena phoṭṭhabba dhātu

original: pana pathavītejovāyovasena tayo dhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Cakkhuviññāṇadhātu kusalākusalavipākavasena
analyzed: pana pathavī tejaḥ vāyaḥ vasena tayo dhammā ati saṅkham gacchati cakkhu viññāṇa dhātu kusala akusala vipāka vasena

original: dve dhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati, tathā sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇadhātuyo. Manodhātu
analyzed: dve dhammā ati saṅkham gacchati tathā sota ghāna jivhā kāya viññāṇa dhātuyaḥ manaḥ dhātu

original: pana pañcadvārāvajjanakusalākusalavipākasampaṭicchanavasena tayo dhammāti saṅkhaṃ

original: gacchati. Dhammadhātu tiṇṇaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ soḷasannaṃ sukhumarūpānaṃ asaṅkhatāya

original: ca dhātuyā vasena vīsati dhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Manoviññāṇadhātu sesakusalākusalābyākataviññāṇavasena
analyzed: ca dhātuyāḥ vasena vīsati dhammā ati saṅkham gacchati manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu sesa kusala akusala abyākata viññāṇa vasena

original: chasattati dhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Evamettha saṅkhatopi veditabbo vinicchayo.
analyzed: saṅkham gacchati evam ettha veditabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ

original: 523. Paccayāti ettha ca cakkhudhātu tāva cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā vippayuttapurejātaatthiavigatanissayindriyapaccayānaṃ

original: vasena chahi paccayehi paccayo hoti, rūpadhātu purejātaatthiavigatārammaṇapaccayānaṃ
analyzed: vasena chahi paccayehi paccayaḥ hoti rūpa dhātu purejāta atthi avigata ārammaṇa paccayānam

original: vasena catūhi paccayehi paccayo hoti. Evaṃ sotaviññāṇadhātuādīnaṃ sotadhātusaddadhātuādayo.
analyzed: vasena catūhi paccayehi paccayaḥ hoti evam sota viññāṇa dhātu ādīnam sota dhātu sadda dhātu ādayo

original: Pañcannaṃ pana nesaṃ āvajjanamanodhātu anantarasamanantaranatthivigatānantarūpanissayavasena
analyzed: pañcannam pana āvajjana manaḥ dhātu anantara samanantara natthi vigata ananta rūpa nissaya vasena

original: pañcahi paccayehi paccayo hoti, tā ca pañcapi sampaṭicchanamanodhātuyā. Tathā sampaṭicchanamanodhātu
analyzed: pañcahi paccayehi paccayaḥ hoti tā ca sampaṭicchana manaḥ dhātuyā tathā sampaṭicchana manaḥ dhātu

original: santīraṇamanoviññāṇadhātuyā, sā ca voṭṭhabbanamanoviññāṇadhātuyā, voṭṭhabbanamanoviññāṇadhātu
analyzed: santīraṇa manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyā sā ca voṭṭhabbana manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyā voṭṭhabbana manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu

original: ca javanamanoviññāṇadhātuyā. Javanamanoviññāṇadhātu pana anantarāya javanamanoviññāṇadhātuyā

original: tehi ceva pañcahi āsevanapaccayena cāti chahi paccayehi paccayo hoti. Esa tāva pañcadvāre nayo.
analyzed: tehi ca iva pañcahi āsevana paccayena ca ati chahi paccayehi paccayaḥ hoti esa tāva pañca dvāre nayo

original: Manodvāre pana bhavaṅgamanoviññāṇadhātu āvajjanamanoviññāṇadhātuyā. Āvajjanamanoviññāṇadhātu
analyzed: manaḥ dvāre pana bhavaṅga manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu āvajjana manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyāḥ āvajjana manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu

original: ca javanamanoviññāṇadhātuyā purimehi pañcahi paccayehi paccayo hoti. Dhammadhātu
analyzed: ca javana manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyāḥ purimehi pañcahi paccayehi paccayaḥ hoti dhammadhātu

original: pana sattannampi viññāṇadhātūnaṃ sahajātaaññamaññanissayasampayuttaatthiavigatādīhi

original: bahudhā paccayo hoti. Cakkhudhātuādayo pana ekaccā ca dhammadhātu ekaccāya manoviññāṇadhātuyā
analyzed: bahudhā paccayaḥ hoti cakkhu dhātu ādayaḥ pana ekaccā ca dhammadhātu ekaccāya manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyā

original: paccayā honti, atha kho ālokādayopi. Tenāhu pubbācariyā –

original: “Cakkhurūpālokamanasikāre paṭicca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ. Sotasaddavivaramanasikāre
analyzed: cakkhu rūpa āloka manasikāre paṭicca uppajjati cakkhu viññāṇam sota sadda vivara manasikāre

original: paṭicca uppajjati kāyaviññāṇaṃ. Bhavaṅgamanadhammamanasikāre paṭicca uppajjati manoviññāṇa”nti.
analyzed: paṭicca uppajjati kāya viññāṇam bhavaṅgamana dhamma manasikāre paṭicca uppajjati manaḥ viññāṇan ti

original: Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthārato pana paccayappabhedo paṭiccasamuppādaniddese āvibhavissatīti evamettha paccayatopi veditabbo vinicchayo.
analyzed: ayam ettha saṅkhepaḥ vitthārataḥ pana paccaya ppabhedaḥ paṭiccasamuppāda niddese āvibhavissati iti evam ettha paccayataḥ pi veditabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ

original: 524. Daṭṭhabbatoti daṭṭhabbatopettha vinicchayo veditabboti attho. Sabbā eva hi saṅkhatadhātuyo

analyzed: pubbanta aparanta vivittataḥ dhuva subha sukhatta bhāva suññataḥ paccaya āyatta vuttitaḥ ca daṭṭhabbā

original: Visesato panettha bheritalaṃ viya cakkhudhātu daṭṭhabbā, daṇḍo viya rūpadhātu, saddo

original: viya cakkhuviññāṇadhātu. Tathā ādāsatalaṃ viya cakkhudhātu, mukhaṃ viya rūpadhātu,

original: viya rūpadhātu, ucchurasatelāni viya cakkhuviññāṇadhātu. Tathā adharāraṇī viya cakkhudhātu,

original: uttarāraṇī viya rūpadhātu, aggi viya cakkhuviññāṇadhātu. Esa nayo sotadhātuādīsu.
analyzed: uttarāraṇī viya rūpa dhātu aggi viya cakkhu viññāṇa dhātu esa nayo sota dhātu ādīsu

original: Manodhātu pana yathāsambhavato cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādīnaṃ purecarānucarā viya daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: manaḥ dhātu pana yathāsambhavato cakkhu viññāṇa dhātu ādīnam purecara anucarā viya daṭṭhabbā

original: Dhammadhātuyā vedanākkhandho sallamiva sūlamiva ca daṭṭhabbo. Saññāsaṅkhārakkhandhā

analyzed: khura cakkam viya daṭṭhabbam asaṅkhatā pana dhātu amatataḥ santataḥ khemataḥ ca daṭṭhabbā

analyzed: kasmā sabba anattha āvahassa paṭipakkha bhūta ttā

original: 16. Indriyasaccaniddeso
Indriyavitthārakathā
analyzed: indriya vitthāra kathā

original: Ko pana nesaṃ indriyaṭṭho nāmāti? Indaliṅgaṭṭho indriyaṭṭho. Indadesitaṭṭho indriyaṭṭho.

original: Indadiṭṭhaṭṭho indriyaṭṭho. Indasiṭṭhaṭṭho indriyaṭṭho. Indajuṭṭhaṭṭho indriyaṭṭho.
analyzed: inda diṭṭha aṭṭhaḥ indriya ṭṭhaḥ inda siṭṭha aṭṭhaḥ indriya ṭṭhaḥ inda juṭṭha aṭṭhaḥ indriya ṭṭhaḥ

original: So sabbopi idha yathāyogaṃ yujjati. Bhagavā hi sammāsambuddho paramissariyabhāvato
analyzed: saḥ sabbaḥ api idha yathāyogam yujjati bhagavā hi sammāsambuddhaḥ para missariya bhāvataḥ

original: indo. Kusalākusalañca kammaṃ, kammesu kassaci issariyābhāvato. Tenevettha kammasañjanitāni

original: tāva indriyāni kusalākusalakammaṃ ulliṅgenti. Tena ca siṭṭhānīti indaliṅgaṭṭhena

original: abhisambuddhāni cāti indadesitaṭṭhena indadiṭṭhaṭṭhena ca indriyāni. Teneva bhagavatā

original: Apica ādhipaccasaṅkhātena issariyaṭṭhenāpi etāni indriyāni. Cakkhuviññāṇādippavattiyañhi

original: tāvettha atthato vinicchayo.

original: Lakkhaṇādīhīti lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānehipi cakkhādīnaṃ vinicchayaṃ vijāniyāti

original: atthato amohoyeva. Sesāni tattha sarūpeneva āgatāni.
analyzed: atthataḥ sesāni tattha sarūpena iva āgatāni

original: 526. Kamatoti ayampi desanākkamova. Tattha ajjhattadhamme pariññāya ariyabhūmipaṭilābho

original: tato jīvitindriyaṃ. Yāva tassa pavatti, tāva etesaṃ vedayitānaṃ anivatti. Yañca kiñci

original: 534. Kathaṃ atthuddhārato? Idhāyaṃ sacca-saddo anekesu atthesu dissati. Seyyathidaṃ

original: – “saccaṃ bhaṇe na kujjheyyā”tiādīsu vācāsacce. “Sacce ṭhitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā cā”tiādīsu
analyzed: saccam bhaṇe na kujjheyya ati ādīsu vācā asacce sacce ṭhitā samaṇa brāhmaṇā ca ati ādīsu

original: viratisacce. “Kasmā nu saccāni vadanti nānā pavādiyāse kusalāvadānā”tiādīsu diṭṭhisacce.
analyzed: virati sacce kasmai nu saccāni vadanti nānā kusala avadāna ati ādīsu diṭṭhi sacce

original: “Ekaṃ hi saccaṃ na dutiya”ntiādīsu paramatthasacce nibbāne ceva magge ca. “Catunnaṃ
analyzed: ekam hi saccam na dutiyam ti ādīsu paramattha sacce nibbāne ca iva magge ca catunnam

original: ariyasaccānaṃ kati kusalā”tiādīsu ariyasacce. Svāyamidhāpi ariyasacce vattatīti evamettha
analyzed: ariya saccānam kati kusala ati ādīsu ariya sacce svāyam idha api ariya sacce vattati iti evam ettha

original: atthuddhāratopi vinicchayo veditabbo.
analyzed: attha uddhārataḥ pi vinicchayaḥ veditabbo

original: 535. Anūnādhikatoti kasmā pana cattāreva ariyasaccāni vuttāni anūnāni anadhikānīti
analyzed: anūna adhikato ti kasmā pana cattāri eva ariya saccāni vuttāni anūnāni anadhikāni iti

original: ce? Aññassāsambhavato aññatarassa ca apaneyyābhāvato. Na hi etehi aññaṃ adhikaṃ vā,
analyzed: ce aññassa asambhavataḥ aññatarassa ca apaneyya abhāvataḥ na hi etehi aññam adhikam vā

original: etesaṃ vā ekampi apanetabbaṃ sambhoti. Yathāha – “idha, bhikkhave, āgaccheyya samaṇo
analyzed: etesam vā ekam pi apanetabbam yathā āha idha bhikkhave āgaccheyya samaṇaḥ

original: vā brāhmaṇo vā ‘netaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, aññaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ. Ahametaṃ dukkhaṃ
analyzed: vā brāhmaṇaḥ vā na itam dukkham ariya saccaṃ aññam dukkham ariya saccaṃ aham etam dukkham

original: ariyasaccaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ paññapessāmī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”tiādi.
analyzed: ariya saccam ṭhapetvā aññam dukkham ariya saccam paññapessāmi iti na etam ṭhānam vijjati itiādi

original: Yathā cāha – “yo hi koci, bhikkhave, samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṃ vadeyya ‘netaṃ dukkhaṃ
analyzed: yathā ca āha yaḥ hi koci bhikkhave samaṇaḥ vā brāhmaṇaḥ vā evam vadeyya na itam dukkham

original: paṭhamaṃ ariyasaccaṃ yaṃ samaṇena gotamena desitaṃ, ahametaṃ dukkhaṃ paṭhamaṃ ariyasaccaṃ
analyzed: paṭhamam ariya saccam yam samaṇena gotamena desitam aham etam dukkham paṭhamam ariya saccaṃ

original: paccakkhāya aññaṃ dukkhaṃ paṭhamaṃ ariyasaccaṃ paññapessāmī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”tiādi.
analyzed: paccakkhāya aññam dukkham paṭhamam ariya saccam paññapessāmi iti na etam ṭhānam vijjati itiādi

original: Apica pavattimācikkhanto bhagavā sahetukaṃ ācikkhi, nivattiñca saupāyaṃ. Iti pavattinivattitadubhayahetūnaṃ
analyzed: apica pavattim ācikkhantaḥ bhagavā sa hetukam ācikkhi nivattim ca sa upāyam iti pavatti nivatti tad ubhaya hetūnam

original: taṇhāvatthutaṇhātaṇhānirodhataṇhānirodhupāyānaṃ, ālayaālayārāmatāālayasamugghātaālayasamugghātupāyānañca

original: vasenāpi cattāreva vuttānīti evamettha anūnādhikato vinicchayo veditabbo.
analyzed: vasena api cattāraḥ eva vuttāni iti evam ettha anūna adhikataḥ vinicchayaḥ veditabbo

original: 536. Kamatoti ayampi desanākkamova. Ettha ca oḷārikattā, sabbasattasādhāraṇattā ca
analyzed: kamato ti ayam pi desanā kkamaḥ u ettha ca oḷārika ttā sabba satta sādhāraṇa ttā ca

original: suviññeyyanti dukkhasaccaṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasseva hetudassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ

analyzed: samudaya saccam hetu nirodhā phala nirodhā uti ñāpana ttham tatas nirodha saccam tad adhigama upāya dassana ttham

analyzed: ante magga saccam vā sattānam saṃvega janana attham paṭhamam

original: dukkhamāha. Taṃ neva akataṃ āgacchati, na issaranimmānādito hoti, ito pana hotīti
analyzed: dukkham āha tam na iva a katam āgacchati na issara nimmānāt itas hoti itas pana hoti iti

original: ñāpanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ samudayaṃ. Tato sahetukena dukkhena abhibhūtattā saṃviggamānasānaṃ
analyzed: ñāpana ttham tad anantaram samudayam tatas sa hetukena dukkhena abhibhūta ttā saṃvigga mānasānam

original: dukkhanissaraṇagavesīnaṃ nissaraṇadassanena assāsajananatthaṃ nirodhaṃ. Tato nirodhādhigamatthaṃ

original: nirodhasampāpakaṃ magganti evamettha kamato vinicchayo veditabbo.
analyzed: nirodha sampāpakam magganti evam ettha kamataḥ vinicchayaḥ veditabbo

original: 537. Jātiādīnaṃ nicchayāti ye te ariyasaccāni niddisantena bhagavatā “jātipi dukkhā,
analyzed: jāti ādīnam ye te ariya saccāni niddisantena bhagavatā dukkhā

original: jarāpi dukkhā, maraṇampi dukkhaṃ, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsāpi dukkhā, appiyehi

original: pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā”ti dukkhaniddese dvādasa dhammā, “yāyaṃ taṇhā ponobbhavikā
analyzed: pañca upādānakkhandhāḥ dukkhā ati dukkha niddese dvādasa dhammāḥ yā ayam taṇhā ponobbhavikā

analyzed: samudaya niddese tividhā taṇhā yo tassāya eva taṇhāya asesa virāga nirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo

original: Dukkhaniddesakathā
analyzed: dukkha niddesa kathā

original: Jātiniddeso
analyzed: jāti niddeso

original: Seyyathidaṃ, ayañhi jāti-saddo anekattho. Tathā hesa “ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo”ti

analyzed: ettha bhave āgataḥ atthi visākhe nigaṇṭhā nāma samaṇa jātī iti ettha nikāye jāti

original: Sā panesā tattha tattha bhave paṭhamābhinibbattilakkhaṇā, niyyātanarasā, atītabhavato idha ummujjanapaccupaṭṭhānā, dukkhavicittatāpaccupaṭṭhānā vā.

original: 539. Kasmā panesā dukkhāti ce? Anekesaṃ dukkhānaṃ vatthubhāvato. Anekāni hi dukkhāni.
analyzed: kasmā pana esā dukkhā ati ce anekesam dukkhānam vatthu bhāvataḥ anekāni hi dukkhāni

original: appaṭicchannadukkhaṃ, pariyāyadukkhaṃ, nippariyāyadukkhanti.
analyzed: appaṭicchanna dukkham pariyāya dukkham nippariyāya dukkham ti

original: Tattha kāyikacetasikā dukkhā vedanāsabhāvato ca nāmato ca dukkhattā dukkhadukkhanti vuccati.

original: Sukhā vedanā vipariṇāmena dukkhuppattihetuto vipariṇāmadukkhaṃ.
analyzed: sukhā vedanā vipariṇāmena dukkha uppatti hetutaḥ vipariṇāma dukkham

original: Upekkhā vedanā ceva avasesā ca tebhūmakā saṅkhārā udayabbayappaṭipīḷitattā saṅkhāradukkhaṃ.
analyzed: upekkhā vedanā ca iva avasesā ca tebhūmakā saṅkhārāḥ udaya bbaya paṭipīḍita ttā saṅkhāra dukkham

original: Kaṇṇasūladantasūlarāgajapariḷāhadosajapariḷāhādi kāyikacetasiko ābādho pucchitvā

original: Dvattiṃsakammakāraṇādisamuṭṭhāno ābādho apucchitvāva jānitabbato upakkamassa ca pākaṭabhāvato appaṭicchannadukkhaṃ nāma. Pākaṭadukkhantipi vuccati.

original: Ṭhapetvā dukkhadukkhaṃ sesaṃ dukkhasaccavibhaṅge āgataṃ jātiādi sabbampi tassa tassa dukkhassa vatthubhāvato pariyāyadukkhaṃ. Dukkhadukkhaṃ pana nippariyāyadukkhanti vuccati.

original: Tatrāyaṃ jāti yaṃ taṃ bālapaṇḍitasuttādīsu bhagavatāpi upamāvasena pakāsitaṃ āpāyikaṃ

original: dukkhaṃ, yañca sugatiyampi manussaloke gabbhokkantimūlakādibhedaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajjati,
analyzed: dukkham yat ca sugatiyam pi manussa loke gabbha ukkanti mūlaka ādi bhedam dukkham uppajjati

original: tassa vatthubhāvato dukkhā.
analyzed: tassa vatthu bhāvataḥ dukkhā

analyzed: tatra idam gabbha ukkanti mūlaka ādi bhedam dukkham ayam hi sattaḥ mātukucchimhi nibbattamānaḥ

analyzed: udara paṭala piṭṭhi kaṇṭakānam vemajjhe parama sambādhe tibbandhakāre nānā kuṇapa gandha paribhāvita parama duggandha pavana vicarite

analyzed: piṭṭhapiṇḍi viya sediyamāno samiñjana pasāraṇa ādi rahitaḥ adhimattam dukkham anubhoti iti

analyzed: yam pana saḥ mātu sahasā upakkhalana gamana nisīdana vuṭṭhāna parivattana ādīsu

analyzed: upakkamena adhimattam dukkham anubhavati yat ca mātu sītu udaka pāna kāle sīta naraka upapannaḥ

analyzed: viya uṇha yāgu bhatta ādi ajjhoharaṇa kāle aṅgāra vuṭṭhi samparikiṇṇaḥ viya loṇambila ādi ajjhoharaṇa kāle

analyzed: mahā nāgassa naraka sattassa viya ca saṅghāta pabbatehi vicuṇṇiyamānassa dukkham uppajjati

original: idaṃ vijāyanamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ.
analyzed: idam vijāyana mūlakam dukkham

analyzed: na aññathā tena āha

original: 555. Ayaṃ panattho – tassāyeva taṇhāyāti tassā “ponobbhavikā”ti vatvā kāmataṇhādivasena

analyzed: nibbāna kathā

original: 557. Nattheva nibbānaṃ, sasavisāṇaṃ viya anupalabbhanīyatoti ce? Na, upāyena upalabbhanīyato.
analyzed: nattha iva nibbānam sa sa visāṇam viya an upalabbhanīya to ti ce na upāyena upalabbhanīyato

analyzed: lokuttara cittam viya tasmai anupalabbhanīyataḥ natthi iti na vattabbam na hi yam

original: bālaputhujjanā na upalabhanti, taṃ natthī”ti vattabbaṃ.
analyzed: bāla puthujjanāḥ na upalabhanti tat natthi iti vattabbam

original: 558. Apica nibbānaṃ natthīti na vattabbaṃ, kasmā? Paṭipattiyā vañjhabhāvāpajjanato.
analyzed: apica nibbānam natthi iti na vattabbam kasmā paṭipattiyāḥ vañjha bhāva āpajjanato

original: vañjhabhāvo āpajjati. Na cāyaṃ vañjhā, nibbānapāpanatoti. Na paṭipattiyā vañjhabhāvāpatti,

original: abhāvapāpakattāti ce. Na, atītānāgatābhāvepi nibbānapattiyā abhāvato. Vattamānānampi

original: Tadā kilesānaṃ avattamānattā na dosoti ce. Na, ariyamaggassa niratthakabhāvāpajjanato.

original: Evañhi sati ariyamaggakkhaṇato pubbepi kilesā na santīti ariyamaggassa niratthakabhāvo
analyzed: evam hi sati ariya magga kkhaṇato pubbe pi kilesā na santi iti ariya maggassa niratthaka bhāvaḥ

original: āpajjati. Tasmā akāraṇametaṃ.
analyzed: āpajjati tasmai akāraṇam etam

original: 559. “Yo kho, āvuso, rāgakkhayo”tiādivacanato “khayo nibbāna”nti ce. Na, arahattassāpi
analyzed: yaḥ kho āvuso rāga khayaḥ ti ādi vacanataḥ khayaḥ nibbānan ti ce na arahattassa api

original: khayamattāpajjanato. Tampi hi “yo kho, āvuso, rāgakkhayo”tiādinā nayena niddiṭṭhaṃ.
analyzed: khaya matta āpajjanataḥ tam pi hi yaḥ kho āvuso rāga khayaḥ iti ādinā nayena niddiṭṭham

original: Kiñca bhiyyo nibbānassa ittarakālādippattidosato. Evañhi sati nibbānaṃ ittarakālaṃ,
analyzed: kiñca bhiyyas nibbānassa ittara kāla ādi ppatti dosataḥ evam hi sati nibbānam ittara kālam

original: dukkhañcātipi āpajjati. Yasmā khayā paṭṭhāya na bhiyyo pavatti nāma hoti, tassa nibbānabhāvato
analyzed: dukkham ca ati pi āpajjati yasmā khayā paṭṭhāya na bhiyyas pavatti nāma hoti tassa nibbāna bhāvato

analyzed: na dosaḥ ti ce na tādisassa khayassa abhāvataḥ bhāve pi ca ssa vutta ppakāra dosa anativattanato

original: ariyamaggassa ca nibbānabhāvāpajjanato. Ariyamaggo hi dose khīṇeti, tasmā khayoti
analyzed: ariya maggassa ca nibbāna bhāva āpajjanato ariya maggaḥ hi dose khīṇe ti tasmā

original: Anuppattinirodhasaṅkhātassa pana khayassa pariyāyena upanissayattā, yassa upanissayo
analyzed: anuppatti nirodha saṅkhātassa pana khayassa pariyāyena upanissaya ttā yassa upanissayaḥ

original: hoti tadupacārena “khayo”ti vuttaṃ. Sarūpeneva kasmā na vuttanti ce. Atisukhumattā.
analyzed: tad upacārena khayaḥ iti vuttam sarūpena iva kasmā na vuttam iti ce ati sukhuma tā

original: Atisukhumatā cassa bhagavato apposukkabhāvāvahanato, ariyena cakkhunā passitabbato ca siddhāti.
analyzed: ati sukhumatā ca ssa bhagavataḥ apposukka bhāva āvahanataḥ ariyena cakkhunā passitabbato ca siddhā ati

original: 560. Tayidaṃ maggasamaṅginā pattabbato asādhāraṇaṃ, purimakoṭiyā abhāvato appabhavaṃ.
analyzed: tayā idam magga samaṅginā pattabbataḥ asādhāraṇam purima koṭiyāḥ abhāvataḥ appabhavam

original: Maggabhāve bhāvato na appabhavanti ce. Na, maggena anuppādanīyato. Pattabbameva hetaṃ

original: Nibbānasseva aṇuādīnampi niccabhāvāpattīti ce. Na, hetuno abhāvā. Nibbānassa niccattā

analyzed: ce na asiddha ttā

original: 561. Yathāvuttayuttisabbhāvato pana idameva niccaṃ, rūpasabhāvātikkamato arūpaṃ.
analyzed: yathā vutta yutti sabbhāvataḥ pana idam eva niccam rūpa sabhāva atikkamataḥ arūpam

original: Buddhādīnaṃ niṭṭhāya visesābhāvato ekāva niṭṭhā. Yena bhāvanāya pattaṃ, tassa kilesavūpasamaṃ,

original: sabhāvato nibbānaṃ nāvijjamānaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ “atthi, bhikkhave, ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhata”nti.

original: Idaṃ dukkhanirodhaniddese vinicchayakathāmukhaṃ.

original: Magganiddesakathā
analyzed: magga niddesa kathā

atthato pakāsitāyeva, idha pana nesaṃ ekakkhaṇe pavattamānānaṃ visesāvabodhanatthaṃ

original: vadāma. Saṅkhepato hi catusaccapaṭivedhāya paṭipannassa yogino nibbānārammaṇaṃ avijjānusayasamugghātakaṃ
analyzed: vadāma saṅkhepataḥ hi catu sacca paṭivedhāya paṭipannassa yogino nibbāna ārammaṇam avijjā anusaya samugghātakam

original: paññācakkhu sammādiṭṭhi. Sā sammā dassanalakkhaṇā, dhātuppakāsanarasā, avijjandhakāraviddhaṃsanapaccupaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: paññācakkhu sammādiṭṭhi sā sammā dassana lakkhaṇā dhātu pakāsana rasā avijja andhakāra viddhaṃsana paccupaṭṭhānā

original: Tathā sampannadiṭṭhino taṃsampayuttaṃ micchāsaṅkappanighātakaṃ cetaso nibbānapadābhiniropanaṃ
analyzed: tathā sampanna diṭṭhinaḥ tad sampayuttam micchā saṅkappa nighātakam cetasaḥ nibbāna pada abhiniropanam

original: sammāsaṅkappo. So sammā cittābhiniropanalakkhaṇo, appanāraso, micchāsaṅkappappahānapaccupaṭṭhāno.
analyzed: sammāsaṅkappo so sammā citta abhiniropana lakkhaṇo appanā rasaḥ micchā saṅkappa ppahāna paccupaṭṭhāno

original: Tathā passato vitakkayato ca taṃsampayuttāva vacīduccaritasamugghātikā micchāvācāya
analyzed: tathā passataḥ vitakkayataḥ ca vacī duccarita samugghātikā micchā vācāya

original: virati sammāvācā nāma. Sā pariggahalakkhaṇā, viramaṇarasā, micchāvācāppahānapaccupaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: virati sammāvācā nāma sā pariggaha lakkhaṇā viramaṇa rasā micchāvācā ppahāna paccupaṭṭhānā

original: Tathā viramato taṃsampayuttāva micchākammantasamucchedikā pāṇātipātādivirati sammākammanto
analyzed: tathā viramataḥ micchā kammanta samucchedikā pāṇa atipāta ādi virati sammā kammantaḥ

original: nāma. So samuṭṭhāpanalakkhaṇo, viramaṇaraso, micchākammantappahānapaccupaṭṭhāno.
analyzed: nāma so samuṭṭhāpana lakkhaṇaḥ viramaṇa rasaḥ micchā kammanta ppahāna paccupaṭṭhāno

original: Yā panassa tesaṃ sammāvācākammantānaṃ visuddhibhūtā taṃsampayuttāva kuhanādiupacchedikā
analyzed: yā pana assa tesam sammā vācā kammantānam visuddhi bhūtā tad sampayuttā ava kuhanā ādi upacchedikā

original: micchājīvavirati, so sammāājīvo nāma. So vodānalakkhaṇo, ñāyājīvapavattiraso, micchājīvappahānapaccupaṭṭhāno.
analyzed: micchājīva virati so sammāājīvaḥ nāma saḥ vodāna lakkhaṇaḥ ñāyājīva pavatti rasaḥ micchājīva ppahāna paccupaṭṭhāno

original: Athassa yo tassā sammāvācākammantājīvasaṅkhātāya sīlabhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhitassa tadanurūpo
analyzed: athassa yaḥ tassā sammā vācā kammanta ājīva saṅkhātāya sīla bhūmiyam patiṭṭhitassa tad anurūpaḥ

original: taṃsampayuttova kosajjasamucchedako vīriyārambho, esa sammāvāyāmo nāma. So paggahalakkhaṇo,
analyzed: tad sampayuttaḥ uva kosajja samucchedako vīriya ārambho esa sammāvāyāmaḥ nāma so paggaha lakkhaṇo

original: anuppannaakusalānuppādanādiraso, micchāvāyāmappahānapaccupaṭṭhāno. Tassevaṃ vāyamato
analyzed: anuppanna akusala anuppādana ādi rasaḥ micchāvāyāma pahāna paccupaṭṭhāno tassa ivam vāyamataḥ

original: taṃsampayuttova micchāsativiniddhunano cetaso asammoso sammāsati nāma. Sā upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇā,
analyzed: tad sampayuttaḥ uva micchā sati viniddhunanaḥ cetasaḥ asammoso sammāsati nāma sā upaṭṭhāna lakkhaṇā

original: asammussanarasā, micchāsatippahānapaccupaṭṭhānā. Evaṃ anuttarāya satiyā saṃrakkhiyamānacittassa
analyzed: a sammussana rasāḥ micchāsati pahāna paccupaṭṭhānāḥ evam anuttarāya satiyā saṃrakkhiyamāna cittassa

original: taṃsampayuttāva micchāsamādhividdhaṃsikā cittekaggatā sammāsamādhi nāma. So avikkhepalakkhaṇo,
analyzed: tad sampayuttā ava citta ekagga tā sammāsamādhi nāma saḥ avikkhepa lakkhaṇo

original: samādhānaraso, micchāsamādhippahānapaccupaṭṭhānoti. Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadāniddese
analyzed: samādhāna rasaḥ micchāsamādhi ppahāna paccupaṭṭhāno ti ayaṃ dukkha nirodha gāmini paṭipadā niddese

original: nayo. Evamettha jātiādīnaṃ vinicchayo veditabbo.
analyzed: evam ettha jāti ādīnam vinicchayaḥ veditabbo

original: 563. Ñāṇakiccatoti saccañāṇassa kiccatopi vinicchayo veditabbo. Duvidhaṃ hi saccañāṇaṃ
analyzed: ñāṇa kiccato ti sacca ñāṇassa kiccataḥ pi vinicchayaḥ veditabbaḥ duvidham hi sacca ñāṇam

original: – anubodhañāṇaṃ paṭivedhañāṇañca. Tattha anubodhañāṇaṃ lokiyaṃ anussavādivasena nirodhe
analyzed: anubodha ñāṇam paṭivedha ñāṇam ca tattha anubodha ñāṇam lokiyam anussava ādi vasena nirodhe

original: magge ca pavattati. Paṭivedhañāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ nirodhamārammaṇaṃ katvā kiccato cattāri
analyzed: magge ca pavattati paṭivedha ñāṇam lokuttaram nirodham ārammaṇam katvā kiccato cattāri

original: saccāni paṭivijjhati. Yathāha – “yo, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ passati, dukkhasamudayampi
analyzed: saccāni paṭivijjhati yathā āha yaḥ bhikkhave dukkham passati dukkha samudayam pi

original: so passati, dukkhanirodhampi passati, dukkhanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadampi passatī”ti
analyzed: so passati dukkha nirodham pi passati dukkha nirodha gāminim paṭipadam pi passati iti

original: sabbaṃ vattabbaṃ. Taṃ panassa kiccaṃ ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyaṃ āvibhavissati.
analyzed: sabbam vattabbam tam panassa kiccam ñāṇa dassana visuddhiyam

original: Yaṃ panetaṃ lokiyaṃ, tattha dukkhañāṇaṃ pariyuṭṭhānābhibhavavasena pavattamānaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ
analyzed: yam pana etam lokiyam tattha dukkha ñāṇam pariyuṭṭhāna abhibhava vasena pavattamānam sakkāyadiṭṭhim

original: nivatteti. Samudayañāṇaṃ ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ. Nirodhañāṇaṃ sassatadiṭṭhiṃ. Maggañāṇaṃ
analyzed: nivatteti samudaya ñāṇam uccheda diṭṭhim nirodha ñāṇam sassata diṭṭhim magga ñāṇam

original: akiriyadiṭṭhiṃ. Dukkhañāṇaṃ vā dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvavirahitesu khandhesu dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvasaññāsaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: akiriya diṭṭhim dukkha ñāṇam vā dhuva subha sukhatta bhāva virahitesu khandhesu dhuva subha sukhatta bhāva saññā saṅkhātam

original: phale vippaṭipattiṃ. Samudayañāṇaṃ issarapadhānakālasabhāvādīhi loko pavattatīti
analyzed: phale vippaṭipattim samudaya ñāṇam issara padhāna kāla sabhāva ādīhi loko pavattati iti

original: akāraṇe kāraṇābhimānappavattaṃ hetumhi vippaṭipattiṃ. Nirodhañāṇaṃ arūpalokalokathūpikādīsu
analyzed: akāraṇe kāraṇa abhimāna ppavattam hetumhi vippaṭipattim nirodha ñāṇam arūpa loka loka thūpika ādīsu

original: apavaggagāhabhūtaṃ nirodhe vippaṭipattiṃ. Maggañāṇaṃ kāmasukhallikaattakilamathānuyogappabhede
analyzed: apavagga gāha bhūtam nirodhe vippaṭipattim magga ñāṇam kāma sukhallika atta kilamatha anuyoga ppabhede

original: avisuddhimagge visuddhimaggagāhavasena pavattaṃ upāye vippaṭipattiṃ nivatteti. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
analyzed: a visuddhi magge visuddhi magga gāha vasena pavattam upāye vippaṭipattim nivatteti tena itam vuccati

original: “Loke lokappabhave, lokatthagame sive ca tadupāye;
analyzed: loke loka ppabhave lokattha game sive ca tad upāye

original: Sammuyhati tāva naro, na vijānāti yāva saccānī”ti.
analyzed: sammuyhati tāva naraḥ na vijānāti yāva saccāni iti

original: Evamettha ñāṇakiccatopi vinicchayo veditabbo.
analyzed: evam ettha ñāṇa kiccataḥ pi vinicchayaḥ veditabbo

original: 564. Antogadhānaṃ pabhedāti dukkhasaccasmiṃ hi ṭhapetvā taṇhañceva anāsavadhamme
analyzed: antogadhānam dukkha saccasmim hi ṭhapetvā taṇham ca iva anāsava dhamme

original: ca sesā sabbadhammā antogadhā. Samudayasacce chattiṃsa taṇhāvicaritāni. Nirodhasaccaṃ
analyzed: ca sesā sabba dhammā antogadhā samudaya sacce chattiṃsa taṇhā vicaritāni nirodha saccam

original: asammissaṃ. Maggasacce sammādiṭṭhimukhena vīmaṃsiddhipādapaññindriyapaññābaladhammavicayasambojjhaṅgāni.
analyzed: a sammissam magga sacce sammādiṭṭhi mukhena vīmaṃsi ddhipāda paññindriya paññā bala dhammavicaya sambojjhaṅgāni

original: Sammāsaṅkappāpadesena tayo nekkhammavitakkādayo. Sammāvācāpadesena cattāri vacīsucaritāni.
analyzed: sammā saṅkappa apadesena tayaḥ nekkhamma vitakka ādayaḥ sammā vācā apadesena cattāri vacī su caritāni

original: Sammākammantāpadesena tīṇi kāyasucaritāni. Sammājīvamukhena appicchatā santuṭṭhitā
analyzed: sammā kammanta apadesena tīṇi kāya su caritāni sammājīva mukhena appiccha tā santuṭṭhi tā

original: ca. Sabbesaṃyeva vā etesaṃ sammāvācākammantājīvānaṃ ariyakantasīlattā ariyakantasīlassa
analyzed: ca sabbesam yeva vā etesam sammā vācā kammanta ājīvānam ariya kanta sīla ttā ariya kanta sīlassa

original: ca saddhāhatthena paṭiggahetabbattā tesaṃ atthitāya atthibhāvato saddhindriyasaddhābalachandiddhipādā.
analyzed: ca saddhā hatthena paṭiggahetabba ttā tesam atthitāya atthi bhāvato saddhi indriya saddhā bala chandi ddhipādā

original: Sammāvāyāmāpadesena catubbidhasammappadhānavīriyindriyavīriyabalavīriyasambojjhaṅgāni.
analyzed: sammāvāyāma apadesena catubbidha sammappadhāna vīriyindriya vīriya bala vīriya sambojjhaṅgāni

original: Sammāsatiapadesena catubbidhasatipaṭṭhānasatindriyasatibalasatisambojjhaṅgāni. Sammāsamādhiapadesena
analyzed: sammā sati apadesena catubbidha sati paṭṭhāna sati indriya sati bala sati sambojjhaṅgāni sammā samādhi apadesena

original: savitakkasavicārādayo tayo samādhī cittasamādhi samādhindriyasamādhibalapītipassaddhisamādhiupekkhāsambojjhaṅgāni
analyzed: sa vitakka sa vicāra ādayo tayo samādhī citta samādhi samādhi indriya samādhi bala pīti passaddhi samādhi upekkhā sambojjhaṅgāni

original: antogadhānīti evamettha antogadhānaṃ pabhedatopi vinicchayo veditabbo.
analyzed: antogadhāni iti evam ettha antogadhānam pabhedataḥ pi vinicchayaḥ veditabbo

original: 565. Upamātoti bhāro viya hi dukkhasaccaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, bhārādānamiva samudayasaccaṃ,
analyzed: upamātaḥ ti bhāraḥ viya hi dukkha saccam daṭṭhabbam bhāra ādānam iva samudaya saccam

original: bhāranikkhepanamiva nirodhasaccaṃ, bhāranikkhepanupāyo viya maggasaccaṃ. Rogo viya
analyzed: bhāra nikkhepanam iva nirodha saccam bhāra nikkhepana upāyaḥ viya magga saccam rogaḥ viya

original: ca dukkhasaccaṃ, roganidānamiva samudayasaccaṃ, rogavūpasamo viya nirodhasaccaṃ,
analyzed: ca dukkha saccam roga nidānam iva samudaya saccam roga vūpasamaḥ viya nirodha saccam

original: bhesajjamiva maggasaccaṃ. Dubbhikkhamiva vā dukkhasaccaṃ, dubbuṭṭhi viya samudayasaccaṃ,
analyzed: bhesajjam iva magga saccam dubbhikkham iva vā dukkha saccam viya samudaya saccam

original: subhikkhamiva nirodhasaccaṃ, suvuṭṭhi viya maggasaccaṃ. Apica verī-veramūla-verasamugghāta-verasamugghātupāyehi,
analyzed: subhikkham iva nirodha saccam viya magga saccam apica verī vera mūla vera samugghāta vera samugghāta upāyehi

original: visarukkha-rukkhamūla-mūlupaccheda-tadupacchedupāyehi, bhaya-bhayamūla-nibbhaya-tadadhigamupāyehi,
analyzed: visa rukkha rukkha mūla mūla upaccheda tad upaccheda upāyehi bhaya bhaya mūla nibbhaya tad adhigama upāyehi

original: orimatīra-mahoghapārimatīra-taṃsampāpakavāyāmehi ca yojetvāpetāni upamāto veditabbānīti
analyzed: ca upamātaḥ veditabbāni iti

original: evamettha upamāto vinicchayo veditabbo.
analyzed: evam ettha upamātaḥ vinicchayaḥ veditabbo

original: 566. Catukkatoti atthi cettha dukkhaṃ na ariyasaccaṃ, atthi ariyasaccaṃ na dukkhaṃ,
analyzed: catukkato ti atthi ca ittha dukkham na ariya saccaṃ atthi ariya saccam na dukkham

original: atthi dukkhañceva ariyasaccañca, atthi neva dukkhaṃ na ariyasaccaṃ. Esa nayo samudayādīsu.
analyzed: atthi dukkham ca iva ariya saccaṃ ca atthi na iva dukkham na ariya saccaṃ esa nayaḥ samudaya ādīsu

original: Tattha maggasampayuttā dhammā sāmaññaphalāni ca “yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti vacanato
analyzed: tattha magga sampayuttāḥ dhammāḥ sāmañña phalāni ca yat aniccam tat dukkhan ti vacanato

original: saṅkhāradukkhatāya dukkhaṃ, na ariyasaccaṃ. Nirodho ariyasaccaṃ, na dukkhaṃ. Itaraṃ
analyzed: saṅkhāra dukkha tāya dukkham na ariya saccam nirodhaḥ ariya saccam na dukkham itaram

original: pana ariyasaccadvayaṃ siyā dukkhaṃ aniccato, na pana yassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ
analyzed: pana ariya sacca dvayam siyā dukkham aniccataḥ na pana yassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyam

original: vussati tathattena. Sabbākārena pana upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ dukkhañceva ariyasaccañca
analyzed: vussati tathattena sabba ākārena pana upādāna khandha pañcakam dukkham ca iva ariya saccañca

original: aññatra taṇhāya. Maggasampayuttā dhammā sāmaññaphalāni ca yassa pariññatthaṃ bhagavati
analyzed: aññatra taṇhāya magga sampayuttāḥ dhammāḥ sāmañña phalāni ca yassa bhagavati

original: brahmacariyaṃ vussati tathattena neva dukkhaṃ na ariyasaccaṃ. Evaṃ samudayādīsupi
analyzed: brahmacariyam tathattena na iva dukkham na ariya saccam evam samudaya ādīsu pi

original: yathāyogaṃ yojetvā catukkatopettha vinicchayo veditabbo.
analyzed: yathāyogam yojetvā vinicchayaḥ veditabbo

original: 567. Suññatekavidhādīhītiettha suññato tāva paramatthena hi sabbāneva saccāni vedakakārakanibbutagamakābhāvato suññānīti veditabbāni. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
analyzed: suññatā ekavidha ādīhi iti ettha suññatas tāva paramatthena hi sabbān eva saccāni vedaka kāraka nibbuta gamaka abhāvataḥ suññāni iti veditabbāni tena itam vuccati

original: “Dukkhameva hi, na koci dukkhito;
analyzed: dukkham eva hi na koci dukkhitaḥ

original: Kārako na, kiriyāva vijjati.
analyzed: kārakaḥ na vijjati

original: Atthi nibbuti, na nibbuto pumā;
analyzed: atthi nibbuti na nibbutaḥ pumā

original: Maggamatthi, gamako na vijjatī”ti.
analyzed: maggam atthi gamakaḥ na vijjati iti

original: Atha vā,
analyzed: atha vā

original: Dhuvasubhasukhattasuññaṃ, purimadvayamattasuññamamatapadaṃ;
analyzed: dhuva subha sukhatta suññam purima dvaya matta suññam amata padam

original: Dhuvasukhaattavirahito, maggoiti suññatā tesu.
analyzed: dhuva sukha atta virahitaḥ maggo iti suñña tā tesu

original: Nirodhasuññāni vā tīṇi, nirodho ca sesattayasuñño. Phalasuñño vā ettha hetu samudaye
analyzed: nirodha suññāni vā tīṇi nirodho ca sesa ttaya suñño phala suñño vā ettha hetu samudaye

original: dukkhassābhāvato, magge ca nirodhassa, na phalena sagabbho pakativādīnaṃ pakati viya.
analyzed: dukkhassa abhāvataḥ magge ca nirodhassa na phalena sa gabbhaḥ pakati vādīnam pakati viya

original: Hetusuññañca phalaṃ dukkhasamudayānaṃ nirodhamaggānañca asamavāyā, na hetusamavetaṃ
analyzed: hetu suññam ca phalam dukkha samudayānam nirodha maggānam ca asamavāyāḥ na hetu samavetam

original: hetuphalaṃ samavāyavādīnaṃ dviaṇukādi viya. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
analyzed: hetu phalam dvi aṇuka ādi viya tena itam vuccati

original: “Tayamidha nirodhasuññaṃ, tayena tenāpi nibbuti suññā;
analyzed: tayam idha nirodha suññam tayena tena api nibbuti suññā

original: Suñño phalena hetu, phalampi taṃhetunā suñña”nti.
analyzed: suññaḥ phalena hetu phalampi taṃhetunā suññanti

original: Evaṃ tāva suññato vinicchayo veditabbo.
analyzed: evam tāva suññataḥ vinicchayaḥ veditabbo

original: Ekavidhādivinicchayakathā
568. Ekavidhādīhīti sabbameva cettha dukkhaṃ ekavidhaṃ pavattibhāvato. Duvidhaṃ nāmarūpato.
analyzed: ekavidha ādīhi iti sabbam eva ca ittha dukkham ekavidham pavatti bhāvataḥ duvidham nāma rūpataḥ

original: Tividhaṃ kāmarūpārūpūpapattibhavabhedato. Catubbidhaṃ catuāhārabhedato. Pañcavidhaṃ
analyzed: tividham catubbidham catu āhāra bhedataḥ pañcavidham

original: pañcupādānakkhandhabhedato.
analyzed: pañca upādāna khandha bhedataḥ

original: Samudayopi ekavidho pavattakabhāvato. Duvidho diṭṭhisampayuttāsampayuttato. Tividho
analyzed: samudayaḥ api ekavidho pavattaka bhāvataḥ duvidho diṭṭhi sampayutta asampayuttato tividho

original: kāmabhavavibhavataṇhābhedato. Catubbidho catumaggappaheyyato. Pañcavidho rūpābhinandanādibhedato.
analyzed: kāma bhava vibhava taṇhā bhedato catubbidhaḥ catu magga ppaheyyato pañcavidhaḥ rūpa abhinandana ādi bhedataḥ

original: Chabbidho chataṇhākāyabhedato.
analyzed: chabbidhaḥ chata ṇhā kāya bhedataḥ

original: Nirodhopi ekavidho asaṅkhatadhātubhāvato. Pariyāyena pana duvidho saupādisesaanupādisesabhedato.
analyzed: nirodhaḥ api ekavidhaḥ asaṅkhata dhātu bhāvato pariyāyena pana duvidhaḥ saupādisesa anupādisesa bhedato

original: Tividho bhavattayavūpasamato. Catubbidho catumaggādhigamanīyato. Pañcavidho pañcābhinandanavūpasamato.
analyzed: tividhaḥ bhava taya vūpasamataḥ catubbidhaḥ catu magga adhigamanīyataḥ pañcavidhaḥ pañca abhinandana vūpasamataḥ

original: Chabbidho chataṇhākāyakkhayabhedato.
analyzed: chabbidhaḥ chat aṇhā kāya kkhaya bhedataḥ

original: Maggopi ekavidho bhāvetabbato. Duvidho samathavipassanābhedato, dassanabhāvanābhedato
analyzed: maggaḥ api ekavidhaḥ bhāvetabbataḥ duvidhaḥ samatha vipassanā bhedataḥ dassana bhāvanā bhedato

original: vā. Tividho khandhattayabhedato. Ayañhi sappadesattā nagaraṃ viya rajjena nippadesehi
analyzed: vā tividhaḥ khandha ttaya bhedataḥ ayan hi sappadesa ttā nagaram viya rajjena nippadesehi

original: tīhi khandhehi saṅgahito. Yathāha –
analyzed: tīhi khandhehi saṅgahitaḥ yathā āha

analyzed: citta payoga saṅkhātena kiriya bhāvena upakārakaḥ dhammaḥ kamma paccayo saḥ nānakkhaṇikāya

analyzed: ca iva kusala akusala cetanāya sahajātāya ca cetanāya vasena duvidhaḥ hoti yathā āha

original: – “kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.

original: 607. Nirussāhasantabhāvena nirussāhasantabhāvāya upakārako vipākadhammo vipākapaccayo.
analyzed: nirussāha santa bhāvena nirussāha santa bhāvāya upakārakaḥ vipāka dhammaḥ vipāka paccayaḥ

analyzed: rūpa arūpānam upatthambhaka ṭṭhena upakārakā cattāro āhārāḥ āhāra paccayaḥ yathā āha

analyzed: dhammānaṃ tad samuṭṭhānānaṃ ca rūpānaṃ āhāra paccayena paccayaḥ ti pañhā vāre pana paṭisandhi khaṇe

analyzed: tattha cakkhu indriya ādayaḥ arūpa dhammānam yeva sesāḥ rūpa arūpānam paccayāḥ honti yathā āha

original: 610. Upanijjhāyanaṭṭhena upakārakāni ṭhapetvā dvipañcaviññāṇe sukhadukkhavedanādvayaṃ

original: dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ jhānapaccayena paccayo”ti. Pañhāvāre pana “paṭisandhikkhaṇe
analyzed: dhammānam tad samuṭṭhānānaṃ ca rūpānaṃ jhāna paccayena paccayaḥ ti pañhāvāre pana paṭisandhi khaṇe

analyzed: paccayaḥ ti pi vuttam

original: 611. Yato tato vā niyyānaṭṭhena upakārakāni kusalādibhedāni dvādasa maggaṅgāni maggapaccayo.

analyzed: paccayaḥ ti pañhā vāre pana paṭisandhi khaṇe vipāka abyākatāni maggaṅgāni sampayuttakānam

analyzed: paccayaḥ vatthu vipāka abyākatānam kiriyā abyākatānam khandhānam pe vatthu kusalānam

original: Atthi paccayadhammā eva ca avigatabhāvena upakārakattā avigatapaccayoti veditabbā.

original: yaṃkiñci akusalaṃ karontassa hetu sahajāta aññamañña nissaya sampayutta atthi avigatapaccayehīti

analyzed: manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu uppannā hoti upekkhā sahagatā manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu uppannā hoti somanassa sahagatā

original: ñāṇasampayuttā. Somanassasahagatā ñāṇasampayuttā sasaṅkhārena. Somanassasahagatā
analyzed: ñāṇa sampayuttā somanassa sahagatā ñāṇa sampayuttā sa saṅkhārena somanassa sahagatā

analyzed: upekkhā sahagatā ñāṇa sampayuttā sa saṅkhārena upekkhā sahagatā ñāṇa vippayuttā upekkhā sahagatā

analyzed: ñāṇa vippayuttā sa saṅkhārena ati

original: Rūpāvacarapuññābhisaṅkhārapaccayā pana pañca rūpāvacaravipākāni. Yathāha –

original: ekavīsatividhaṃ viññāṇaṃ hoti.
analyzed: ekavīsatividham viññāṇam hoti

original: Apuññābhisaṅkhārapaccayā pana akusalavipākāni pañca cakkhuviññāṇādīni, ekā manodhātu, ekā manoviññāṇadhātūti evaṃ sattavidhaṃ viññāṇaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
