original: “Akusalassa kammassa kaṭattā upacitattā vipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti… sota… ghāna… jivhā… kāyaviññāṇaṃ… vipākā manodhātu vipākā manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hotī”ti.
analyzed: akusalassa kammassa kaṭattā upacita ttā vipākam cakkhu viññāṇam uppannam hoti sota ghāna jivhā kāya viññāṇam vipākā manaḥ dhātu vipākā manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu uppannā hoti iti

original: Āneñjābhisaṅkhārapaccayā pana cattāri arūpavipākānīti evaṃ catubbidhaṃ viññāṇaṃ hoti. Yathāha –

analyzed: samatikkamā viññāṇañcāyatana saññā sahagataṃpe viññāṇañcāpe ākiñcaññāpe nevasaññānāsaññāyatana sahagataṃpe

original: sukhassa ca dukkhassa ca pahānā catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti.
analyzed: sukhassa ca dukkhassa ca pahānā catuttham jhānam upasampajja viharati iti

original: 621. Evaṃ yaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā yaṃ viññāṇaṃ hoti, taṃ ñatvā idānissa evaṃ pavatti
analyzed: evam yam saṅkhāra paccayā yam viññāṇam hoti tam ñatvā idānissa evam pavatti

analyzed: paccuppanna ārammaṇā paṭisandhi

analyzed: catubbidham gati vasena pañcavidham viññāṇa ṭṭhiti vasena sattavidham sattāvāsa vasena aṭṭhavidham hoti

original: vasena sattati, tāni ca niccaṃ devesu. Tattha vaṇṇo gandho raso ojā catasso cāpi

original: 631. Evaṃ viditvā puna,
analyzed: evam viditvā punar

original: Khandhārammaṇagatihetu-vedanāpītivitakkavicārehi;

analyzed: yā ha isā missā amissataḥ duvidhā paṭisandhi yā ca assāḥ atīta anantarā cuti tāsam imehi khandha ādīhi bheda abheda visesaḥ ñātabbaḥ ti attho

analyzed: abhinnā paṭisandhi hoti kadāci amahaggata bahiddhā ārammaṇāya mahaggata ajjhatta ārammaṇā

original: Ayaṃ tāva arūpabhūmīsuyeva nayo. Kadāci pana catukkhandhāya arūpacutiyā anantarā
analyzed: ayam tāva arūpa bhūmīsuyā iva nayaḥ kadāci pana catu khandhāya arūpa cutiyā anantarā

original: Appītikacutiyā sappītikapaṭisandhi. Avitakkacutiyā savitakkapaṭisandhi. Avicāracutiyā
analyzed: appītika cutiyā sappītika paṭisandhi avitakka cutiyā sa vitakka paṭisandhi avicāra cutiyā

original: Laddhapaccayamiti dhammamattametaṃ bhavantaramupeti;

original: Sveva rūpabhave pañcannaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte, no paṭisandhiyaṃ.
analyzed: su eva rūpa bhave pañcannam vipāka viññāṇānam tathā iva paccayaḥ pavatte no paṭisandhiyam

original: Kāmabhave pana duggatiyaṃ aṭṭhannampi parittavipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte,
analyzed: kāma bhave pana duggatiyam aṭṭhannam pi paritta vipāka viññāṇānam tathā iva paccayaḥ pavatte

original: no paṭisandhiyaṃ. Tattha niraye mahāmoggallānattherassa narakacārikādīsu iṭṭhārammaṇasamāyoge
analyzed: no tattha niraye mahāmoggallāna ttherassa naraka cārikā ādīsu iṭṭha ārammaṇa samāyoge

original: so paccayo hoti, tiracchānesu pana petamahiddhikesu ca iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ labbhatiyeva.
analyzed: so paccayaḥ hoti tiracchānesu pana peta mahiddhikesu ca iṭṭha ārammaṇam labbhatiyā eva

original: Sveva kāmabhave sugatiyaṃ soḷasannampi kusalavipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte
analyzed: su eva kāma bhave sugatiyam kusala vipāka viññāṇānam tathā iva paccayaḥ pavatte

original: ca paṭisandhiyañca. Avisesena pana puññābhisaṅkhāro rūpabhave dasannaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ
analyzed: ca paṭisandhiyam ca avisesena pana puñña abhisaṅkhāro rūpa bhave dasannam vipāka viññāṇānam

original: tatheva paccayo pavatte ca paṭisandhiyañca.
analyzed: tathā iva paccayaḥ pavatte ca paṭisandhiyam ca

original: Dvādasākusalacetanābhedo apuññābhisaṅkhāro kāmabhave duggatiyaṃ ekassa viññāṇassa
analyzed: dvādasa akusala cetanā bhedaḥ apuñña abhisaṅkhāro kāma bhave duggatiyam ekassa viññāṇassa

original: tatheva paccayo paṭisandhiyaṃ, no pavatte. Channaṃ pavatte, no paṭisandhiyaṃ. Sattannampi
analyzed: tathā iva paccayaḥ paṭisandhiyam no pavatte channam pavatte no paṭisandhiyam

original: akusalavipākaviññāṇānaṃ pavatte ca paṭisandhiyañca.
analyzed: akusala vipāka viññāṇānam pavatte ca paṭisandhiyam ca

original: Kāmabhave pana sugatiyaṃ tesaṃyeva sattannaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte, no paṭisandhiyaṃ.
analyzed: kāma bhave pana sugatiyam tesam yeva sattannam tathā iva paccayo pavatte no paṭisandhiyam

original: Rūpabhave catunnaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte, no paṭisandhiyaṃ. So
analyzed: rūpa bhave catunnam vipāka viññāṇānam tathā iva paccayaḥ pavatte no paṭisandhiyam so

original: ca kho kāmāvacare aniṭṭharūpadassanasaddasavanavasena, brahmaloke pana aniṭṭharūpādayo
analyzed: ca kho kāmāvacare aniṭṭha rūpa dassana sadda savana vasena brahma loke pana

original: nāma natthi. Tathā kāmāvacaradevalokepi.
analyzed: nāma natthi tathā kāmāvacara deva loke pi

original: Āneñjābhisaṅkhāro arūpabhave catunnaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte ca paṭisandhiyañca.
analyzed: āneñja abhisaṅkhāraḥ arūpa bhave catunnam vipāka viññāṇānam tathā iva paccayaḥ pavatte ca paṭisandhiyam ca

original: Evaṃ tāva bhavesu paṭisandhipavattīnaṃ vasena ete saṅkhārā yesaṃ paccayā, yathā ca paccayā honti, tathā vijānitabbā. Eteneva nayena yoniādīsupi veditabbā.
analyzed: evam tāva bhavesu paṭisandhi pavattīnam vasena ete saṅkhārāḥ yesam paccayāḥ yathā ca paccayāḥ honti tathā vijānitabbāḥ etena iva nayena yoni ādīsu pi veditabbā

original: 637. Tatridaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya mukhamattapakāsanaṃ – imesu hi saṅkhāresu yasmā puññābhisaṅkhāro
analyzed: tatra idam āditas paṭṭhāya mukha matta pakāsanam imesu hi saṅkhāresu yasmā puñña abhisaṅkhāro

original: tāva dvīsu bhavesu paṭisandhiṃ datvā sabbamattano vipākaṃ janeti. Tathā aṇḍajādīsu
analyzed: tāva dvīsu bhavesu paṭisandhim da tvā sabbam attanaḥ vipākam janeti tathā aṇḍaja ādīsu

original: catūsu yonīsu, devamanussasaṅkhātāsu dvīsu gatīsu, nānattakāyanānattasaññīnānattakāyaekattasaññī-ekattakāyanānattasaññī-ekattakāyaekattasaññīsaṅkhātāsu
analyzed: catūsu yonīsu deva manussa saṅkhātāsu dvīsu gatīsu nānatta kāya nānatta saññī nānatta kāya ekatta saññī ekatta kāya nānatta saññī ekatta kāya nānatta saññī ekatta kāya ekatta saññī saṅkhātāsu

original: catūsu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu. Asaññasattāvāse panesa rūpamattamevābhisaṅkharotīti catūsuyeva
analyzed: catūsu viññāṇa ṭṭhitīsu asañña sattā vāse pana esa rūpa mattam evā abhisaṅkharoti iti

original: sattāvāsesu ca paṭisandhiṃ datvā sabbamattano vipākaṃ janeti. Tasmā esa etesu dvīsu
analyzed: sattāvāsesu ca paṭisandhim da tvā sabbam attanaḥ vipākam janeti tasmai esaḥ etesu dvīsu

original: bhavesu, catūsu yonīsu, dvīsu gatīsu, catūsu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu, catūsu sattāvāsesu
analyzed: bhavesu catūsu yonīsu dvīsu gatīsu catūsu viññāṇa ṭṭhitīsu catūsu sattāvāsesu

original: ca ekavīsatiyā vipākaviññāṇānaṃ vuttanayeneva paccayo hoti yathāsambhavaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte ca.
analyzed: ca ekavīsatiyāḥ vipāka viññāṇānam vutta nayena iva paccayaḥ hoti yathāsambhavam paṭisandhiyam pavatte ca

original: Apuññābhisaṅkhāro pana yasmā ekasmiṃyeva kāmabhave catūsu yonīsu, avasesāsu tīsu
analyzed: apuñña abhisaṅkhāraḥ pana yasmai ekasmiṃ yeva kāma bhave catūsu yonīsu avasesāsu tīsu

original: gatīsu, nānattakāyaekattasaññīsaṅkhātāya ekissā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā, tādiseyeva ca ekasmiṃ
analyzed: gatīsu nānatta kāya ekatta saññī saṅkhātāya ekissā viññāṇa ṭṭhitiyā tādiseya eva ca ekasmin

original: sattāvāse paṭisandhivasena vipaccati, tasmā esa ekasmiṃ bhave, catūsu yonīsu, tīsu
analyzed: sattā vāse paṭisandhi vasena vipaccati tasmai esaḥ ekasmin bhave catūsu yonīsu tīsu

original: gatīsu, ekissā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā, ekamhi ca sattāvāse sattannaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ vuttanayeneva
analyzed: gatīsu ekissā viññāṇa ṭṭhitiyā ekamhi ca satta āvāse sattannam vipāka viññāṇānam vutta nayena eva

original: paccayo paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte ca.
analyzed: paccayaḥ paṭisandhiyam pavatte ca

original: Āneñjābhisaṅkhāro pana yasmā ekasmiṃyeva arūpabhave, ekissā opapātikayoniyā, ekissā
analyzed: āneñja abhisaṅkhāraḥ pana yasmai ekasmiṃ yeva arūpa bhave ekissā opapātika yoniyā ekissā

original: devagatiyā, ākāsānañcāyatanādikāsu tīsu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu, ākāsānañcāyatanādikesu ca
analyzed: deva gatiyā ākāsa anañcāyatana ādikāsu tīsu viññāṇa ṭṭhitīsu ākāsa anañcāyatana ādikesu ca

original: catūsu sattāvāsesu paṭisandhivasena vipaccati, tasmā esa ekasmiṃ bhave, ekissā yoniyā,
analyzed: catūsu sattāvāsesu paṭisandhi vasena vipaccati tasmai esaḥ ekasmin bhave ekissā yoniyā

original: ekissā gatiyā, tīsu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu, catūsu sattāvāsesu catunnaṃ viññāṇānaṃ vuttanayeneva
analyzed: ekissā gatiyā tīsu viññāṇa ṭṭhitīsu catūsu sattāvāsesu catunnam viññāṇānam vutta nayena iva

original: paccayo hoti paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte cāti. Evaṃ,
analyzed: paccayaḥ hoti paṭisandhiyam pavatte ca ati evam

original: Paṭisandhipavattīnaṃ, vasenete bhavādisu;
analyzed: paṭisandhi pavattīnam vasena ite bhava ādisu

original: Vijānitabbā saṅkhārā, yathā yesañca paccayāti.
analyzed: vijānitabbā saṅkhārāḥ yathā yesam ca paccayā ti

original: Ayaṃ “saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa”nti padasmiṃ vitthārakathā.
analyzed: ayam saṅkhāra paccayā viññāṇan ti padasmim vitthāra kathā

original: Viññāṇapaccayānāmarūpapadavitthārakathā
analyzed: viññāṇa paccaya nāma rūpa pada vitthāra kathā

original: 638. Viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpapade –
analyzed: viññāṇa paccayāḥ nāma rūpa pade

original: Vibhāgā nāmarūpānaṃ, bhavādīsu pavattito;
analyzed: vibhāgāḥ nāma rūpānam bhava ādīsu pavattitaḥ

original: Saṅgahā paccayanayā, viññātabbo vinicchayo.
analyzed: saṅgahā paccayanayā viññātabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ

original: Vibhāgā nāmarūpānanti ettha hi nāmanti ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ namanato vedanādayo tayo
analyzed: vibhāgāḥ ettha hi ārammaṇa abhimukham namanataḥ vedanā ādayo

original: khandhā, rūpanti cattāri mahābhūtāni catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpaṃ. Tesaṃ
analyzed: khandhāḥ cattāri mahābhūtāni catunnam ca mahābhūtānam upādāya rūpam tesam

original: vibhāgo khandhaniddese vuttoyevāti. Evaṃ tāvettha vibhāgā nāmarūpānaṃ viññātabbo vinicchayo.
analyzed: vibhāgaḥ khandha niddese vuttaḥ yā iva ati evam tāva ettha vibhāgāḥ nāma rūpānam viññātabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ

original: Bhavādīsu pavattitoti ettha ca nāmaṃ ekaṃ sattāvāsaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbabhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisesasattāvāsesu
analyzed: bhava ādīsu pavattitaḥ ti ettha ca nāmam ekam sattāvāsam ṭhapetvā sabba bhava yoni gati viññāṇa ṭṭhiti sesa sattāvāsesu

original: pavattati, rūpaṃ dvīsu bhavesu, catūsu yonīsu, pañcasu gatīsu, purimāsu catūsu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu,
analyzed: pavattati rūpam dvīsu bhavesu catūsu yonīsu pañcasu gatīsu purimāsu catūsu viññāṇa ṭṭhitīsu

original: pañcasu sattāvāsesu pavattati.
analyzed: pañcasu sattāvāsesu pavattati

original: Evaṃ pavattamāne ca etasmiṃ nāmarūpe yasmā abhāvakagabbhaseyyakānaṃ aṇḍajānañca paṭisandhikkhaṇe
analyzed: evam pavattamāne ca etasmin nāma rūpe yasmai abhāvaka gabbhaseyyakānam aṇḍa jānam ca paṭisandhi kkhaṇe

original: vatthukāyadasakavasena rūpato dvesantatisīsāni, tayo ca arūpino khandhā pātubhavanti,
analyzed: vatthu kāya dasaka vasena rūpataḥ tayo ca arūpino khandhā pātubhavanti

analyzed: tasmā tesam vitthārena rūpa rūpataḥ vīsati dhammā tayo ca arūpino khandhā ati ete tevīsati

original: dhammā viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti veditabbā. Aggahitaggahaṇena pana ekasantatisīsato
analyzed: dhammā viññāṇa paccayāḥ nāma rūpan ti veditabbāḥ aggahita ggahaṇena pana eka santati sīsato

original: nava rūpadhamme apanetvā cuddasa. Sabhāvakānaṃ bhāvadasakaṃ pakkhipitvā tettiṃsa,
analyzed: nava rūpa dhamme apanetvā cuddasa sabhāvakānam bhāva dasakam pakkhipitvā tettiṃsa

original: tesampi aggahitaggahaṇena santatisīsadvayato aṭṭhārasa rūpadhamme apanetvā pannarasa.
analyzed: tesam pi aggahita ggahaṇena santati sīsa dvayato aṭṭhārasa rūpa dhamme apanetvā pannarasa

original: Yasmā ca opapātikasattesu brahmakāyikādīnaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe cakkhusotavatthudasakānaṃ,
analyzed: yasmā ca opapātika sattesu brahmakāyika ādīnam paṭisandhi khaṇe cakkhu sota vatthu dasakānam

original: jīvitindriyanavakassa ca vasena rūpato cattāri santatisīsāni, tayo ca arūpino khandhā
analyzed: jīvitindriya navakassa ca vasena rūpato cattāri santati sīsāni tayo ca arūpino khandhā

original: pātubhavanti, tasmā tesaṃ vitthārena rūparūpato ekūnacattālīsa dhammā, tayo ca arūpino
analyzed: pātubhavanti tasmā tesam vitthārena rūpa rūpato ekūnacattālīsa dhammā tayo ca arūpino

original: khandhāti ete bācattālīsa dhammā viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti veditabbā. Aggahitaggahaṇena
analyzed: khandhā ti ete vācattālīsa dhammā viññāṇa paccayāḥ nāma rūpam ti veditabbāḥ aggahita ggahaṇena

original: pana santatisīsattayato sattavīsati dhamme apanetvā pannarasa.
analyzed: pana santati sīsattayato sattavīsati dhamme apanetvā pannarasa

original: Kāmabhave pana yasmā sesaopapātikānaṃ, saṃsedajānaṃ vā sabhāvakaparipuṇṇāyatanānaṃ
analyzed: kāma bhave pana yasmā sesa opapātikānam saṃseda jānam vā sabhāvaka paripuṇṇa āyatanānam

original: paṭisandhikkhaṇe rūpato satta santatisīsāni, tayo ca arūpino khandhā pātubhavanti,
analyzed: paṭisandhi kkhaṇe rūpato satta santati sīsāni tayo ca arūpino khandhā pātubhavanti

original: tasmā tesaṃ vitthārena rūparūpato sattati dhammā, tayo ca arūpino khandhāti ete tesattati
analyzed: tasmā tesam vitthārena rūpa rūpato sattati dhammā tayo ca arūpino khandhā ati ete tesattati

original: dhammā viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti veditabbā. Aggahitaggahaṇena pana rūpasantatisīsachakkato
analyzed: dhammā viññāṇa paccayāḥ nāma rūpan ti veditabbāḥ aggahita ggahaṇena pana rūpa santati sīsa chakkato

original: catupaññāsa dhamme apanetvā ekūnavīsati. Esa ukkaṃso. Avakaṃsena pana taṃtaṃrūpasantatisīsavikalānaṃ
analyzed: catupaññāsa dhamme apanetvā ekūnavīsati esaḥ ukkaṃsaḥ avakaṃsena pana taṃ taṃ rūpa santati sīsa vikalānam

original: tassa tassa vasena hāpetvā hāpetvā saṅkhepato vitthārato ca paṭisandhiyaṃ viññāṇapaccayā
analyzed: tassa tassa vasena hāpetvā hāpetvā saṅkhepataḥ vitthārataḥ ca paṭisandhiyam viññāṇa paccayā

original: nāmarūpasaṅkhā veditabbā.
analyzed: nāma rūpa saṅkhā veditabbā

original: Arūpīnaṃ pana tayova arūpino khandhā. Asaññīnaṃ rūpato jīvitindriyanavakamevāti. Esa tāva paṭisandhiyaṃ nayo.
analyzed: arūpīnam pana tayo uva arūpino khandhāḥ asaññīnam rūpataḥ jīvitindriya navakam eva ati esa tāva paṭisandhiyam nayo

original: Pavatte pana sabbattha rūpappavattidese paṭisandhicittassa ṭhitikkhaṇe paṭisandhicittena
analyzed: pavatte pana sabbattha rūpa ppavatti dese paṭisandhi cittassa ṭhiti kkhaṇe paṭisandhi cittena

original: saha pavattaututo utusamuṭṭhānaṃ suddhaṭṭhakaṃ pātubhavati. Paṭisandhicittaṃ pana
analyzed: saha pavatta otutaḥ utu samuṭṭhānam suddhaṭṭhakam pātubhavati paṭisandhi cittam pana

original: rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpeti. Tañhi yathā papāte patitapuriso parassa paccayo hotuṃ na sakkoti,
analyzed: rūpam na samuṭṭhāpeti tat hi yathā papāte patita puriso parassa paccayaḥ hotum na sakkoti

original: evaṃ vatthudubbalatāya dubbalattā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpetuṃ na sakkoti. Paṭisandhicittato
analyzed: evam vatthu dubbala tāya dubbala ttā rūpam samuṭṭhāpetum na sakkoti paṭisandhi cittato

original: pana uddhaṃ paṭhamabhavaṅgato pabhuti cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ suddhaṭṭhakaṃ, saddapātubhāvakāle
analyzed: pana uddham paṭhama bhavaṅgataḥ pabhuti citta samuṭṭhānam suddhaṭṭhakam sadda pātubhāva kāle

analyzed: paṭisandhi kkhaṇataḥ uddham pavatta otutaḥ ca iva cittataḥ ca sadda navakam ye pana kabaḷīkāra āhāra upajīvinaḥ

original: gabbhaseyyakasattā, tesaṃ,
analyzed: gabbhaseyyaka sattā tesam

original: “Yañcassa bhuñjati mātā, annaṃ pānañca bhojanaṃ;
analyzed: yat ca assa bhuñjati mātā annam pānam ca bhojanam

original: Tena so tattha yāpeti, mātukucchigato naro”ti. –
analyzed: tena saḥ tattha yāpeti mātukucchi gataḥ

original: Vacanato mātarā ajjhoharitāhārena anugate sarīre, opapātikānaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ attano
analyzed: vacanataḥ mātarā ajjhoharita āhārena anugate sarīre opapātikānam sabba paṭhamam attano

original: mukhagataṃ kheḷaṃ ajjhoharaṇakāle āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ suddhaṭṭhakanti idaṃ āhārasamuṭṭhānassa
analyzed: mukha gatam kheḷam ajjhoharaṇa kāle āhāra samuṭṭhānam suddhaṭṭhakam ti idam āhāra samuṭṭhānassa

original: suddhaṭṭhakassa, utucittasamuṭṭhānānañca ukkaṃsato dvinnaṃ navakānaṃ vasena chabbīsatividhaṃ,
analyzed: suddhaṭṭhakassa utu citta samuṭṭhānānam ca ukkaṃsataḥ dvinnam navakānam vasena chabbīsatividham

original: pubbe ekekacittakkhaṇe tikkhattuṃ uppajjamānaṃ vuttaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānañca sattatividhanti
analyzed: pubbe ekeka citta kkhaṇe ti khattum uppajjamānam vuttam kamma samuṭṭhānam ca sattatividhanti

original: channavutividhaṃ rūpaṃ, tayo ca arūpino khandhāti samāsato navanavuti dhammā. Yasmā
analyzed: channavutividham rūpam tayo ca arūpino samāsatas dhammā yasmai

original: vā saddo aniyato kadācideva pātubhāvato, tasmā duvidhampi taṃ apanetvā ime sattanavuti
analyzed: vā saddo aniyataḥ kadācid eva pātubhāvato tasmā duvidham pi tam apanetvā ime sattanavuti

original: dhammā yathāsambhavaṃ sabbasattānaṃ viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti veditabbaṃ. Tesaṃ
analyzed: dhammāḥ yathāsambhavam sabba sattānam viññāṇa paccayāḥ nāma rūpan ti veditabbam tesam

original: hi suttānampi pamattānampi khādantānampi pivantānampi divā ca rattiñca ete viññāṇapaccayā
analyzed: hi suttānam pi pamattānam pi khādantānam pi pivantānam pi divā ca rattiñca ete viññāṇa paccayā

original: pavattanti. Tañca nesaṃ viññāṇapaccayabhāvaṃ parato vaṇṇayissāma.
analyzed: pavattanti tat ca na īsam viññāṇa paccaya bhāvam paratas vaṇṇayissāma

original: Yampanetamettha kammajarūpaṃ, taṃ bhavayonigatiṭhitisattāvāsesu sabbapaṭhamaṃ patiṭṭhahantampi
analyzed: yam pana etam ettha kamma ja rūpam tam bhava yoni gati ṭhiti sattā vāsesu sabba paṭhamam patiṭṭhahantam pi

original: tisamuṭṭhānikarūpena anupatthaddhaṃ na sakkoti saṇṭhātuṃ, nāpi tisamuṭṭhānikaṃ tena
analyzed: ti samuṭṭhānika rūpena an upatthaddham na sakkoti saṇṭhātum na api ti samuṭṭhānikam tena

original: anupatthaddhaṃ. Atha kho vātabbhāhatāpi catuddisā vavatthāpitā naḷakalāpiyo viya,

original: Vedanāpaccayā taṇhā, iti vuttā mahesinā.

original: Vedanāpaccayā cāpi, yasmā nānusayaṃ vinā;
analyzed: vedanā paccayā ca api yasmai na anusayam vinā

original: Hoti tasmā na sā hoti, brāhmaṇassa vusīmatoti.
analyzed: hoti tasmā na sā hoti brāhmaṇassa

original: Ayaṃ “vedanāpaccayā taṇhā”ti padasmiṃ vitthārakathā.
analyzed: ayam vedanā paccayā taṇhā ti padasmim vitthāra kathā

original: Taṇhāpaccayāupādānapadavitthārakathā
analyzed: taṇhā paccayā upādāna pada vitthāra kathā

original: 645. Taṇhāpaccayā upādānapade –
analyzed: taṇhā paccayā upādāna pade

original: Upādānāni cattāri, tāni atthavibhāgato;
analyzed: upādānāni cattāri tāni attha vibhāgato

original: Dhammasaṅkhepavitthārā, kamato ca vibhāvaye.
analyzed: dhamma saṅkhepa vitthārā kamataḥ ca vibhāvaye

original: Tatrāyaṃ vibhāvanā – kāmupādānaṃ, diṭṭhupādānaṃ, sīlabbatupādānaṃ, attavādupādānanti
analyzed: tatra ayam vibhāvanā kāma upādānam diṭṭha upādānam sīla bbata upādānam atta vāda upādānam iti

original: imāni tāvettha cattāri upādānāni. Tesaṃ ayaṃ atthavibhāgo – vatthusaṅkhātaṃ kāmaṃ
analyzed: imāni tāva ettha cattāri upādānāni tesam ayam attha vibhāgaḥ vatthu saṅkhātam kāmam

original: upādiyatīti kāmupādānaṃ, kāmo ca so upādānañcātipi kāmupādānaṃ. Upādānanti daḷhaggahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: upādiyati iti kāma upādānam kāmo ca saḥ upādānam ca atipi kāma upādānam upādānam ti daḷha ggahaṇam

original: Daḷhattho hettha upasaddo upāyāsaupakaṭṭhādīsu viya. Tathā diṭṭhi ca sā upādānañcāti
analyzed: daḷha atthaḥ ha ittha upasaddo upāyāsa aupakaṭṭha ādīsu viya tathā diṭṭhi ca sā upādānam ca ati

original: diṭṭhupādānaṃ. Diṭṭhiṃ upādiyatīti vā diṭṭhupādānaṃ. “Sassato attā ca loko cā”tiādīsu
analyzed: diṭṭhupādānam diṭṭhim upādiyati iti vā diṭṭhupādānam sassataḥ attā ca loko ca ati ādīsu

original: hi purimadiṭṭhiṃ uttaradiṭṭhi upādiyati. Tathā sīlabbataṃ upādiyatīti sīlabbatupādānaṃ.
analyzed: hi purima diṭṭhim uttara diṭṭhi upādiyati tathā sīlabbatam upādiyati iti sīlabbata upādānam

original: Sīlabbatañca taṃ upādānañcātipi sīlabbatupādānaṃ. Gosīlagovatādīni hi “evaṃ suddhī”ti
analyzed: sīlabbatam ca tam upādānam ca atipi sīlabbata upādānam gosīla govata ādīni hi evam suddhi iti

original: abhinivesato sayameva upādānāni. Tathā vadanti etenāti vādo. Upādiyanti etenāti upādānaṃ.
analyzed: abhinivesataḥ sayam eva upādānāni tathā vadanti etena ati vādaḥ upādiyanti etena ati upādānam

original: Kiṃ vadanti, upādiyanti vā? Attānaṃ. Attano vādupādānaṃ attavādupādānaṃ. Attavādamattameva
analyzed: kim vadanti upādiyanti vā attānam attanaḥ vāda upādānam atta vāda upādānam atta vādam attam eva

original: vā attāti upādiyanti etenāti attavādupādānaṃ. Ayaṃ tāva tesaṃ atthavibhāgo.
analyzed: vā attā iti upādiyanti etena ati attavāt upādānam ayam tāva tesam attha vibhāgo

original: Dhammasaṅkhepavitthāre pana kāmupādānaṃ tāva “tattha katamaṃ kāmupādānaṃ? Yo kāmesu
analyzed: dhamma saṅkhepa vitthāre pana kāma upādānam tāva tattha katamam kāma upādānam yaḥ kāmesu

original: kāmacchando kāmarāgo kāmanandī kāmataṇhā kāmasneho kāmapariḷāho kāmamucchā kāmajjhosānaṃ,
analyzed: kāma chandaḥ kāma rāgaḥ kāma nandī kāma taṇhā kāma snehaḥ kāma pariḷāhaḥ kāma mucchā kāma ajjhosānam

original: idaṃ vuccati kāmupādāna”nti āgatattā saṅkhepato taṇhādaḷhattaṃ vuccati. Taṇhādaḷhattaṃ
analyzed: idam vuccati kāma upādānam ti āgata ttā saṅkhepato taṇhā daḷhattam vuccati taṇhā daḷhattam

original: nāma purimataṇhāupanissayapaccayena daḷhasambhūtā uttarataṇhāva. Keci panāhu “appattavisayapatthanā
analyzed: nāma purima taṇhā upanissaya paccayena daḷha sambhūtā uttara taṇhā va keci pana āhu appatta visaya patthanā

original: taṇhā andhakāre corassa hatthappasāraṇaṃ viya, sampattavisayaggahaṇaṃ upādānaṃ tasseva
analyzed: taṇhā andhakāre corassa hattha pasāraṇam viya sampatta visaya ggahaṇam upādānam tassa iva

original: bhaṇḍaggahaṇaṃ viya. Appicchatāsantuṭṭhitāpaṭipakkhā ca te dhammā. Tathā pariyesanārakkhadukkhamūlā”ti.
analyzed: bhaṇḍa ggahaṇam viya appiccha tā asantuṭṭhi tā paṭipakkhā ca te dhammā tathā pariyesanā ārakkha dukkha mūlā ati

original: Sesupādānattayaṃ pana saṅkhepato diṭṭhimattameva.
analyzed: pana saṅkhepataḥ diṭṭhimattam eva

original: Vitthārato pana pubbe rūpādīsu vuttaaṭṭhasatappabhedāyapi taṇhāya daḷhabhāvo kāmupādānaṃ.
analyzed: vitthārataḥ pana pubbe rūpa ādīsu vutta aṭṭha sata ppabhedāya api taṇhāya daḷha bhāvaḥ kāma upādānam

original: Dasavatthukā micchādiṭṭhi diṭṭhupādānaṃ. Yathāha – “tattha katamaṃ diṭṭhupādānaṃ?
analyzed: dasa vatthukā micchādiṭṭhi diṭṭhupādānam yathā āha tattha katamam diṭṭhupādānam

original: Natthi dinnaṃ, natthi yiṭṭhaṃ…pe… sacchikatvā pavedentīti yā evarūpā diṭṭhi…pe… vipariyesaggāho.
analyzed: na atthi dinnam na atthi sacchikatvā pavedenti iti yā evarūpā vipariyesaggāhaḥ

original: Idaṃ vuccati diṭṭhupādāna”nti. Sīlabbatehi suddhīti parāmasanaṃ pana sīlabbatupādānaṃ.
analyzed: idam vuccati diṭṭhupādānam ti sīla bbatehi suddhī iti parāmasanam pana sīla bbata upādānam

original: Yathāha – “tattha katamaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ? Sīlena suddhi, vatena suddhi, sīlabbatena
analyzed: yathā āha tattha katamam sīlabbata upādānam sīlena suddhi vatena suddhi sīlabbatena

original: suddhīti yā evarūpā diṭṭhi…pe… vipariyesaggāho. Idaṃ vuccati sīlabbatupādāna”nti.
analyzed: suddhi iti yā evarūpā vipariyesa ggāhaḥ idam vuccati sīla bbata upādānam ti

original: Vīsativatthukā sakkāyadiṭṭhi attavādupādānaṃ. Yathāha – “tattha katamaṃ attavādupādānaṃ?
analyzed: vīsati vatthukā sakkāyadiṭṭhi attavād upādānam yathā āha tattha katamam attavād upādānam

original: Idha assutavā puthujjano…pe… sappurisadhamme avinīto rūpaṃ attato samanupassati…pe…
analyzed: idha assutavā sappurisa dhamme avinītaḥ rūpam attataḥ samanupassati pe

original: vipariyesaggāho, idaṃ vuccati attavādupādāna”nti. Ayamettha dhammasaṅkhepavitthāro.
analyzed: vipariyesa ggāhaḥ idam vuccati atta vāda upādānam ti ayam ettha dhamma saṅkhepa vitthāraḥ

original: Kamatoti ettha pana tividho kamo uppattikkamo pahānakkamo desanākkamo ca. Tattha
analyzed: kamataḥ ti ettha pana tividhaḥ kamaḥ uppatti kkamaḥ pahāna kkamaḥ desanā kkamaḥ ca tattha

original: anamatagge saṃsāre imassa paṭhamaṃ uppattīti abhāvato kilesānaṃ nippariyāyena uppattikkamo
analyzed: anamatagge saṃsāre imassa paṭhamam uppatti iti abhāvataḥ kilesānam nippariyāyena uppatti kkamaḥ

original: na vuccati. Pariyāyena pana yebhuyyena ekasmiṃ bhave attaggāhapubbaṅgamo sassatucchedābhiniveso,
analyzed: na vuccati pariyāyena pana yebhuyyena ekasmin bhave atta ggāha pubbaṅgamaḥ sassatu cheda abhiniveso

original: tato “sassato ayaṃ attā”ti gaṇhato attavisuddhatthaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ, “ucchijjatī”ti
analyzed: tatas sassataḥ ayam attā ati gaṇhataḥ atta visuddha attham sīlabbata upādānam ucchijjati iti

original: gaṇhato paralokanirapekkhassa kāmupādānanti evaṃ paṭhamaṃ attavādupādānaṃ, tato diṭṭhisīlabbatakāmupādānānīti
analyzed: gaṇhataḥ para loka nirapekkhassa kāma upādānam ti evam paṭhamam attavāda upādānam tatas diṭṭhi sīla bbata kāma upādānāni iti

original: ayametesaṃ ekasmiṃ bhave uppattikkamo.
analyzed: ayam etesam ekasmin bhave uppatti kkamaḥ

original: Diṭṭhupādānādīni cettha paṭhamaṃ pahīyanti sotāpattimaggavajjhattā. Kāmupādānaṃ pacchā, arahattamaggavajjhattāti ayametesaṃ pahānakkamo.
analyzed: diṭṭhupādāna ādīni ca ittha paṭhamam pahīyanti sotāpatti magga vajjhattā kāma upādānam pacchā arahatta magga vajjhattā ati ayam etesam pahāna kkamaḥ

original: Mahāvisayattā pana pākaṭattā ca etesu kāmupādānaṃ paṭhamaṃ desitaṃ. Mahāvisayaṃ hi
analyzed: mahā visaya ttā pana pākaṭa ttā ca etesu kāma upādānam paṭhamam desitam mahā visayam hi

original: taṃ aṭṭhacittasampayogā, appavisayāni itarāni catucittasampayogā, yebhuyyena ca ālayarāmattā
analyzed: tam aṭṭha citta sampayogāḥ appa visayāni itarāni catu citta sampayogāḥ yebhuyyena ca

original: pajāya pākaṭaṃ kāmupādānaṃ, na itarāni. Kāmupādāna vā kāmānaṃ samadhigamatthaṃ kotūhalamaṅgalādibahulo
analyzed: pākaṭam kāma upādānam vā kāmānam samadhigama attham kotūhala maṅgala ādi bahulaḥ

original: hoti, sāssa diṭṭhīti tadanantaraṃ diṭṭhupādānaṃ, taṃ pabhijjamānaṃ sīlabbataattavādupādānavasena
analyzed: hoti sā assa diṭṭhī iti tad anantaram diṭṭhupādānam tam pabhijjamānam

original: duvidhaṃ hoti. Tasmiṃ dvaye gokiriyaṃ kukkurakiriyaṃ vā disvāpi veditabbato oḷārikanti
analyzed: duvidham hoti tasmim dvaye go kiriyam kukkura kiriyam vā disvā api veditabbato oḷārikam ti

original: sīlabbatupādānaṃ paṭhamaṃ desitaṃ. Sukhumattā ante attavādupādānanti ayametesaṃ desanākkamo.
analyzed: sīlabbata upādānam paṭhamam desitam sukhuma tā ante atta vāda upādānam ti ayam etesam desanā kkamaḥ

original: Taṇhā ca purimassettha, ekadhā hoti paccayo;
analyzed: taṇhā ca purimassa ittha ekadhā hoti paccayo

original: Sattadhā aṭṭhadhā vāpi, hoti sesattayassa sā.
analyzed: sattadhā aṭṭhadhā vā api hoti sesa ttayassa sā

original: Ettha ca evaṃ desite upādānacatukke purimassa kāmupādānassa kāmataṇhā upanissayavasena
analyzed: ettha ca evam desite upādāna catukke purimassa kāma upādānassa kāma taṇhā upanissaya vasena

original: ekadhāva paccayo hoti, taṇhābhinanditesu visayesu uppattito. Sesattayassa pana sahajātaaññamaññanissayasampayuttaatthiavigatahetuvasena
analyzed: ekadhā ava paccayaḥ hoti taṇhā abhinanditesu visayesu uppattito sesa ttayassa pana sahajāta aññamañña nissaya sampayutta atthi avigata hetu vasena

original: sattadhā vā, upanissayena saha aṭṭhadhā vāpi paccayo hoti. Yadā ca sā upanissayavasena
analyzed: sattadhā vā upanissayena saha aṭṭhadhā vā api paccayaḥ hoti yadā ca sā upanissaya vasena

original: paccayo hoti, tadā asahajātāva hotīti.
analyzed: paccayaḥ hoti tadā asahajātā ava hoti iti

original: Ayaṃ “taṇhāpaccayā upādāna”nti padasmiṃ vitthārakathā.
analyzed: ayam taṇhā paccayā upādānam ti padasmim vitthāra kathā

original: Upādānapaccayābhavapadavitthārakathā
analyzed: upādāna paccaya ābhava pada vitthāra kathā

original: 646. Upādānapaccayā bhavapade –
analyzed: upādāna paccayāḥ bhava pade

original: Atthato dhammato ceva, sātthato bhedasaṅgahā;
analyzed: atthataḥ dhammato ca iva sā atthataḥ bheda saṅgahā

original: Yaṃ yassa paccayo ceva, viññātabbo vinicchayo.
analyzed: yam yassa paccayaḥ ca iva viññātabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ

original: Tattha bhavatīti bhavo. So kammabhavo upapattibhavo cāti duvidho hoti. Yathāha –
analyzed: tattha bhavati iti bhavo so kamma bhavo upapatti bhavo ca ati duvidhaḥ hoti yathā āha

original: “bhavo duvidhena atthi kammabhavo, atthi upapattibhavo”ti. Tattha kammameva bhavo
analyzed: bhavaḥ duvidhena atthi kamma bhavaḥ atthi upapatti bhavaḥ ti tattha kammam eva bhavaḥ

original: kammabhavo, tathā upapattiyeva bhavo upapattibhavo. Ettha ca upapatti bhavatīti bhavo.
analyzed: kamma bhavo tathā upapattiyā iva bhavo upapatti bhavo ettha ca upapatti bhavati iti bhavo

original: Kammaṃ pana yathā sukhakāraṇattā “sukho buddhānaṃ uppādo”ti vutto, evaṃ bhavakāraṇattā
analyzed: kammam pana yathā sukha kāraṇa ttā sukhaḥ buddhānam uppādaḥ ti vuttaḥ evam bhava kāraṇa ttā

original: phalavohārena bhavoti veditabbanti. Evaṃ tāvettha atthato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
analyzed: phala vohārena bhavaḥ ti veditabban ti evam tāva ettha atthataḥ viññātabbaḥ vinicchayo

original: 647. Dhammato pana kammabhavo tāva saṅkhepato cetanā ceva cetanāsampayuttā ca abhijjhādayo
analyzed: dhammato pana kamma bhavo tāva saṅkhepato cetanā ca iva cetanā sampayuttā ca abhijjhā ādayo

original: kammasaṅkhātā dhammā. Yathāha – “tattha katamo kammabhavo? Puññābhisaṅkhāro apuññābhisaṅkhāro
analyzed: kamma saṅkhātāḥ dhammāḥ yathā āha tattha katamaḥ kamma bhavaḥ puñña abhisaṅkhāro apuñña abhisaṅkhāro

original: āneñjābhisaṅkhāro parittabhūmako vā mahābhūmako vā, ayaṃ vuccati kammabhavo. Sabbampi
analyzed: āneñja abhisaṅkhāro paritta bhūmakaḥ vā mahā bhūmakaḥ vā ayam vuccati kamma bhavaḥ sabbam pi

original: bhavagāmikammaṃ kammabhavo”ti. Ettha hi puññābhisaṅkhāroti terasa cetanā. Apuññābhisaṅkhāroti
analyzed: bhava gāmi kammam kamma bhavo ti ettha hi puñña abhisaṅkhāro ti terasa cetanāḥ apuñña abhisaṅkhāro ti

original: dvādasa. Āneñjābhisaṅkhāroti catasso cetanā. Evaṃ parittabhūmako vā mahābhūmako vāti
analyzed: dvādasa āneñja abhisaṅkhāro ti catasso cetanāḥ evam paritta bhūmakaḥ vā mahā bhūmakaḥ vā ati

original: etena tāsaṃyeva cetanānaṃ mandabahuvipākatā vuttā. Sabbampi bhavagāmikammanti iminā
analyzed: etena tāsam yeva cetanānam manda bahu vipāka tā vuttā sabbam pi bhava gāmi kamman ti iminā

original: pana cetanāsampayuttā abhijjhādayo vuttā.
analyzed: pana cetanā sampayuttāḥ abhijjhā ādayaḥ vuttā

original: Upapattibhavo pana saṅkhepato kammābhinibbattā khandhā, pabhedato navavidho hoti.
analyzed: upapatti bhavaḥ pana saṅkhepataḥ kamma abhinibbattā khandhā pabhedataḥ navavidhaḥ hoti

original: Yathāha – “tattha katamo upapattibhavo? Kāmabhavo rūpabhavo arūpabhavo saññābhavo
analyzed: yathā āha tattha katamo upapatti bhavaḥ kāma bhavaḥ rūpa bhavaḥ arūpa bhavaḥ saññā bhavaḥ

original: asaññābhavo nevasaññānāsaññābhavo, ekavokārabhavo catuvokārabhavo pañcavokārabhavo,
analyzed: asaññā bhavaḥ nevasaññānāsaññābhavo eka vokāra bhavo catu vokāra bhavo pañca vokāra bhavo

original: ayaṃ vuccati upapattibhavo”ti. Tattha kāmasaṅkhāto bhavo kāmabhavo. Esa nayo rūpārūpabhavesu.
analyzed: ayam vuccati upapatti bhavaḥ ti tattha kāma saṅkhātaḥ bhavaḥ kāma bhavaḥ esa nayaḥ rūpa arūpa bhavesu

original: Saññāvataṃ bhavo, saññā vā ettha bhave atthīti saññābhavo. Vipariyāyena asaññābhavo.
analyzed: saññāvatam bhavo saññā va ettha bhave atthi iti saññābhavaḥ vipariyāyena a saññābhavaḥ

original: Oḷārikāya saññāya abhāvā sukhumāya ca bhāvā nevasaññā, nāsaññā asmiṃ bhaveti nevasaññānāsaññābhavo.
analyzed: oḷārikāya saññāya abhāvā sukhumāya ca bhāvā nevasaññā na asaññā asmin bhaveti nevasaññā nāsaññā bhavaḥ

original: Ekena rūpakkhandhena vokiṇṇo bhavo ekavokārabhavo. Eko vā vokāro assa bhavassāti
analyzed: ekena rūpakkhandhena vokiṇṇaḥ bhavaḥ eka vokāra bhavaḥ ekaḥ vā vokāraḥ assa bhavassa ati

original: ekavokārabhavo. Esa nayo catuvokārapañcavokārabhavesu. Tattha kāmabhavo pañca upādiṇṇakkhandhā.
analyzed: ekavokāra bhavo esa nayo catuvokāra pañcavokāra bhavesu tattha kāma bhavo pañca upādiṇṇa kkhandhā

original: Tathā rūpabhavo. Arūpabhavo cattāro, saññābhavo pañca. Asaññābhavo eko upādiṇṇakkhandho.
analyzed: tathā rūpa bhavaḥ arūpa bhavo cattāro saññā bhavo pañca asaññā bhavo ekaḥ upādiṇṇa kkhandho

original: Nevasaññānāsaññābhavo cattāro. Ekavokārabhavādayo ekacatupañcakkhandhā upādiṇṇakkhandhehīti
analyzed: nevasaññā nāsaññā bhavo cattāro eka vokāra bhava ādayaḥ eka catu pañca khandhāḥ upādiṇṇa kkhandhehi iti

original: evamettha dhammatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
analyzed: evam ettha dhammataḥ pi viññātabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ

original: 648. Sātthatoti yathā ca bhavaniddese, tatheva kāmaṃ saṅkhāraniddesepi puññābhisaṅkhārādayova
analyzed: sā atthatā iti yathā ca bhava niddese tathā iva kāmam saṅkhāra niddese pi

original: vuttā, evaṃ santepi purime atītakammavasena idha paṭisandhiyā paccayattā, ime paccuppannakammavasena
analyzed: vuttāḥ evam sante pi purime atīta kamma vasena idha paṭisandhiyā paccayattāḥ ime paccuppanna kamma vasena

original: āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayattāti punavacanaṃ sātthakameva, pubbe vā “tattha katamo
analyzed: āyatim paṭisandhiyā paccaya ttā ti punavacanam sa atthakam eva pubbe vā tattha katamaḥ

original: puññābhisaṅkhāro? Kusalā cetanā kāmāvacarā”ti evamādinā nayena cetanāva saṅkhārāti
analyzed: kusalā cetanā kāma avacarā ati evamādinā nayena

original: vuttā. Idha pana “sabbampi bhavagāmikamma”nti vacanato cetanāsampayuttāpi. Pubbe
analyzed: vuttāḥ idha pana sabbam pi bhava gāmi kamman ti vacanato cetanā sampayuttā api pubbe

original: ca viññāṇapaccayameva kammaṃ “saṅkhārā”ti vuttaṃ. Idāni asaññābhavanibbattakampi.
analyzed: ca viññāṇa paccayam eva kammam saṅkhārā ti vuttam idāni asaññā bhava nibbattakam pi

original: Kiṃ vā bahunā, “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti ettha puññābhisaṅkhārādayova kusalākusalā
analyzed: kim vā bahunā avijjā paccayā saṅkhārā ti ettha puñña abhisaṅkhāra ādayaḥ eva kusala akusalā

original: dhammā vuttā. “Upādānapaccayā bhavo”ti idha pana upapattibhavassāpi saṅgahitattā
analyzed: dhammā vuttāḥ upādāna paccayāḥ bhavaḥ ti idha pana upapatti bhavassa api saṅgahita ttā

original: kusalākusalābyākatā dhammā vuttā. Tasmā sabbathāpi sātthakamevidaṃ punavacananti
analyzed: kusala akusala abyākatāḥ dhammāḥ vuttā tasmā sabbathā api sa atthakam eva idam punavacanan ti

original: evamettha sātthatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
analyzed: evam ettha sa atthataḥ pi viññātabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ

analyzed: kāma bhava nibbattakam kammam so kamma bhavaḥ tad abhinibbattā khandhāḥ upapatti bhavaḥ

original: Esa nayo rūpārūpabhavesu. Evaṃ kāmupādānapaccayā dve kāmabhavā, tadantogadhā ca saññābhavapañcavokārabhavā,

analyzed: dve rūpa bhavā tad antogadhā ca saññā bhava asaññā bhava ekavokāra bhava pañcavokāra bhavā

original: saddhiṃ antogadhehi cha bhavā. Yathā ca kāmupādānapaccayā saddhiṃ antogadhehi cha
analyzed: saddhim antogadhehi cha bhavāḥ yathā ca kāma upādāna paccayā saddhim antogadhehi cha

analyzed: bhavā tathā sesa upādāna paccayā api iti evam upādāna paccayāḥ bhedato saddhim antogadhehi catuvīsati bhavā

original: Saṅgahato pana kammabhavaṃ upapattibhavañca ekato katvā kāmupādānapaccayā saddhiṃ
analyzed: saṅgahato pana kamma bhavam upapatti bhavam ca ekatas katvā kāma upādāna paccayā saddhiṃ

original: Esa nayo rūpārūpabhavesu. Evaṃ upādānapaccayā saddhiṃ antogadhehi dve kāmabhavā,
analyzed: esa nayo rūpa arūpa bhavesu evam upādāna paccayā saddhim antogadhehi dve kāma bhavā

analyzed: bhavassa bheda saṅgahā api viññātabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ

analyzed: vinicchayaḥ ti attho kim pana ittha kassa paccayaḥ hoti yaṃ kiñci yassa kassaci paccayaḥ

original: hotiyeva. Ummattako viya hi puthujjano. So idaṃ yuttaṃ idaṃ ayuttanti avicāretvā

analyzed: tasmā yat ekacce sīlabbata upādānena rūpa arūpa bhavāḥ na honti iti vadanti tam na gahetabbam

analyzed: sabbena pana sabbaḥ hoti iti gahetabbam

analyzed: upapatti hetu bhūtam kammam kamma bhavaḥ kamma abhinibbattā khandhāḥ upapatti bhavaḥ saññā asaññā nevasaññā nāsaññā eka catu pañca vokāra bhavā

analyzed: paccayā ti tattha idha paripakka ttā āyatanānam paripakka āyatanassa kamma karaṇa kāle

original: sammoho dassito. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva.
analyzed: sammohaḥ dassito sesam uttāna attham eva

original: 655. Tayidamevaṃ bhamamānaṃ,

original: Jātipi khandhe ca janeti tesaṃ abhinibbattibhāvena pavattattā, paccayo ca hoti jarāmaraṇassa.

original: anupādinnarūpānīti evaṃ sesāni tepaṇṇāsa rūpāni honti, na tāni ca “cakkhudhātū”ti

original: vavatthapeti. Esa nayo sotadhātuādīsupi. Kāyadhātuyaṃ pana avasesāni tecattālīsa
analyzed: vavatthapa iti esa nayo pana avasesāni tecattālīsa

original: rūpāni honti. Keci pana utucittasamuṭṭhānāni saddena saha nava nava katvā pañcacattālīsāti vadanti.
analyzed: rūpāni honti keci pana utu citta samuṭṭhānāni saddena saha nava nava katvā pañcacattālīsā ati vadanti

original: Iti ime pañca pasādā, tesañca visayā rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbā pañcāti dasa rūpāni
analyzed: iti ime pañca tesam ca visayā rūpa sadda gandha rasa phoṭṭhabbā dasa rūpāni

original: dasa dhātuyo honti. Avasesarūpāni dhammadhātuyeva honti. Cakkhuṃ pana nissāya rūpaṃ
analyzed: dasa dhātuyaḥ honti avasesa rūpāni dhammadhātuyā iva honti cakkhum pana nissāya rūpam

original: ārabbha pavattaṃ cittaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātu nāmāti evaṃ dvepañcaviññāṇāni pañca viññāṇadhātuyo
analyzed: ārabbha pavattam cittam cakkhu viññāṇa dhātu nāma ati evam dve pañca viññāṇāni pañca viññāṇa dhātuyaḥ

original: honti. Tīṇi manodhātucittāni ekā manodhātu, aṭṭhasaṭṭhi manoviññāṇadhātucittāni manoviññāṇadhātūti
analyzed: honti tīṇi manaḥ dhātu cittāni ekā manaḥ dhātu aṭṭha saṭṭhi manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu cittāni manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu uti

original: sabbānipi ekāsīti lokiyacittāni satta viññāṇadhātuyo. Taṃsampayuttā phassādayo dhammadhātūti
analyzed: sabbāni api ekāsīti lokiya cittāni satta viññāṇa dhātuyo tad sampayuttā phassa ādayaḥ dhammadhātu ti

original: evamettha aḍḍhekādasa dhātuyo rūpaṃ, aḍḍhaṭṭhamā dhātuyo nāmanti evameko aṭṭhārasadhātuvasena
analyzed: evam ettha aḍḍha ekādasa dhātuyaḥ rūpam aḍḍha aṭṭhamāḥ dhātuyaḥ nāmanti evam ekaḥ aṭṭhārasa dhātu vasena

original: nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapeti.
analyzed: nāma rūpam vavatthapa iti

original: 666. Aparo dvādasāyatanavasena. Kathaṃ? Cakkhudhātuyaṃ vuttanayeneva ṭhapetvā tepaṇṇāsa
analyzed: aparaḥ dvādasa āyatana vasena katham cakkhudhātuyam vutta nayena iva ṭhapetvā

original: rūpāni cakkhupasādamattaṃ “cakkhāyatana”nti vavatthapeti. Tattha vuttanayeneva ca
analyzed: rūpāni cakkhu upasāda mattam cakkha āyatanan ti vavatthapeti tattha vutta nayena iva ca

original: sotaghānajivhākāyadhātuyo “sotaghānajivhākāyāyatanānī”ti, tesaṃ visayabhūte pañcadhamme
analyzed: sota ghāna jivhā kāya dhātuyo sota ghāna jivhā kāya āyatanāni iti tesam visaya bhūte pañca dhamme

original: “rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbāyatanānī”ti, lokiyasattaviññāṇadhātuyo “manāyatana”nti,
analyzed: rūpa sadda gandha rasa phoṭṭhabba āyatanāni iti lokiya satta viññāṇa dhātuyaḥ manāyatananti

original: taṃsampayuttā phassādayo sesarūpañca “dhammāyatana”nti evamettha aḍḍhekādasa āyatanāni

analyzed: rūpam evam ekaḥ dvādaśa āyatana vasena nāma rūpam vavatthapeti

original: 667. Aparo tato saṃkhittataraṃ khandhavasena vavatthapeti. Kathaṃ? Idha bhikkhu imasmiṃ
analyzed: aparaḥ tatas saṃkhittataram khandha vasena vavatthapeti katham idha bhikkhu imasmin

analyzed: pañca pasādāḥ vatthu rūpam bhāvaḥ jīvitindriyam dvi samuṭṭhānaḥ saddo ti imāni sattarasa

original: rūpāni sammasanupagāni nipphannāni rūparūpāni. Kāyaviññatti, vacīviññatti, ākāsadhātu,
analyzed: rūpāni sammasanupagāni nipphannāni rūpa rūpāni kāya viññatti vacī viññatti ākāsa dhātu

original: dasa rūpāni na sammasanupagāni, ākāravikāraantaraparicchedamattakāni, na nipphannarūpāni,
analyzed: dasa rūpāni na ākāra vikāra antara pariccheda mattakāni na nipphanna rūpāni

original: gatāni. Iti sabbāni petāni sattavīsati rūpāni rūpakkhandho, ekāsītiyā lokiyacittehi
analyzed: gatāni iti sabbāni petāni sattavīsati rūpāni rūpa kkhandho ekāsītiyā lokiya cittehi

analyzed: khandhāḥ nāmanti evam ekaḥ pañca kkhandha vasena nāma rūpam vavatthapeti

original: 668. Aparo “yaṃkiñci rūpaṃ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ cattāri mahābhūtāni catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ
analyzed: aparaḥ yaṃkiñci rūpam sabbam rūpam cattāri mahābhūtāni catunnam ca mahābhūtānam

analyzed: nāma rūpanti saṅkhepataḥ nāma rūpam vavatthapeti

original: 669. Sace panassa tena tena mukhena rūpaṃ pariggahetvā arūpaṃ pariggaṇhato sukhumattā
analyzed: sace pana assa tena tena mukhena rūpam pariggahetvā arūpam pariggaṇhato sukhuma tā

analyzed: yathā hi cakkhumataḥ purisassa a parisuddhe ādāse mukha nimittam olokentassa nimittam

analyzed: parimajjati tassa parisuddhe ādāse nimittam sayam eva pākaṭam hoti yathā ca telatthiko

analyzed: bhikkhunā dhura nikkhepam a katvā rūpam eva punappunam sammasitabbam manasikātabbam

analyzed: pariggahetabbam vavatthapetabbam

analyzed: sannisīdanti kaddama upari udakam viya cittam pasannam hoti tad ārammaṇāḥ arūpa dhammā

analyzed: phassa vasena vā vedanā vasena vā viññāṇa vasena vā katham ekassa tāva pathavī dhātu

original: Sambahulasuttantasaṃsandanā

analyzed: ṭhitam nāma rūpānam yāthāva dassanam diṭṭhi visuddhi iti veditabbam nāma rūpa vavatthānam ti pi

original: saṅkhāraparicchedotipi etasseva adhivacanaṃ.

original: Iti sādhujanapāmojjatthāya kate visuddhimagge

original: Paññābhāvanādhikāre

original: Diṭṭhivisuddhiniddeso nāma

original: 19. Kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhiniddeso
analyzed: kaṅkhā vitaraṇa visuddhi niddesaḥ

original: Paccayapariggahakathā
analyzed: paccaya pariggaha kathā

original: 678. Etasseva pana nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahaṇena tīsu addhāsu kaṅkhaṃ vitaritvā ṭhitaṃ ñāṇaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi nāma.

original: Taṃ sampādetukāmo bhikkhu yathā nāma kusalo bhisakko rogaṃ disvā tassa samuṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: tam sampādetu kāmaḥ bhikkhu yathā nāma kusalaḥ bhisakkaḥ rogam disvā tassa samuṭṭhānam

analyzed: saḥ āditas vas iti paṭisañcikkhati na tāvidham nāma rūpam ahetukam sabbattha sabbadā

analyzed: sabbesam ca eka sadisa bhāva āpattitaḥ na issara ādi hetukam nāma rūpataḥ issara ādīnam

analyzed: abhāvataḥ ye pi nāma rūpam attam eva issara ādayaḥ ti vadanti tesam issara ādi saṅkhāta nāma rūpassa

analyzed: abbhantare nibbattati na maṇi mutta āhāra ādīnam atha kho āmāsaya pakkāsayānam antare

analyzed: duggandha jeguccha paṭikkūlaḥ duggandha jeguccha paṭikkūle parama sambādhe okāse pūtima cha pūti kummāsa oḷigalla candanikā ādīsu

original: kimiva nibbattati. Tassevaṃ nibbattamānassa ‘avijjā taṇhā upādānaṃ kamma’nti ime

analyzed: cattāro dhammā nibbattaka ttā hetu āhāraḥ upatthambhaka ttā paccayaḥ ti pañca dhammā

original: hetupaccayā honti. Tesupi avijjādayo tayo imassa kāyassa mātā viya dārakassa upanissayā

original: honti. Kammaṃ pitā viya puttassa janakaṃ. Āhāro dhāti viya dārakassa sandhārako”ti.
analyzed: honti kammam pitā viya puttassa janakam āhāraḥ dhāti viya dārakassa sandhārakaḥ ti

original: Evaṃ rūpakāyassa paccayapariggahaṃ katvā, puna “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati
analyzed: evam rūpa kāyassa paccaya pariggaham katvā puna cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati

original: cakkhuviññāṇa”ntiādinā nayena nāmakāyassa paccayapariggahaṃ karoti.
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇa nti ādinā nayena nāmakāyassa paccaya pariggaham karoti

original: So evaṃ paccayato nāmarūpassa pavattiṃ disvā yathā idaṃ etarahi, evaṃ atītepi addhāne paccayato pavattittha, anāgatepi paccayato pavattissatīti samanupassati.
analyzed: saḥ evam paccayataḥ nāma rūpassa pavattim disvā yathā idam etarahi evam atīte api addhāne paccayato pavattittha anāgate pi paccayato pavattissati iti samanupassati

original: 680. Tassevaṃ samanupassato yā sā pubbantaṃ ārabbha “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhānaṃ,
analyzed: tassa ivam samanupassataḥ yā sā pubbantam ārabbha ahosim nu kho aham atītam addhānam

analyzed: na nu kho ahosim atīta maddhānam kim nu kho ahosim atīta maddhānam katham nu kho

original: ahosiṃ atītamaddhānaṃ, kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhāna”nti pañcavidhā

analyzed: na nu kho bhavissāmi anāgata maddhānam kim nu kho bhavissāmi anāgata maddhānam katham

analyzed: pañcavidhā vicikicchā vuttā yā api paccuppannam ārabbha etarahi vā pana paccuppannam

original: addhānaṃ ajjhattaṃ kathaṃkathī hoti – ahaṃ nu khosmi, no nu khosmi, kiṃ nu khosmi,
analyzed: addhānam ajjhattam kathaṃkathī hoti aham nu khalu asmi no nu khalu asmi kim nu khalu asmi

original: kathaṃ nu khosmi, ayaṃ nu kho satto kuto āgato, so kuhiṃ gāmī bhavissatī”ti chabbidhā
analyzed: katham nu kha asmi ayam nu kho satto kutas āgataḥ saḥ kuhim gāmī bhavissati iti chabbidhā

analyzed: vicikicchā vuttā sā sabbā api pahīyati

original: 681. Aparo sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇavasena duvidhaṃ nāmassa paccayaṃ passati, kammādivasena
analyzed: aparo sādhāraṇa asādhāraṇa vasena duvidham nāmassa paccayam passati kamma ādi vasena

analyzed: catubbidham rūpassa duvidhaḥ hi nāmassa paccayaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ asādhāraṇaḥ ca tattha cakkha ādīni

original: tato pavattito. Manasikārādiko asādhāraṇo. Yoniso manasikārasaddhammassavanādiko
analyzed: tatas pavattitaḥ manasikāra ādikaḥ asādhāraṇaḥ yonisaḥ manasikāra saddhamma ssavana ādikaḥ

original: hi kusalasseva hoti, viparīto akusalassa, kammādiko vipākassa, bhavaṅgādiko kiriyassāti.

original: Rūpassa pana kammaṃ cittaṃ utu āhāroti ayaṃ kammādiko catubbidho paccayo. Tattha

original: kammaṃ atītameva kammasamuṭṭhānassa rūpassa paccayo hoti. Cittaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānassa

original: uppajjamānaṃ. Utuāhārā utuāhārasamuṭṭhānassa ṭhitikkhaṇe paccayā hontīti. Evameveko
analyzed: uppajjamānam utuāhārā utuāhāra samuṭṭhānassa ṭhiti kkhaṇe paccayāḥ honti iti evam eva eko

original: So evaṃ paccayato nāmarūpassa pavattiṃ disvā yathā idaṃ etarahi, evaṃ atītepi addhāne

analyzed: paccayataḥ pavattittha anāgate pi paccayato pavattissati iti samanupassati tassa evam

original: samanupassato vuttanayeneva tīsupi addhāsu vicikicchā pahīyati.

original: 682. Aparo tesaṃyeva nāmarūpasaṅkhātānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ jarāpattiṃ jiṇṇānañca bhaṅgaṃ

original: saḷāyatane sati, saḷāyatanaṃ nāmarūpe sati, nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṃ saṅkhāresu

analyzed: karoti atha assa vutta nayena iva vicikicchā pahīyati

original: 683. Aparo “iti kho avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti pubbe vitthāretvā dassitaanulomapaṭiccasamuppādavaseneva nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahaṃ karoti. Athassa vuttanayeneva kaṅkhā pahīyati.
analyzed: aparaḥ iti kho avijjā paccayā saṅkhārā ti pubbe vitthāretvā dassita anuloma paṭiccasamuppāda vasena iva nāma rūpassa paccaya pariggaham karoti atha assa vutta nayena iva kaṅkhā pahīyati

original: 684. Aparo “purimakammabhavasmiṃ moho avijjā, āyūhanā saṅkhārā, nikanti taṇhā, upagamanaṃ
analyzed: aparo purima kamma bhavasmim mohaḥ avijjā āyūhanā saṅkhārāḥ nikanti taṇhā upagamanam

analyzed: paccayāḥ idha paṭisandhi viññāṇam okkanti nāma rūpam pasādaḥ āyatanam phuṭṭhaḥ phasso

original: vedayitaṃ vedanāti ime pañca dhammā idhūpapattibhavasmiṃ purekatassa kammassa paccayā.
analyzed: vedayitam vedanā ati ime pañca dhammā idha upapatti bhavasmim purekatassa kammassa paccayā

original: Idha paripakkattā āyatanānaṃ moho avijjā…pe… cetanā bhavoti ime pañca dhammā idha

original: kammabhavasmiṃ āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayā”ti evaṃ kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasena nāmarūpassa

original: paccayapariggahaṃ karoti.
analyzed: paccaya pariggaham karoti

original: 685. Tattha catubbidhaṃ kammaṃ – diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ, upapajjavedanīyaṃ, aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ,

analyzed: tesu eka javana vīthiyam sattasu cittesu kusalā vā akusalā vā paṭhama javana cetanā

original: diṭṭhidhammavedanīyakammaṃ nāma. Taṃ imasmiññeva attabhāve vipākaṃ deti. Tathā asakkontaṃ
analyzed: diṭṭhi dhamma vedanīya kammam nāma tam imasmin ñeva atta bhāve vipākam deti tathā a sakkontam

original: pana “ahosikammaṃ nāhosi kammavipāko, na bhavissati kammavipāko, natthi kammavipāko”ti
analyzed: pana ahosikammam na ahosi kamma vipāko na bhavissati kamma vipāko na atthi kamma vipāko ti

original: imassa tikassa vasena ahosikammaṃ nāma hoti. Atthasādhikā pana sattamajavanacetanā
analyzed: imassa tikassa vasena ahosikammam nāma hoti attha sādhikā pana sattama javana cetanā

original: upapajjavedanīyakammaṃ nāma. Taṃ anantare attabhāve vipākaṃ deti. Tathā asakkontaṃ
analyzed: upapajja vedanīya kammam nāma tam anantare atta bhāve vipākam deti tathā a sakkontam

original: vuttanayeneva ahosikammaṃ nāma hoti. Ubhinnaṃ antare pañca javanacetanā aparāpariyavedanīyakammaṃ
analyzed: vutta nayena iva ahosikammam nāma hoti ubhinnam antare pañca javana cetanāḥ apara apariya vedanīya kammam

original: nāma. Taṃ anāgate yadā okāsaṃ labhati, tadā vipākaṃ deti. Sati saṃsārappavattiyā
analyzed: nāma tam anāgate yadā okāsam labhati tadā vipākam deti sati saṃsāra ppavattiyā

original: ahosikammaṃ nāma na hoti.
analyzed: ahosikammam nāma na hoti

original: 686. Aparampi catubbidhaṃ kammaṃ – yaṃ garukaṃ, yaṃ bahulaṃ, yadāsannaṃ, kaṭattā
analyzed: aparam pi catubbidham kammam yam garukam yam bahulam yat āsannam kaṭattā

original: vā pana kammanti. Tattha kusalaṃ vā hotu akusalaṃ vā, garukāgarukesu yaṃ garukaṃ
analyzed: vā pana kammanti tattha kusalam vā hotu akusalam vā garuka agarukesu yam garukam

original: mātughātādikammaṃ vā mahaggatakammaṃ vā, tadeva paṭhamaṃ vipaccati. Tathā bahulābahulesupi
analyzed: mātughāta ādi kammam vā mahaggata kammam vā tat eva paṭhamam vipaccati tathā bahula abahulesu pi

original: yaṃ bahulaṃ hoti susīlyaṃ vā dussīlyaṃ vā, tadeva paṭhamaṃ vipaccati. Yadāsannaṃ
analyzed: yam bahulam hoti susīlyam vā dussīlyam vā tat eva paṭhamam vipaccati yat āsannam

original: nāma maraṇakāle anussaritakammaṃ. Yañhi āsannamaraṇo anussarituṃ sakkoti, teneva
analyzed: nāma maraṇa kāle anussarita kammam yat hi āsanna maraṇaḥ anussaritum sakkoti tena iva

original: upapajjati. Etehi pana tīhi muttaṃ punappunaṃ laddhāsevanaṃ kaṭattā vā pana kammaṃ
analyzed: upapajjati etehi pana tīhi muttam punappunam laddha āsevanam kaṭattā vā pana kammam

original: nāma hoti, tesaṃ abhāve taṃ paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhati.
analyzed: nāma hoti tesam abhāve tam paṭisandhim ākaḍḍhati

original: 687. Aparampi catubbidhaṃ kammaṃ – janakaṃ, upatthambhakaṃ, upapīḷakaṃ, upaghātakanti.
analyzed: aparam pi catubbidham kammam janakam upatthambhakam upapīḍakam upaghātakam ti

original: Tattha janakaṃ nāma kusalampi hoti akusalampi. Taṃ paṭisandhiyampi pavattepi rūpārūpavipākakkhandhe

original: janeti. Upatthambhakaṃ pana vipākaṃ janetuṃ na sakkoti, aññena kammena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā
analyzed: janeti upatthambhakam pana vipākam janetum na sakkoti aññena kammena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā

original: janite vipāke uppajjamānakasukhadukkhaṃ upatthambheti, addhānaṃ pavatteti. Upapīḷakaṃ

original: aññena kammena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā janite vipāke uppajjamānakasukhadukkhaṃ pīḷeti
analyzed: aññena kammena dinnāya paṭisandhiyāḥ janite vipāke uppajjamānaka sukha dukkham pīḷeti

original: bādhati, addhānaṃ pavattituṃ na deti. Upaghātakaṃ pana sayaṃ kusalampi akusalampi
analyzed: bādhati addhānam pavattitum na deti upaghātakam pana sayam kusalam pi akusalam pi

original: samānaṃ aññaṃ dubbalakammaṃ ghātetvā tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassa okāsaṃ

original: Cattārīsāya ākārehi,

original: Uppādavayapaṭipīḷanatāya, dukkhavatthutāya ca dukkhato. Paccayayāpanīyatāya, rogamūlatāya

original: ca gaṇḍato. Pīḷājanakatāya, antotudanatāya, dunnīharaṇīyatāya ca sallato. Vigarahaṇīyatāya,

original: avaḍḍhiāvahanatāya, aghavatthutāya ca aghato. Aseribhāvajanakatāya, ābādhapadaṭṭhānatāya
analyzed: avaḍḍhi āvahana tāya agha vatthu tāya ca aghataḥ aseri bhāva janaka tāya ābādha padaṭṭhāna tāya

original: palokato. Anekabyasanāvahanatāya ītito. Aviditānaṃyeva vipulānaṃ anatthānaṃ āvahanato,

original: sabbupaddavavatthutāya ca upaddavato. Sabbabhayānaṃ ākaratāya, dukkhavūpasamasaṅkhātassa
analyzed: sabba upaddava vatthu tāya ca upaddavataḥ sabba bhayānam ākara tāya dukkha vūpasama saṅkhātassa

original: upasaggo viya anadhivāsanārahatāya ca upasaggato. Byādhijarāmaraṇehi ceva lābhālābhādīhi

original: pabhaṅguto. Sabbāvatthanipātitāya, thirabhāvassa ca abhāvatāya addhuvato. Atāyanatāya
analyzed: pabhaṅgutaḥ sabbāvattha nipāti tāya thira bhāvassa ca abhāva tāya addhuvataḥ atāyana tāya

analyzed: tattha rūpam dandha nirodham garu parivatti cittam khippa nirodham lahu parivatti tena āha

analyzed: tāva vattati paṭisandhi cittassa uppāda khaṇe uppannam ṭhāna ppattam purejātam vatthum

analyzed: nirujjhati bhaṅga kkhaṇe uppannam sattarasamassa ṭhāna kkhaṇam patvā nirujjhati yāva

analyzed: pavatti nāma atthi evam eva pavattati opapātikānam pi satta santati vasena sattati

analyzed: tattha kammam kamma samuṭṭhānam kamma paccayam kamma paccaya citta samuṭṭhānam

analyzed: kamma paccaya āhāra samuṭṭhānam kamma paccaya otu samuṭṭhānam ti esa vibhāgaḥ veditabbo

original: Tattha kammaṃ nāma kusalākusalacetanā. Kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma vipākakkhandhā ca, cakkhudasakādi
analyzed: tattha kammam nāma kusala akusala cetanā kamma samuṭṭhānam nāma vipāka khandhā ca cakkhu dasaka ādi

original: samasattatirūpañca. Kammapaccayaṃ nāma tadeva, kammaṃ hi kammasamuṭṭhānassa upatthambhakapaccayopi
analyzed: sama sattati rūpam ca kammapaccayam nāma tat eva kammam hi kamma samuṭṭhānassa upatthambhaka paccayaḥ api

original: Yadeva hi paṭividdhaṃ, taṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ “evaṃ paguṇarūpārūpakammaṭṭhāno yā

original: upari bhaṅgānupassanato paṭṭhāya pahānapariññāvasena sabbākārato pattabbā aṭṭhārasa

original: mahāvipassanā. Tāsaṃ idheva tāva ekadesaṃ paṭivijjhanto tappaṭipakkhe dhamme pajahatī”ti.
analyzed: mahāvipassanā tāsam idha iva tāva eka desam paṭivijjhantaḥ tad paṭipakkhe dhamme pajahati iti

original: Udayabbayañāṇakathā
analyzed: udaya bbaya ñāṇa kathā

original: 723. So evaṃ aniccānupassanādipaṭipakkhānaṃ niccasaññādīnaṃ pahānena visuddhañāṇo

analyzed: sammasana ñāṇassa pāram gantvā yam tam sammasana ñāṇa anantaram paccuppannānam dhammānam

original: vipariṇāmānupassane paññā udayabbayānupassane ñāṇa”nti udayabbayānupassanaṃ vuttaṃ,
analyzed: vipariṇāma anupassane paññā udaya bbaya anupassane ñāṇam ti udaya bbaya anupassanam vuttam

analyzed: anupassanā ñāṇam jātā vedanā saññā saṅkhārāḥ viññāṇam jātam cakkhupe jātaḥ bhavaḥ

analyzed: paccuppanno tassa nibbatti lakkhaṇam udayaḥ vipariṇāma lakkhaṇam vayaḥ anupassanā ñāṇanti

original: Yathā pana vīṇāya vādiyamānāya uppannasaddassa neva uppattito pubbe sannicayo atthi,
analyzed: yathā pana vīṇāya vādiyamānāya uppanna saddassa na iva uppattitaḥ pubbe sannicayaḥ atthi

analyzed: passati rūpakkhandhassa udayam passantaḥ imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati

original: Avijjānirodhā… taṇhānirodhā… kammanirodhā… phassanirodhā vedanānirodhoti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena

analyzed: vedanā khandhassa vayam passati vipariṇāma lakkhaṇam passantaḥ api vedanā khandhassa

original: Vedanākkhandhassa viya ca saññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇakkhandhānaṃ. Ayaṃ pana viseso, viññāṇakkhandhassa phassaṭṭhāne “nāmarūpasamudayā, nāmarūpanirodhā”ti –

original: Evaṃ ekekassa khandhassa udayabbayadassane dasa dasa katvā paññāsa lakkhaṇāni vuttāni.

analyzed: sacca paṭiccasamuppāda naya lakkhaṇa bhedāḥ pākaṭāḥ honti

original: maggasaccaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti tatra sammohavighātato.
analyzed: magga saccam pākaṭam hoti tatra sammoha vighātato

analyzed: sati idam hoti iti avabodhataḥ paccayataḥ vaya dassanena paṭilomaḥ paṭiccasamuppādaḥ pākaṭaḥ

original: hoti, “imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhatī”ti avabodhato. Khaṇato pana udayabbayadassanena

analyzed: paṭicca samuppannāḥ dhammāḥ pākaṭāḥ honti saṅkhata lakkhaṇa avabodhataḥ udaya bbayavanto

original: hi saṅkhatā, te ca paṭiccasamuppannāti.
analyzed: hi saṅkhatā te ca paṭicca samuppannā ti

original: 729. Paccayato cassa udayadassanena ekattanayo pākaṭo hoti hetuphalasambandhena santānassa
analyzed: paccayataḥ ca ssa udaya dassanena eka ttanayaḥ pākaṭaḥ hoti hetu phala sambandhena santānassa

analyzed: nānat tanayaḥ pākaṭaḥ hoti nava navānam uppāda avabodhataḥ atha suṭṭhutaram sassata diṭṭhim

original: avasavattibhāvāvabodhato. Atha suṭṭhutaraṃ attadiṭṭhiṃ pajahati. Paccayato pana udayadassanena

original: akiriyadiṭṭhiṃ pajahati.
analyzed: a kiriya diṭṭhim pajahati

original: 730. Paccayato cassa udayadassanena anattalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti dhammānaṃ nirīhakattapaccayapaṭibaddhavuttitāvabodhato.
analyzed: paccayataḥ ca ssa udaya dassanena anatta lakkhaṇam pākaṭam hoti dhammānam nirīhaka tta paccaya paṭibaddha vutti tā avabodhato

original: Khaṇato udayabbayadassanena aniccalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti hutvā abhāvāvabodhato, pubbantāparantavivekāvabodhato

analyzed: tāvakālika ttam pi pākaṭam hoti udaya khaṇe vayassa vaya khaṇe ca udayassa abhāva avabodhato ti

original: 731. Tassevaṃ pākaṭībhūtasaccapaṭiccasamuppādanayalakkhaṇabhedassa “evaṃ kira nāmime
analyzed: tassa ivam pākaṭībhūta sacca paṭiccasamuppāda naya lakkhaṇa bhedassa evam kira nāma ime

original: dhammā anuppannapubbā uppajjanti, uppannā nirujjhantī”ti niccanavāva hutvā saṅkhārā
analyzed: dhammāḥ an uppanna pubbāḥ uppajjanti uppannāḥ nirujjhanti iti hutvā saṅkhārā

original: upaṭṭhahanti. Na kevalañca niccanavā, sūriyuggamane ussāvabindu viya udakabubbuḷo
analyzed: upaṭṭhahanti na kevalam ca nicca navā sūri yuggamane ussāva bindu viya udaka bubbuḷaḥ

original: viya udake daṇḍarāji viya āragge sāsapo viya vijjuppādo viya ca parittaṭṭhāyino.
analyzed: viya udake daṇḍa rāji viya āragge sāsapaḥ viya vijjuppādaḥ viya ca paritta ṭṭhāyinaḥ

original: Māyāmarīcisupinantaalātacakkagandhabbanagarapheṇakadaliādayo viya assārā nissārāti cāpi upaṭṭhahanti.
analyzed: māyā marīci supi nanta alāta cakka gandhabba nagara pheṇaka dali ādayaḥ ca api upaṭṭhahanti

original: Ettāvatānena “vayadhammameva uppajjati, uppannañca vayaṃ upetī”ti iminā ākārena samapaññāsa
analyzed: ettāvatā anena vaya dhammam eva uppajjati uppannam ca vayam upeti iti iminā ākārena samapaññāsa

original: lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitaṃ udayabbayānupassanaṃ nāma taruṇavipassanāñāṇaṃ adhigataṃ
analyzed: lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitam udaya bbaya anupassanam nāma taruṇa vipassanā ñāṇam adhigatam

original: hoti, yassādhigamā āraddhavipassakoti saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
analyzed: hoti yassa adhigamā āraddha vipassakaḥ ti saṅkham gacchati

original: Vipassanupakkilesakathā
analyzed: vipassanā upakkilesa kathā

original: 732. Athassa imāya taruṇavipassanāya āraddhavipassakassa dasa vipassanupakkilesā
analyzed: athassa imāya taruṇa vipassanāya āraddha vipassakassa dasa vipassanu pakkilesā

original: uppajjanti. Vipassanupakkilesā hi paṭivedhappattassa ariyasāvakassa ceva vippaṭipannakassa
analyzed: uppajjanti vipassanu pakkilesāḥ hi paṭivedha ppattassa ariyasāvakassa ca iva vippaṭipannakassa

original: ca nikkhittakammaṭṭhānassa kusītapuggalassa nuppajjanti. Sammāpaṭipannakassa pana
analyzed: ca nikkhitta kammaṭṭhānassa kusīta puggalassa nu pajjanti sammāpaṭipannakassa pana

original: bhātaraṃ, sahāyaṭṭhāne vā sahāyaṃ, parikkhāraṭṭhāne vā parikkhāraṃ maññitvā upanetabbaṃ

original: na passatīti attho. Na ca mama kvacanīti ettha mama-saddaṃ tāva ṭhapetvā na ca kvacanīti
analyzed: na passati iti atthaḥ na ca mama kvacani iti ettha mama saddam tāva ṭhapetvā na ca kvacani iti

original: parassa ca attānaṃ kvaci napassatīti ayamattho. Idāni mama-saddaṃ āharitvā mama kismiñci
analyzed: parassa ca attānam kvaci na passati iti ayam atthaḥ idāni mama saddam āharitvā mama kismiñci

original: kiñcanatatthīti so parassa attā mama kismiñci kiñcanabhāve atthīti na passatīti.
analyzed: so parassa attā mama kismiñci kiñcana bhāve atthi iti na passati iti

original: Attano bhātiṭṭhāne vā bhātaraṃ, sahāyaṭṭhāne vā sahāyaṃ parikkhāraṭṭhāne vā parikkhāranti
analyzed: attanaḥ bhāti ṭṭhāne vā bhātaram sahāya ṭṭhāne vā sahāyam parikkhāra ṭṭhāne vā parikkhāranti

original: kismiñci ṭhāne parassa attānaṃ iminā kiñcanabhāvena upanetabbaṃ na passatīti attho.
analyzed: kismiñci ṭhāne parassa attānam iminā kiñcana bhāvena upanetabbam na passati iti attho

original: Evamayaṃ yasmā neva katthaci attānaṃ passati, na taṃ parassa kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṃ
analyzed: evam ayam yasmā na iva katthaci attānam passati na tam parassa kiñcana bhāve upanetabbam

original: passati, na parassa attānaṃ passati, na parassa attānaṃ attano kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṃ
analyzed: passati na parassa attānam passati na parassa attānam attano kiñcana bhāve upanetabbam

original: passati. Tasmānena catukoṭikā suññatā pariggahitā hotīti.
analyzed: passati tasmā anena catu koṭikā suñña tā pariggahitā hoti iti

original: 761. Evaṃ catukoṭikaṃ suññataṃ pariggahetvā puna chahākārehi suññataṃ pariggaṇhāti.
analyzed: evam catu koṭikam suññatam pariggahetvā puna chahākārehi suññatam pariggaṇhāti

original: Kathaṃ? Cakkhu suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā
analyzed: katham cakkhu suññam attena vā attaniyena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā

original: avipariṇāmadhammena vā…pe… mano suñño. Rūpā suññā…pe… dhammā suññā. Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ…pe…
analyzed: a vipariṇāma dhammena vāpe manaḥ suññaḥ rūpā suññā āpe dhammā suññā cakkhu viññāṇaṃpe

original: manoviññāṇaṃ. Cakkhusamphassoti evaṃ yāva jarāmaraṇā nayo netabbo.
analyzed: manaḥ viññāṇam cakkhu samphasso ti evam yāva jarā maraṇā nayaḥ netabbo

original: 762. Evaṃ chahākārehi suññataṃ pariggahetvā puna aṭṭhahākārehi pariggaṇhāti. Seyyathidaṃ
analyzed: evam chahākārehi suññatam pariggahetvā puna aṭṭhahākārehi pariggaṇhāti sā iyyathidam

original: – rūpaṃ asāraṃ nissāraṃ sārāpagataṃ niccasārasārena vā dhuvasārasārena vā sukhasārasārena
analyzed: rūpam asāram nissāram sāra apagatam nicca sāra sārena vā dhuva sārena vā sukha sāra sārena

original: vā attasārasārena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vā. Vedanā…
analyzed: vā atta sāra sārena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā a vipariṇāma dhammena vā vedanā

original: saññā… saṅkhārā… viññāṇaṃ… cakkhu…pe… jarāmaraṇaṃ asāraṃ nissāraṃ sārāpagataṃ niccasārasārena
analyzed: saññā saṅkhārāḥ viññāṇam cakkhupe jarā maraṇam asāram nissāram sāra apagatam nicca sāra sārena

original: vā dhuvasārasārena vā sukhasārasārena vā attasārasārena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā
analyzed: vā dhuva sāra sārena vā sukha sāra sārena vā atta sāra sārena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā

original: sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vā. Yathā naḷo asāro nissāro sārāpagato. Yathā eraṇḍo…
analyzed: sassatena vā a vipariṇāma dhammena vā yathā naḷaḥ asāraḥ nissāraḥ sāra apagataḥ yathā eraṇḍaḥ

original: yathā udumbaro… yathā setavaccho… yathā pāḷibhaddako… yathā pheṇapiṇḍo… yathā udakabubbuḷaṃ…
analyzed: yathā udumbaraḥ yathā setavacchaḥ yathā pāḷibhaddakaḥ yathā pheṇapiṇḍaḥ yathā udakabubbuḷam

original: yathā marīci… yathā kadalikkhandho… yathā māyā asārā nissārā sārāpagatā, evameva
analyzed: yathā marīci yathā kadali kkhandhaḥ yathā māyā asārā nissārā sāra apagatā evam eva

original: rūpaṃ…pe… jarāmaraṇaṃ asāraṃ nissāraṃ sārāpagataṃ niccasārasārena vā…pe… avipariṇāmadhammena vāti.
analyzed: jarā maraṇam asāram nissāram sāra apagatam nicca sāra sārena vāpe a vipariṇāma dhammena vāti

original: 763. So evaṃ aṭṭhahākārehi suññataṃ pariggahetvā puna dasahākārehi pariggaṇhāti,
analyzed: saḥ evam aṭṭhahākārehi suññatam pariggahetvā puna dasahākārehi pariggaṇhāti

original: rūpaṃ rittato passati. Tucchato… suññato… anattato… anissariyato… akāmakāriyato…
analyzed: rūpam rittataḥ passati tucchataḥ suññataḥ anattataḥ a nissariyataḥ a kāmakāriyataḥ

original: alabbhanīyato… avasavattakato… parato… vivittato passati. Vedanaṃ…pe… viññāṇaṃ rittato…pe…
analyzed: a labbhanīyataḥ a vasavattakataḥ paratas vivittataḥ passati vedanam pe viññāṇam

original: vivittato passatīti.
analyzed: vivittataḥ passati iti

original: 764. Evaṃ dasahākārehi suññataṃ pariggahetvā puna dvādasahākārehi pariggaṇhāti. Seyyathidaṃ
analyzed: evam dasahā ākārehi suññatam pariggahetvā puna dvādasahā ākārehi pariggaṇhāti sā iyyathidam

original: – rūpaṃ na satto, na jīvo, na naro, na māṇavo, na itthī, na puriso, na attā, na attaniyaṃ.
analyzed: rūpam na sattaḥ na jīvaḥ na naraḥ na māṇavaḥ na itthī na purisaḥ na attā na attaniyam

original: Nāhaṃ, na mama, na aññassa, na kassaci. Vedanā…pe… viññāṇaṃ na kassacīti.
analyzed: na aham na mama na aññassa na kassaci vedanā pe viññāṇam na kassaci iti

original: 765. Evaṃ dvādasahākārehi suññataṃ pariggaṇhitvā puna tīraṇapariññāvasena dvācattālīsāya
analyzed: evam dvādasahā ākārehi suññatam pariggaṇhitvā puna tīraṇa pariññā vasena dvācattālīsāya

original: ākārehi suññataṃ pariggaṇhāti, rūpaṃ aniccato… dukkhato… rogato… gaṇḍato… sallato…
analyzed: ākārehi suññatam pariggaṇhāti rūpam aniccataḥ dukkhataḥ rogataḥ gaṇḍataḥ sallataḥ

original: aghato… ābādhato… parato… palokato… ītito… upaddavato… bhayato… upasaggato… calato…
analyzed: aghataḥ ābādhataḥ paratas palokataḥ ītitaḥ upaddavataḥ bhayataḥ upasaggataḥ calataḥ

original: pabhaṅguto… addhuvato… atāṇato… aleṇato… asaraṇato… asaraṇībhūtato… rittato… tucchato…
analyzed: pabhaṅgutaḥ addhuvataḥ a tāṇataḥ a leṇataḥ a saraṇataḥ a saraṇībhūtataḥ rittataḥ tucchataḥ

original: suññato… anattato… anassādato… ādīnavato… vipariṇāmadhammato… assārakato… aghamūlato…
analyzed: suññataḥ anattataḥ anassādataḥ ādīnavataḥ vipariṇāma dhammataḥ assārakataḥ agha mūlataḥ

original: vadhakato… vibhavato… sāsavato… saṅkhatato… mārāmisato… jātidhammato… jarādhammato…
analyzed: vadhakataḥ vibhavataḥ sāsavataḥ saṅkhatataḥ māra amisataḥ jāti dhammataḥ jarā dhammataḥ

original: byādhidhammato… maraṇadhammato… sokaparidevadukkhadomanassaupāyāsadhammato… samudayato…
analyzed: byādhi dhammataḥ maraṇa dhammataḥ soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsa dhammataḥ samudayato

original: atthaṅgamato… anassādato … ādīnavato… nissaraṇato passati. Vedanaṃ…pe… viññāṇaṃ aniccato…pe…
analyzed: atthaṅgamataḥ anassādataḥ ādīnavataḥ nissaraṇataḥ passati vedanam pe viññāṇam anicca tā pe

original: nissaraṇato passati.
analyzed: nissaraṇataḥ passati

original: Vuttampi cetaṃ – “rūpaṃ aniccato…pe… nissaraṇato passanto suññato lokaṃ avekkhati. Vedanaṃ…pe… viññāṇaṃ aniccato…pe… nissaraṇato passanto suññato lokaṃ avekkhati”.
analyzed: vuttam pi ca itam rūpam anicca tope nissaraṇataḥ passanto suññatas lokaṃ avekkhati vedanam pe viññāṇam anicca tope nissaraṇataḥ passanto suññatas lokaṃ avekkhati

original: “Suññato lokaṃ avekkhassu, mogharāja sadā sato;
analyzed: suññatas lokam avekkhassu mogha rāja sadā sataḥ

original: Attānudiṭṭhiṃ ūhacca, evaṃ maccutaro siyā;
analyzed: attā anudiṭṭhim ūhat ca evam maccutaraḥ siyā

original: Evaṃ lokaṃ avekkhantaṃ, maccurājā na passatī”ti. ;
analyzed: evam lokaṃ avekkhantam maccu rājā na passati iti

original: 766. Evaṃ suññato disvā tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā saṅkhāre pariggaṇhanto bhayañca nandiñca
analyzed: evam suññatas disvā tilakkhaṇam āropetvā saṅkhāre pariggaṇhantaḥ bhayam ca nandiñca

original: vippahāya saṅkhāresu udāsīno ahosi majjhatto, ahanti vā mamanti vā na gaṇhāti vissaṭṭhabhariyo viya puriso.
analyzed: vippahāya saṅkhāresu udāsīnaḥ ahosi majjhattaḥ ahanti vā mamanti vā na gaṇhāti vissaṭṭha bhariyaḥ viya puriso

original: Yathā nāma purisassa bhariyā bhaveyya iṭṭhā kantā manāpā, so tāya vinā muhuttampi
analyzed: yathā nāma purisassa bhariyā bhaveyya iṭṭhā kantā manāpā saḥ tāya vinā muhuttam pi

original: adhivāsetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya, ativiya naṃ mamāyeyya, so taṃ itthiṃ aññena purisena saddhiṃ
analyzed: adhivāsetum na sakkuṇeyya ativiya nam mamāyeyya saḥ tam itthim aññena purisena saddhim

original: ṭhitaṃ vā nisinnaṃ vā kathentiṃ vā hasantiṃ vā disvā kupito assa anattamano, adhimattaṃ
analyzed: ṭhitam vā nisinnam vā kathentim vā hasantim vā disvā kupitaḥ assa an atta manaḥ adhimattam

original: domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeyya. So aparena samayena tassā itthiyā dosaṃ disvā muñcitukāmo
analyzed: domanassam paṭisaṃvedeyya saḥ aparena samayena tassāḥ itthiyāḥ dosam disvā muñcitu kāmo

original: hutvā taṃ vissajjeyya, na naṃ mamāti gaṇheyya. Tato paṭṭhāya taṃ yenakenaci saddhiṃ
analyzed: hutvā tam vissajjeyya na nam mama ati gaṇheyya tatas paṭṭhāya tam yena kenacid saddhim

original: yaṃkiñci kurumānaṃ disvāpi neva kuppeyya, na domanassaṃ āpajjeyya, aññadatthu udāsīnova
analyzed: yaṃ kiñci kurumānam disvā api na iva kuppeyya na domanassam āpajjeyya añña datthu udāsīnaḥ uva

original: bhaveyya majjhatto. Evamevāyaṃ sabbasaṅkhārehi muñcitukāmo hutvā paṭisaṅkhānupassanāya
analyzed: bhaveyya majjhattaḥ evam eva ayam sabba saṅkhārehi muñcitu kāmo hutvā paṭisaṅkhā anupassanāya

original: saṅkhāre pariggaṇhanto ahaṃ mamāti gahetabbaṃ adisvā bhayañca nandiñca vippahāya
analyzed: saṅkhāre pariggaṇhantaḥ aham mama ati gahetabbam a disvā bhayam ca nandiñca vippahāya

original: sabbasaṅkhāresu udāsīno hoti majjhatto.
analyzed: sabba saṅkhāresu udāsīnaḥ hoti majjhatto

original: Tassa evaṃ jānato evaṃ passato tīsu bhavesu catūsu yonīsu pañcasu gatīsu sattasu
analyzed: tassa evam jānataḥ evam passataḥ tīsu bhavesu catūsu yonīsu pañcasu gatīsu sattasu

original: viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu navasu sattāvāsesu cittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati na sampasāriyati,
analyzed: viññāṇa ṭṭhitīsu navasu sattāvāsesu cittam patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati na sampasāriyati

original: upekkhā vā pāṭikulyatā vā saṇṭhāti.
analyzed: upekkhā vā pāṭikulyatā vā saṇṭhāti

original: Seyyathāpi nāma padumapalāse īsakapoṇe udakaphusitāni patilīyanti patikuṭanti pativattanti
analyzed: seyyathā api nāma paduma palāse īsaka poṇe udaka phusitāni patilīyanti patikuṭanti pativattanti

original: na sampasāriyanti, evameva…pe… seyyathāpi nāma kukkuṭapattaṃ vā nahārudaddulaṃ vā
analyzed: na sampasāriyanti seyyathā api nāma kukkuṭa pattam vā nahāru daddulam vā

original: aggimhi pakkhittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati na sampasāriyati, evameva tassa
analyzed: aggimhi pakkhittam patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati na sampasāriyati evam eva tassa

original: tīsu bhavesu cittaṃ…pe… upekkhā vā pāṭikulyatā vā saṇṭhāti. Iccassa saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ nāma uppannaṃ hoti.
analyzed: tīsu bhavesu upekkhā vā pāṭikulyatā vā saṇṭhāti iccassa saṅkhāra upekkhā ñāṇam nāma uppannam hoti

original: 767. Taṃ panetaṃ sace santipadaṃ nibbānaṃ santato passati, sabbaṃ saṅkhārappavattaṃ
analyzed: tam pana etam sace santi padam nibbānam santatas passati sabbam saṅkhāra ppavattam

original: vissajjetvā nibbānameva pakkhandati. No ce nibbānaṃ santato passati, punappunaṃ saṅkhārārammaṇameva
analyzed: vissajjetvā nibbānam eva pakkhandati no ce nibbānam santataḥ passati punappunam saṅkhāra ārammaṇam eva

original: hutvā pavattati sāmuddikānaṃ disākāko viya. Sāmuddikā kira vāṇijakā nāvaṃ ārohantā
analyzed: hutvā pavattati sāmuddikānam disākākaḥ sāmuddikāḥ kira vāṇijakāḥ nāvam ārohantā

original: disākākaṃ nāma gaṇhanti, te yadā nāvā vātakkhittā videsaṃ pakkhandati, tīraṃ na paññāyati,
analyzed: disākākam nāma gaṇhanti te yadā nāvā vāta khittā videsam pakkhandati tīram na paññāyati

original: tadā disākākaṃ vissajjenti. So kūpakayaṭṭhito ākāsaṃ laṅghitvā sabbā disā ca vidisā
analyzed: tadā disākākam vissajjenti saḥ kūpa kaya ṭṭhitaḥ ākāsam laṅghitvā sabbā disā ca vidisā

original: ca anugantvā sace tīraṃ passati, tadabhimukhova gacchati. No ce passati, punappunaṃ
analyzed: ca anugantvā sace tīram passati tad abhimukhaḥ uva gacchati no ce passati punappunam

original: āgantvā kūpakayaṭṭhiṃyeva allīyati. Evameva sace saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ santipadaṃ nibbānaṃ
analyzed: āgantvā kūpaka yaṭṭhiṃyā iva allīyati evam eva sace saṅkhāra upekkhā ñāṇam santi padam nibbānam

original: santato passati, sabbaṃ saṅkhārappavattaṃ vissajjetvā nibbānameva pakkhandati. No
analyzed: santataḥ passati sabbam saṅkhāra ppavattam vissajjetvā nibbānam eva pakkhandati no

original: ce passati, punappunaṃ saṅkhārārammaṇameva hutvā pavattati.
analyzed: ce passati punappunam saṅkhāra ārammaṇam eva hutvā pavattati

original: Tadidaṃ suppagge piṭṭhaṃ vaṭṭayamānaṃ viya. Nibbaṭṭitakappāsaṃ vihanamānaṃ viya nānappakārato
analyzed: tat idam suppagge piṭṭham vaṭṭayamānam viya nibbaṭṭita kappāsam vihanamānam viya nānā ppakārataḥ

original: saṅkhāre pariggahetvā bhayañca nandiñca pahāya saṅkhāravicinane majjhattaṃ hutvā
analyzed: saṅkhāre pariggahetvā bhayam ca nandiñca pahāya saṅkhāra vicinane majjhattam hutvā

original: tividhānupassanāvasena tiṭṭhati. Evaṃ tiṭṭhamānaṃ tividhavimokkhamukhabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā
analyzed: tividha anupassanā vasena tiṭṭhati evam tiṭṭhamānam tividha vimokkha mukha bhāvam āpajjitvā

original: sattaariyapuggalavibhāgāya paccayo hoti.
analyzed: satta ariya puggala vibhāgāya paccayaḥ hoti

original: 768. Tatridaṃ tividhānupassanāvasena pavattanato tiṇṇaṃ indriyānaṃ ādhipateyyavasena
analyzed: tatra idam tividha anupassanā vasena pavattanataḥ tiṇṇam indriyānam ādhipateyya vasena

original: tividhavimokkhamukhabhāvaṃ āpajjati nāma. Tisso hi anupassanā tīṇi vimokkhamukhānīti vuccanti. Yathāha –
analyzed: tividha vimokkha mukha bhāvam āpajjati nāma tissaḥ hi anupassanā tīṇi vimokkha mukhāni iti vuccanti yathā āha

original: “Tīṇi kho panimāni vimokkhamukhāni lokaniyyānāya saṃvattanti, sabbasaṅkhāre paricchedaparivaṭumato
analyzed: tīṇi kho panimāni vimokkha mukhāni loka niyyānāya saṃvattanti sabba saṅkhāre pariccheda parivaṭumato

original: samanupassanatāya, animittāya ca dhātuyā cittasampakkhandanatāya, sabbasaṅkhāresu
analyzed: samanupassana tāya animittāya ca dhātuyā citta sampakkhandana tāya sabba saṅkhāresu

original: manosamuttejanatāya, appaṇihitāya ca dhātuyā cittasampakkhandanatāya, sabbadhamme
analyzed: manaḥ samuttejana tāya appaṇihitāya ca dhātuyā citta sampakkhandana tāya sabba dhamme

original: parato samanupassanatāya, suññatāya ca dhātuyā cittasampakkhandanatāya, imāni tīṇi
analyzed: paratas samanupassana tāya suñña tāya ca dhātuyā citta sampakkhandana tāya imāni tīṇi

original: vimokkhamukhāni lokaniyyānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
analyzed: vimokkha mukhāni loka niyyānāya saṃvattanti iti

original: Tattha paricchedaparivaṭumatoti udayabbayavasena paricchedato ceva parivaṭumato ca.
analyzed: tattha udaya bbaya vasena paricchedato ca iva parivaṭumato ca

original: Aniccānupassanaṃ hi “udayato pubbe saṅkhārā natthī”ti paricchinditvā tesaṃ gatiṃ
analyzed: anicca anupassanam hi udayataḥ pubbe saṅkhārāḥ na atthi iti paricchinditvā tesam gatim

original: samannesamānaṃ “vayato paraṃ na gacchanti, ettheva antaradhāyantī”ti parivaṭumato
analyzed: samannesamānam vayataḥ param na gacchanti etthā iva antaradhāyanti iti parivaṭumataḥ

original: samanupassati. Manosamuttejanatāyāti cittasaṃvejanatāya. Dukkhānupassanena hi saṅkhāresu
analyzed: samanupassati manaḥ samuttejana tāya ati citta saṃvejana tāya dukkha anupassanena hi saṅkhāresu

original: cittaṃ saṃvejeti. Parato samanupassanatāyāti “nāhaṃ, na mamā”ti evaṃ anattato samanupassanatāya.

analyzed: ajjhattā ca vuṭṭhāne pi

original: viya muñcitukamyatāñāṇaṃ, tattheva dārakassa oropanaṃ viya anulomaṃ, oropetvā antaravīthiyaṃ
analyzed: viya muñcitu kamya tā ñāṇam tattha iva dārakassa oropanam viya anulomam oropetvā antara vīthiyam

original: ṭhitakālo viya gotrabhu, pāsādārūhanaṃ viya maggo, āruyha nisīdanaṃ viya phalaṃ.
analyzed: ṭhita kālaḥ viya gotrabhu pāsāda ārūhanam viya maggaḥ āruyha nisīdanam viya phalam

original: 796. Khuddaṃ pipāsaṃ sītuṇhaṃ, andhakāraṃ visena cāti imā pana cha upamā vuṭṭhānagāminiyā
analyzed: khuddam pipāsam sītuṇham andhakāram visena ca ati imā pana cha upamā vuṭṭhāna gāminiyā

original: vipassanāya ṭhitassa lokuttaradhammābhimukhaninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttā.
analyzed: vipassanāya ṭhitassa lokuttara dhamma abhimukha ninna poṇa pabbhāra bhāva dassana attham vuttā

original: Yathā hi khuddāya abhibhūto sujighacchito puriso sādurasaṃ bhojanaṃ pattheti, evamevāyaṃ
analyzed: yathā hi khuddāya abhibhūtaḥ su jighacchitaḥ purisaḥ sādurasam bhojanam pattheti evam eva ayam

original: saṃsāravaṭṭajighacchāya phuṭṭho yogāvacaro amatarasaṃ kāyagatāsatibhojanaṃ pattheti.
analyzed: saṃsāra vaṭṭa jighacchāya phuṭṭhaḥ yogāvacaraḥ amata rasam kāya gata asati bhojanam pattheti

original: Yathā ca pipāsito puriso parisussamānakaṇṭhamukho anekaṅgasambhāraṃ pānakaṃ pattheti, evamevāyaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭapipāsāya phuṭṭho yogāvacaro ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikamaggapānakaṃ pattheti.
analyzed: yathā ca pipāsitaḥ purisaḥ parisussamāna kaṇṭha mukhaḥ aneka aṅga sambhāram pānakam pattheti evam eva ayam saṃsāra vaṭṭa pipāsāya phuṭṭhaḥ yogāvacaraḥ ariyam aṭṭhaṅgika magga pānakam pattheti

original: Yathā pana sītasamphuṭṭho puriso uṇhaṃ pattheti, evamevāyaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭe taṇhāsinehasītena phuṭṭho yogāvacaro kilesasantāpakaṃ maggatejaṃ pattheti.
analyzed: yathā pana sīta samphuṭṭhaḥ purisaḥ uṇham pattheti evam eva ayam saṃsāra vaṭṭe taṇhā sineha sītena phuṭṭhaḥ yogāvacaraḥ kilesa santāpakam magga tejam pattheti

original: Yathā ca uṇhasamphuṭṭho puriso sītaṃ pattheti, evamevāyaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭe ekādasaggisantāpasantatto yogāvacaro ekādasaggivūpasamaṃ nibbānaṃ pattheti.
analyzed: yathā ca uṇha samphuṭṭhaḥ purisaḥ sītam pattheti evam eva ayam saṃsāra vaṭṭe ekādasa aggi santāpa santattaḥ yogāvacaraḥ ekādasa aggi vūpasamam nibbānam pattheti

original: Yathā pana andhakārapareto puriso ālokaṃ pattheti, evamevāyaṃ avijjandhakārena onaddhapariyonaddho yogāvacaro ñāṇālokaṃ maggabhāvanaṃ pattheti.
analyzed: yathā pana andhakāra paretaḥ purisaḥ ālokam pattheti evam eva ayam avijja andhakārena onaddha pariyonaddhaḥ yogāvacaraḥ ñāṇa ālokam magga bhāvanam pattheti

original: Yathā ca visasamphuṭṭho puriso visaghātanaṃ bhesajjaṃ pattheti, evamevāyaṃ kilesavisasamphuṭṭho
analyzed: yathā ca visa samphuṭṭhaḥ purisaḥ visa ghātanam bhesajjam pattheti evam eva ayam kilesa visa samphuṭṭhaḥ

original: yogāvacaro kilesavisanimmathanaṃ amatosadhaṃ nibbānaṃ pattheti. Tena vuttaṃ – “tassevaṃ
analyzed: yogāvacaraḥ kilesa visa nimmathanam amatosadham nibbānam pattheti tena vuttam tassa evam

original: 797. Ettāvatā ca panesa patilīnacaro nāma hoti, yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –

original: “Patilīnacarassa bhikkhuno,

original: Bhajamānassa vivittamāsanaṃ;

original: Sāmaggiyamāhu tassa taṃ,
analyzed: sāmaggiyam āhu tassa tam

original: Yo attānaṃ bhavane na dassaye”ti. ;
analyzed: yaḥ attānam bhavane na dassayeti

original: Evamidaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ yogino patilīnacarabhāvaṃ niyametvā uttari ariyamaggassāpi

analyzed: bojjhaṅga magga aṅga jhāna aṅga paṭipadā vimokkha visesam niyameti keci hi therāḥ bojjhaṅga magga aṅga jhāna aṅgānaṃ

original: visesaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ niyametīti vadanti. Keci vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā
analyzed: visesam pādakajjhānam niyameti iti vadanti keci vipassanāya ārammaṇa bhūtā khandhā

original: pubbabhāgavuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāva niyametīti veditabbā.

original: 798. Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā – vipassanāniyamena hi sukkhavipassakassa uppannamaggopi,
analyzed: tatra ayam anupubbi kathā vipassanā niyamena hi sukkha vipassakassa uppanna maggaḥ api

original: samāpattilābhino jhānaṃ pādakaṃ akatvā uppannamaggopi, paṭhamajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā

original: somanassasahagatāpi upekkhāsahagatāpi hutvā vuṭṭhānakāle saṅkhārupekkhābhāvaṃ patvā

analyzed: somanassa sahagatā hoti pañcaka naye dutiya tatiya catuttha jjhānāni pādakāni katvā uppādita maggesu

original: yathākkameneva jhānaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ tivaṅgikaṃ duvaṅgikañca hoti. Sabbesu pana satta

original: pana upekkhācittekaggatāvasena dve jhānaṅgāni bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgāni cha satta ceva.
analyzed: pana upekkhā citta ekagga tā vasena dve jhāna aṅgāni bojjhaṅga maggaṅgāni cha satta ca iva

original: Ayampi viseso ubhayaniyamavasena hoti. Imasmiṃ hi naye pubbabhāgavipassanā somanassasahagatā

analyzed: dutiya thera vāde pana yatas yatas samāpattitaḥ vuṭṭhāya ye ye samāpatti dhamme sammasitvā

analyzed: maggaḥ nibbattitaḥ hoti tad tad samāpatti sadisaḥ va hoti tatra api ca vipassanā niyamaḥ vutta nayena iva veditabbaḥ

original: 800. Tatiyattheravāde attano attano ajjhāsayānurūpena yaṃ yaṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā

analyzed: pana sammasita jjhānam vā vinā tam na ijjhati nandaka uvāda suttena

original: dīpetabbo. Etthāpi ca vipassanāniyamo vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Evaṃ tāva saṅkhārupekkhā

original: bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgajhānaṅgāni niyametīti veditabbā.
analyzed: bojjhaṅga maggaṅga jhānaṅgāni niyameti iti veditabbā

original: 801. Sace panāyaṃ ādito kilese vikkhambhayamānā dukkhena sappayogena sasaṅkhārena
analyzed: sace pana ayam āditas kilese vikkhambhayamānā dukkhena sa ppayogena sa saṅkhārena

analyzed: pana vikkhambhetvā vipassanā parivāsam magga pātubhāvam saṇikam kurumānā dandha abhiññā
