analyzed: attanaḥ attanaḥ maggassa nāmam deti tena maggo cattāri nāmāni labhati

original: Sā panāyaṃ paṭipadā kassaci bhikkhuno nānā hoti, kassaci catūsupi maggesu ekāva.
analyzed: sā pana ayam paṭipadā kassaci bhikkhuno nānā hoti kassaci catūsu pi maggesu ekā ava

original: Buddhānaṃ pana cattāropi maggā sukhāpaṭipadā khippābhiññāva ahesuṃ. Tathā dhammasenāpatissa.
analyzed: buddhānam pana cattāro api maggā sukhā paṭipadā khippa abhiññā ava ahesum tathā dhammasenāpatissa

original: Mahāmoggallānattherassa pana paṭhamamaggo sukhāpaṭipado khippābhiñño ahosi. Upari
analyzed: mahāmoggallāna therassa pana paṭhama maggo sukhā paṭipadaḥ khippa abhiñño ahosi upari

original: tayo dukkhāpaṭipadā dandhābhiññā. Yathā ca paṭipadā, evaṃ adhipatayopi kassaci bhikkhuno
analyzed: tayaḥ dukkha apaṭipadāḥ dandha abhiññāḥ yathā ca paṭipadā evam adhipatayaḥ api kassaci bhikkhuno

original: catūsu maggesu nānā honti. Kassaci catūsupi ekāva. Evaṃ saṅkhārupekkhā paṭipadāvisesaṃ

original: niyameti. Yathā pana vimokkhavisesaṃ niyameti, taṃ pubbe vuttameva.

original: 802. Apica maggo nāma pañcahi kāraṇehi nāmaṃ labhati sarasena vā paccanīkena vā saguṇena
analyzed: apica maggaḥ nāma pañcahi kāraṇehi nāmam labhati sa rasena vā paccanīkena vā sa guṇena

analyzed: vā ārammaṇena vā āgamanena vā sace hi saṅkhāra upekkhā aniccataḥ saṅkhāre sammasitvā

analyzed: vimuccati sace anattataḥ sammasitvā vuṭṭhāti suññata vimokkhena vimuccati idam sarasataḥ nāmam nāma

original: Yasmā panesa aniccānupassanāya saṅkhārānaṃ ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā niccanimittadhuvanimittasassatanimittāni
analyzed: yasmai pana esa anicca anupassanāya saṅkhārānam ghana vinibbhogam katvā nicca nimitta dhuva nimitta sassata nimittāni

analyzed: pajahantaḥ āgataḥ tasmai animitto dukkha anupassanāya pana sukha saññam pahāya paṇidhim

original: patthanaṃ sukkhāpetvā āgatattā appaṇihito. Anattānupassanāya attasattapuggalasaññaṃ

analyzed: pahāya saṅkhārānam suññatas diṭṭha ttā suññatas ti idam paccanīkato nāmam nāma

original: Rāgādīhi panesa suññattā suññato, rūpanimittādīnaṃ rāganimittādīnaññeva vā abhāvena animitto, rāgapaṇidhiādīnaṃ abhāvato appaṇihitoti idamassa saguṇato nāmaṃ.
analyzed: rāga ādīhi pana esa suññattā suññataḥ rūpa nimitta ādīnam vā abhāvena animittaḥ rāga paṇidhi ādīnam abhāvataḥ appaṇihitaḥ ti idam assa saguṇataḥ nāmam

original: Svāyaṃ suññaṃ animittaṃ appaṇihitañca nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karotītipi suññato animitto appaṇihitoti vuccati. Idamassa ārammaṇato nāmaṃ.
analyzed: svāyam suññam animittam appaṇihitam ca nibbānam ārammaṇam karoti iti pi suññataḥ animittaḥ appaṇihitaḥ ti vuccati idam assa ārammaṇato nāmam

original: 803. Āgamanaṃ pana duvidhaṃ vipassanāgamanaṃ maggāgamanañca. Tattha magge vipassanāgamanaṃ
analyzed: āgamanam pana duvidham vipassanā āgamanam magga āgamanam ca tattha magge vipassanā āgamanam

original: maggo suññato, aniccānupassanā animittā nāma, animittavipassanāya maggo animitto.
analyzed: maggo suññatas anicca anupassanā animittā nāma animitta vipassanāya maggaḥ animittaḥ

original: Idaṃ pana nāmaṃ na abhidhammapariyāyena labbhati, suttantapariyāyena labbhati. Tatra
analyzed: idam pana nāmam na abhidhamma pariyāyena labbhati suttanta pariyāyena labbhati tatra

original: ṭhatvā maggassa nāmaṃ detīti vadanti. Tena maggo animittoti vutto. Maggāgamanena
analyzed: ṭhatvā maggassa nāmam deti iti vadanti tena maggaḥ animittaḥ iti vuttaḥ magga āgamanena

original: pana phalaṃ animittanti yujjatiyeva. Dukkhānupassanā saṅkhāresu paṇidhiṃ sukkhāpetvā
analyzed: pana phalam animittan ti yujjati yā iva dukkha anupassanā saṅkhāresu paṇidhim sukkhāpetvā

original: āgatattā appaṇihitā nāma, appaṇihitavipassanāya maggo appaṇihito, appaṇihitamaggassa

analyzed: phalam appaṇihitam evam vipassanā attanaḥ nāmam maggassa deti maggo phalassa ati idam

original: āgamanato nāmaṃ. Evamayaṃ saṅkhārupekkhā vimokkhavisesaṃ niyametīti.

original: Saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
analyzed: saṅkhāra upekkhā ñāṇam niṭṭhitam

original: aladdhāsevanatāya vedhamāno so puriso viya na tāva suppatiṭṭhito hoti, tato maggañāṇena patiṭṭhātīti.
analyzed: a laddha āsevana tāya vedhamāno saḥ purisaḥ viya na tāva su patiṭṭhitaḥ hoti tatas magga ñāṇena patiṭṭhāti iti

analyzed: tattha anulomam sacca paṭicchādakam kilesatamam vinodetum sakkoti na nibbānam ārammaṇam

original: kātuṃ. Gotrabhu nibbānameva ārammaṇaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti, na saccapaṭicchādakaṃ tamaṃ

analyzed: vinodetum tatra ayam upamā ekaḥ kira cakkhumā purisaḥ nakkhatta yogam jānissāmi iti

original: majjhime, aparo sukhumeti. Tato so puriso vigatavalāhake nabhe candaṃ disvā nakkhattayogaṃ aññāsi.
analyzed: majjhime aparaḥ sukhuma iti tatas so purisaḥ vigata valāhake nabhe candam disvā nakkhatta yogam aññāsi

original: Tattha tayo valāhakā viya saccapaṭicchādakathūlamajjhimasukhumaṃ kilesandhakāraṃ,

analyzed: nibbijjhana padālanam

original: Sotāpannapuggalakathā
analyzed: sotāpanna puggala kathā

analyzed: magga cittam dve phala cittāni honti tena vuttam dve tīṇi vā phala cittāni uppajjanti iti

analyzed: iti sotāpannassa ariyasāvakassa pañca paccavekkhaṇāni honti yathā ca sotāpannassa

analyzed: dutiya magga ñāṇa kathā

analyzed: sammāājīvaḥ paggaha ṭṭhena sammāvāyāmaḥ upaṭṭhāna ṭṭhena sammāsati avikkhepa ṭṭhena

original: sammāsamādhi micchāsamādhito vuṭṭhāti, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti,
analyzed: sammāsamādhi micchāsamādhitaḥ vuṭṭhāti tad anuvattaka kilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti

analyzed: bahiddhā ca sabba nimittehi vuṭṭhāti tena vuccati dubhataḥ vuṭṭhāna vivaṭṭane paññā magge ñāṇam ti

original: “Sakadāgāmimaggakkhaṇe dassanaṭṭhena sammādiṭṭhi…pe… avikkhepaṭṭhena sammāsamādhi oḷārikā kāmarāgasaṃyojanā paṭighasaṃyojanā oḷārikā kāmarāgānusayā paṭighānusayā vuṭṭhāti…pe….

original: “Anāgāmimaggakkhaṇe dassanaṭṭhena sammādiṭṭhi…pe… avikkhepaṭṭhena sammāsamādhi anusahagatā kāmarāgasaṃyojanā paṭighasaṃyojanā anusahagatā kāmarāgānusayā paṭighānusayā vuṭṭhāti…pe….
analyzed: anāgāmi magga kkhaṇe dassana ṭhena sammādiṭṭhi pe avikkhepa ṭṭhena sammāsamādhi anu sahagatā kāma rāga saṃyojanā paṭigha saṃyojanā anu sahagatā kāma rāga anusayā paṭigha anusayā vuṭṭhā ātipe

original: “Arahattamaggakkhaṇe dassanaṭṭhena sammādiṭṭhi…pe… avikkhepaṭṭhena sammāsamādhi rūparāgā

original: arūparāgā mānā uddhaccā avijjāya mānānusayā bhavarāgānusayā avijjānusayā vuṭṭhāti,
analyzed: arūpa rāgāḥ mānāḥ uddhaccāḥ avijjāya māna anusayāḥ bhava rāga anusayāḥ avijja anusayāḥ vuṭṭhāti

original: tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhāti.
analyzed: tad anuvattaka kilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti bahiddhā ca sabba nimittehi vuṭṭhāti

original: Tena vuccati ‘dubhato vuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane paññā magge ñāṇa”’nti.
analyzed: tena vuccati dubhataḥ vuṭṭhāna vivaṭṭane paññā magge ñāṇam ti

original: 828. Lokiyānañca aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ bhāvanākāle samathabalaṃ adhikaṃ hoti. Aniccānupassanādīnaṃ

analyzed: bhāvanā kāle vipassanā balam ariya magga kkhaṇe pana yuga naddhā te dhammā pavattanti

original: aññamaññaṃ anativattanaṭṭhena. Tasmā imesu catūsupi ñāṇesu ubhayabalasamāyogo hoti. Yathāha –

analyzed: uddhacca sahagata kilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhahato cittassa ekagga tā avikkhepo

original: samādhi nirodhagocaro, avijjāsahagatakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhahato anupassanaṭṭhena
analyzed: samādhi nirodha gocaraḥ avijjā sahagata kilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhahataḥ anupassana ṭṭhena

original: vipassanā nirodhagocarā. Iti vuṭṭhānaṭṭhena samathavipassanā ekarasā honti, yuganaddhā
analyzed: vipassanā nirodha gocarā iti vuṭṭhāna ṭṭhena samatha vipassanā ekarasāḥ honti yuga naddhā

original: honti, aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti. Tena vuccati vuṭṭhānaṭṭhena samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ bhāvetī”ti.
analyzed: honti aññam aññam na ativattanti iti tena vuccati vuṭṭhāna aṭṭhena samatha vipassanam yuga naddham bhāveti iti

original: Evamettha vuṭṭhānabalasamāyogo veditabbo.
analyzed: evam ettha vuṭṭhāna bala samāyogaḥ veditabbo

original: Pahātabbadhammapahānakathā
analyzed: pahātabba dhamma pahāna kathā

original: 829. Ye yena pahātabbā dhammā, tesaṃ pahānañcāti imesu pana catūsu ñāṇesu ye dhammā

original: saṃyojanakilesamicchattalokadhammamacchariyavipallāsaganthaagatiāsavaoghayoganīvaraṇaparāmāsaupādānaanusayamalaakusalakammapathacittuppādasaṅkhātānaṃ
analyzed: saṃyojana kilesa micchatta loka dhamma macchariya vipallāsa gantha agati āsava ogha yoga nīvaraṇa parāmāsa upādāna anusaya mala a kusala kamma patha cittuppāda saṅkhātānam

original: dhammānaṃ pahānakarāni.
analyzed: dhammānam pahāna karāni

original: Tattha saṃyojanānīti khandhehi khandhānaṃ phalena kammassa dukkhena vā sattānaṃ saṃyojakattā
analyzed: tattha saṃyojanāni iti khandhehi khandhānam phalena kammassa dukkhena vā sattānam saṃyojaka ttā

original: rūparāgādayo dasa dhammā vuccanti. Yāvañhi te, tāva etesaṃ anuparamoti. Tatrāpi rūparāgo
analyzed: rūpa rāga ādayaḥ dasa dhammāḥ vuccanti yāvat hi te tāva etesam tatra api rūpa rāgaḥ

original: arūparāgo māno uddhaccaṃ avijjāti ime pañca uddhaṃnibbattanakakhandhādisaṃyojakattā

original: uddhaṃbhāgiyasaṃyojanāni nāma. Sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbataparāmāso kāmarāgo
analyzed: uddhaṃbhāgiya saṃyojanāni nāma sakkāya diṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbata parāmāsaḥ kāma rāgo

original: paṭighoti ime pañca adhonibbattanakakhandhādisaṃyojakattā adhobhāgiyasaṃyojanāni nāma.
analyzed: paṭighaḥ ti ime pañca adhas nibbattanaka khandha ādi saṃyojaka ttā adhobhāgiya saṃyojanāni nāma

original: Kilesāti sayaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhattā sampayuttadhammānañca saṃkilesikattā lobho doso moho māno diṭṭhi vicikicchā thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti ime dasa dhammā.
analyzed: kilesā ati sayam saṃkiliṭṭha ttā sampayutta dhammānam ca saṃkilesika ttā lobhaḥ dosaḥ mohaḥ mānaḥ diṭṭhi vicikicchā thinam uddhaccam ahirikam anottappanti ime dasa dhammā

original: Micchattāti micchāpavattanato micchādiṭṭhi micchāsaṅkappo micchāvācā micchākammanto
analyzed: micchattā ati micchā apavattanataḥ micchā diṭṭhi micchā saṅkappaḥ micchā vācā micchā kammanto

original: micchāājīvo micchāvāyāmo micchāsati micchāsamādhīti ime aṭṭha dhammā. Micchāvimuttimicchāñāṇehi vā saddhiṃ dasa.
analyzed: micchāājīvaḥ micchāvāyāmaḥ micchā sati micchā samādhi iti ime aṭṭha dhammā micchā vimutti micchā ñāṇehi vā saddhim dasa

original: Lokadhammāti lokappavattiyā sati anuparamadhammakattā lābho alābho yaso ayaso sukhaṃ

original: dukkhaṃ nindā pasaṃsāti ime aṭṭha. Idha pana kāraṇopacārena lābhādivatthukassa anunayassa

original: alābhādivatthukassa paṭighassa cetaṃ lokadhammaggahaṇena gahaṇaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: alābha ādi vatthukassa paṭighassa ca itam loka dhamma ggahaṇena gahaṇam katan ti veditabbam

original: Macchariyānīti āvāsamacchariyaṃ kulamacchariyaṃ lābhamacchariyaṃ dhammamacchariyaṃ
analyzed: macchariyāni iti āvāsa macchariyam kulam acchariyam lābham acchariyam dhamma macchariyam

original: vaṇṇamacchariyanti imāsu āvāsādīsu aññesaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ asahanākārena pavattāni pañca macchariyāni.
analyzed: imāsu āvāsa ādīsu aññesam sādhāraṇa bhāvam asahanā ākārena pavattāni pañca macchariyāni

original: Vipallāsāti aniccadukkhaanattaasubhesuyeva vatthūsu “niccaṃ sukhaṃ attā subha”nti evaṃ pavatto saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāsoti ime tayo.
analyzed: vipallāsā ti anicca dukkha anatta asubhesu yeva vatthūsu niccam sukham attā subham ti evam pavatto saññā vipallāso citta vipallāso diṭṭhi vipallāso ti ime tayo

original: Ganthāti nāmakāyassa ceva rūpakāyassa ca ganthanato abhijjhādayo cattāro. Tathā hi
analyzed: ganthā ti nāmakāyassa ca iva rūpakāyassa ca ganthanataḥ abhijjhā ādayo cattāro tathā hi

original: kāyagantho icceva vuttā.
analyzed: kāyagantho iccā iva vuttā

original: Agatīti chandadosamohabhayehi akattabbakaraṇassa, kattabbākaraṇassa ca adhivacanaṃ. Tañhi ariyehi agantabbattā agatīti vuccati.
analyzed: agati iti chanda dosa moha bhayehi akattabba karaṇassa kattabba akaraṇassa ca adhivacanam tat hi ariyehi a gantabba ttā agati iti vuccati

original: Āsavāti ārammaṇavasena āgotrabhuto, ābhavaggato ca savanā, asaṃvutehi vā dvārehi
analyzed: āsavā ti ārammaṇa vasena ca savanā asaṃvutehi vā dvārehi

original: ghaṭachiddehi udakaṃ viya savanato niccapaggharaṇaṭṭhena saṃsāradukkhassa vā savanato

original: kāmarāgabhavarāgamicchādiṭṭhiavijjānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
analyzed: adhivacanam

original: Bhavasāgare ākaḍḍhanaṭṭhena duruttaraṇaṭṭhena ca oghātipi, ārammaṇaviyogassa ceva dukkhaviyogassa ca appadānato yogātipi tesaññeva adhivacanaṃ.

original: Nīvaraṇānīti cittassa āvaraṇanīvaraṇapaṭicchādanaṭṭhena kāmacchandādayo pañca.

original: Parāmāsoti tassa tassa dhammassa sabhāvaṃ atikkamma parato abhūtaṃ sabhāvaṃ āmasanākārena pavattanato micchādiṭṭhiyā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.

original: Upādānānīti sabbākārena paṭiccasamuppādaniddese vuttāni kāmupādānādīni cattāri.

original: Anusayāti thāmagataṭṭhena kāmarāgānusayo, paṭigha, māna, diṭṭhi, vicikicchā, bhavarāga,

original: avijjānusayoti evaṃ vuttā kāmarāgādayo satta. Te hi thāmagatattā punappunaṃ kāmarāgādīnaṃ

original: uppattihetubhāvena anusentiyevāti anusayā.
analyzed: uppatti hetu bhāvena anusentiyā iva ati anusayā

analyzed: telañjana kalalam viya sayam ca asuddhattā aññesam ca asuddha bhāva karaṇato lobha dosa mohā tayo

original: Akusalakammapathāti akusalakammabhāvena ceva duggatīnañca pathabhāvena pāṇātipāto

original: byāpādo micchādiṭṭhīti ime dasa.
analyzed: byāpādaḥ micchādiṭṭhi iti ime dasa

original: sukhumā tatiyañāṇavajjhā, rūparāgādayo pañcapi catutthañāṇavajjhā eva. Paratopi ca
analyzed: tatiya ñāṇa vajjhāḥ rūpa rāga ādayaḥ catuttha ñāṇa vajjhāḥ eva paratas pi ca

original: yattha yattha evasaddena niyamaṃ na karissāma. Tattha tattha yaṃ yaṃ “upariñāṇavajjho”ti
analyzed: yattha yattha eva saddena niyamam na karissāma tattha tattha yam yam

original: vakkhāma, so so purimañāṇehi hatāpāyagamanīyādibhāvova hutvā upariñāṇavajjho hotīti veditabbo.
analyzed: vakkhāma saḥ saḥ purima ñāṇehi hata apāya gamanīya ādi bhāvaḥ u hutvā upari ñāṇa vajjhaḥ hoti iti veditabbo

original: Kilesesu diṭṭhivicikicchā paṭhamañāṇavajjhā, doso tatiyañāṇavajjho, lobhamohamānathinauddhaccaahirikaanottappāni catutthañāṇavajjhāni.
analyzed: kilesesu diṭṭhi vicikicchā paṭhama ñāṇa vajjhā doso tatiya ñāṇa vajjhaḥ lobha moha māna thina auddhacca ahirika anottappāni catuttha ñāṇa vajjhāni

original: Micchattesu micchādiṭṭhi musāvādo micchākammanto micchāājīvoti ime paṭhamañāṇavajjhā,
analyzed: micchattesu micchādiṭṭhi musāvādaḥ micchākammantaḥ micchāājīvaḥ ti ime paṭhama ñāṇa vajjhāḥ

original: micchāsaṅkappo pisuṇavācā pharusavācāti ime tatiyañāṇavajjhā, cetanāyeva cettha vācāti

original: veditabbā. Samphappalāpamicchāvāyāmasatisamādhivimuttiñāṇāni catutthañāṇavajjhāni.
analyzed: veditabbā samphappalāpa micchā vāyāma sati samādhi vimutti ñāṇāni catuttha ñāṇa vajjhāni

original: Lokadhammesu paṭigho tatiyañāṇavajjho, anunayo catutthañāṇavajjho, yase ca pasaṃsāya ca anunayo catutthañāṇavajjhoti eke. Macchariyāni paṭhamañāṇavajjhāneva.
analyzed: loka dhammesu paṭighaḥ tatiya ñāṇa vajjhaḥ anunayaḥ catuttha ñāṇa vajjhaḥ yase ca pasaṃsāya ca anunayaḥ catuttha ñāṇa vajjhaḥ ti eke macchariyāni paṭhama ñāṇa vajjhāni eva

original: Vipallāsesu anicce niccaṃ, anattani attāti ca saññācittadiṭṭhivipallāsā, dukkhe sukhaṃ,
analyzed: vipallāsesu anicce niccam an attani attā ati ca saññā citta diṭṭhi vipallāsāḥ dukkhe sukham

original: asubhe subhanti diṭṭhivipallāso cāti ime paṭhamañāṇavajjhā, asubhe subhanti saññācittavipallāsā

original: tatiyañāṇavajjhā, dukkhe sukhanti saññācittavipallāsā catutthañāṇavajjhā.

original: Ganthesu sīlabbataparāmasaidaṃsaccābhinivesakāyaganthā paṭhamañāṇavajjhā, byāpādakāyagantho tatiyañāṇavajjho, itaro catutthañāṇavajjho.
analyzed: ganthesu sīla bbata parāmasa edaṃsacca abhinivesa kāya ganthā paṭhama ñāṇa vajjhā byāpāda kāya gantho tatiya ñāṇa vajjho itaro catuttha ñāṇa vajjhaḥ

original: Agati paṭhamañāṇavajjhāva.
analyzed: agati

original: Āsavesu diṭṭhāsavo paṭhamañāṇavajjho, kāmāsavo tatiyañāṇavajjho, itare dve catutthañāṇavajjhā. Oghayogesupi eseva nayo.

original: 869. Katamāni panettha dve balāni…pe… katamā vasībhāvatāti? Na ettha kiñci amhehi vattabbaṃ atthi. Sabbamidaṃ etassa uddesassa niddese vuttameva. Yathāha –

analyzed: dvīhi balehi iti dve balāni samatha balam vipassanā balam katamam samatha balam nekkhamma vasena

analyzed: vitakko ca vicāro ca pīti ca sukham ca citta ekagga tā na ivasaññā nāsañña āyatana samāpattim

original: natthīti paccavekkhaṇavasī. Dutiyaṃ…pe… nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ yatthicchakaṃ

analyzed: natthi iti paccavekkhaṇa vasī imā pañca vasiyaḥ ti

analyzed: ettha ca soḷasahi ñāṇa cariyāhi iti ukkaṭṭha niddeso esa anāgāminaḥ pana cuddasahi

original: – “nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakusalaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena
analyzed: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatana kusalam phala samāpattiyāḥ anantara paccayena

analyzed: kattha samāpajjanti iti pañcavokāra bhave kasmai anupubba samāpatti sabbhāvato

analyzed: catu vokāra bhave pana paṭhamajjhāna ādīnam uppatti natthi tasmā na sakkā tattha samāpajjitun ti

original: Keci pana “vatthussa abhāvā”ti vadanti.
analyzed: keci pana vatthussa abhāvā ti vadanti

original: 872. Kasmā samāpajjantīti saṅkhārānaṃ pavattibhede ukkaṇṭhitvā diṭṭheva dhamme acittakā hutvā “nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ patvā sukhaṃ viharissāmā”ti samāpajjanti.

analyzed: samāpajjitvā ava paratas acittakaḥ hutvā nirodham phusitvā viharati

original: 880. Kathaṃ ṭhānanti evaṃ samāpannāya panassā kālaparicchedavasena ceva antarāāyukkhayasaṅghapaṭimānanasatthupakkosanābhāvena ca ṭhānaṃ hoti.

analyzed: matassa ca samāpannassa ca kaḥ visesaḥ ti ayam pi atthaḥ sutte vuttaḥ yā iva yathā āha
